name: Design house-city centre-private parking
description:
Your own modern house in the city center, surrounded by a courtyard. Both stations within walking distance and all public transport around the corner. Museums, beaches, theaters, shops, canals nearby. Bakery, supermarket and shops 2 min.
Private parking can be reserved in advance by owner, 15,00 euros per day.

The space
This special and beautifully designed townhouse with its own entrance is spread over a ground floor and first floor. The house is hidden in a private street with 10 other houses and can be found right in the center of The Hague in a quiet and 19th-century traditional The Hague courtyard. Around the corner Avenue Culinary with its abundance of restaurants, cafes and theaters. Only a 10 minute walk from both train stations.
General. Private parking space can be reserved in advance by the owner, 15,00 euros per day.

• Private parking place (15,00 euros per day)
• Private entrance on the ground floor
• Heated floors / d
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is great, students, expats and a lot of artist. Incredibly many and good restaurants, boat cafes on and along the canal. It is a special neighborhood, full of diversity of people. Chinatown is around the corner, the parliament 5 min. from your house and the bakery and supermarket around the corner. Many terraces and shops. if you want peace and tranquility, just 600 meters away you can walk into the forest and from there the beautiful dune area. You can rent bicycles on the canal, all within walking distance
host_about:
We are a friendly couple who live in the center of this beautiful city. Open-minded and easy going in life. We have a few trendy short Stay apartments right in the old city center of The Hague.  We are the place to stay When you are in need of accommodation. Whether it be for a business trip, an internship, a holiday or a transition period, we have plenty of possibilities. We have been around for a while and we know how to do things right. Service is our pleasure!

Our apartment is fully furnished, newly renovated and available for short term rentals Throughout the Year. Situated in the picturesque old city center of The Hague, within walking distance from both Central Station and Holland Spoor train station, it is the ideal 'home away from home'. Also within walking distance, one can find numerous at shops, grocery stores and restaurants. The all-in price includes furniture, fittings and fixtures, energy, water, internet connection, TV, service costs and a janitor. And of course there's a washing machine and a drier, pots and pans, bed linen, towels, a bathrobe, iron and ironing board, cups, plates and whatsoever.

name: ruime studio w.private kitchen/bath near beach.
description:
Onze archictectonische half vrij staande villa ligt in the international quater dicht bij zee en het centrum van Den Haag. De ruime studio begeeft zich onder het huis en kent veel privacy en rust.
Het heeft een eigen badkamer en kleine keuken en kleine patio waar je buiten kunt zitten.
Corona proof, omdat de studio een eigen opgang heeft met eigen ruimte is fysieke afstand met de eigenaren/bewoners boven het huis gegarandeerd.
No -smoking

The space
in a under archritecture build beautiful house under basement (80 m) has its own entree,kitchen and bathroom.

Guest access

Other things to note
Het is een hele rustige, ruime ruimte.
Er is wifi, geen tv.

name: Zen in the City Privat Cosy XL APP
description:
Zen in de city is een fijn groot apartement midden in het centrum van Den Haag. Het heeft een eigen voordeur / entree. Het is een ensuite kamer met grote keuken en luxe badkamer met douche en wirlpool. Om de hoek winkels om lekker te eten.

The space
Nearby Central Station The Hague 5 minute Walk.
Good public transfer (train,bus,tram) to the sea: Scheveningen / Amsterdam / Rotterdam.
Our total privat appartement sets in a friendly and save atmosfeer in Bezuidenhout (good shops for every day needs) of The Hague.
The place "Zenindecity" is on the groundfloor and with a nice garden. The house is traditional build in 1896 with ensuite rooms. You rent the whole appartement with privat entrance.
Comfortable privat kitchen (oven, dishwasser) available.
The beds are comfotable heigh senoir beds (good matras).
An extra double or single airbed is available. Bathroom with wirlpool and shower. Relaxed interior to meditate.

Prices:
neighborhood_overview:
Theresiastraat: nice restaurants and shops around the corner.
Forest (Haagse bos) to run is 3 minutes walk.
host_about: Welcome to Zen in de City. We are a family that live in a comfortable house on the groundfloor with garden in the middle of Den Haag. With nice restaurants and shop just around the corner. It is also close to the sea (20 minutes on bike). We surf in Scheveningen. We like to share our nice typical Dutch place with people all over the world. So feel free and welcome to stay with us.

name: Cute Room in  Den Haag Centrum
description:
Nice L-shaped room in 1920's era 3 bedroom portiek flat in Centrum.

Also I do have a security guard, Gato the cat and she is very sweet but if you have allergies or dont like cats.....

Room w bunk bed (single + double), dresser, desk + chair

Full kitchen, nice living room, bath w shower/ Jacuzzi, WIFI very quiet location with children's farm behind flat 10 min walk to Centrum & 10 min tram or bike ride to the beach

The space
Very light and cheery but small L shaped room in 3 bedroon walk up portiek flat Centrum Den Haag.

Room is suitable for one or two guests. The maximum stay is 12 days but with two guests the stay is limited to 4 days.

House and bedrooms are small so not suitable as a full-time remote work or study location .

The room is equipped with a bunk bed (single above / double below) a dresser, desk, chair and hooks on the wall to hang clothes/coats. There are two large and on
host_about:
I'm an American Expat with dual nationality living now 28 years in the Netherlands. I really enjoy the Netherlands as my adopted home country and have no plans to return to the US other than for visits.

On a personal level, I have three daughters 25 , 30 and 44 with the two youngest growing up in the Netherlands and attending Dutch schools. 

Two of the three lived in the US : Washington DC and New York ( but now Marseille)  

My 30 year old moved first back to Holland 8 years ago , then Brussels and now Helsinki and is active in the environmental movement .

My oldest owns a home in Williamsburg, Brooklyn ( now living in Marseille) and founded an environmental NGO 14+ years ago ( Human Impacts Institute) and has a  5 year old daughter.

Lastly my youngest moved to DC 2 years ago after graduating 5 years ago from College of Charleston with high honors in International relations and political science. 

You wouldn't be wrong to deduce that I'm quite proud of these three lovely ladies.

As for myself, I have traveled a lot over the last 40 + years for both work and pleasure and really enjoy meeting people so when I first heard of Airbnb almost 13  years ago, the concept of Airbnb appealed to me.

On a personal level, I have had an interesting career in high-tech international sales management. In my pleasure time I have quite varied interests but I am very much an outdoors person. I enjoy sailing, tennis, biking, camping, skiing etc. and I am as well a classical musician and a world class tournament bridge player. 

I have always loved to travel and meet people and have been doing just that since my teenage years when I hitchhiked with hair to my waist, a biker jacket and a backpack from Washington DC to San Francisco in the middle of the Hippy Era 1971 . ... can't say I regret it !!

Back to the present: 

I renovated my 3 bedroom flat in Centrum Den Haag 15 years ago when my two then teenage daughters still lived in the Netherlands and spent weekends with me. 

I then set up the two small bedrooms in my 3 bedroom flat with bunk beds to accomodate friends staying over.

Before I began hosting through Airbnb,  I occasionally rented  out a room to interns/foreign students and now have been hosting for the last 12 years through Airbnb. 

Hosting with Airbnb has been overall a very interesting and rewarding experience. 

I have found almost without exception my Airbnb guests from all over the world and from very differing backgrounds to be very interesting , considerate and nice to be around.

As you are now reading my profile, I hope that you will consider staying at my flat and I  look forward to welcoming you to my home and my adopted city of Den Haag.

Regards,

Paul

name: Amazing Apartment on 39th floor 771
description:
Fully independent apartment on the 38th floor of The Hague Tower, welcome to The Penthouse Apartments on Top of the City. Enjoy stunning views of city of The Hague and the coastline, all the way up to Hook of Holland.

Enjoy your comfortable skyscraper home! Includes comfortable double bed, Samsung Smart-TV and Nespresso machine.

The space
Amazing apartment on one of the top floors (39th) of The Hague Tower. This is apartment 771. Enjoy stunning views of city of The Hague and the coastline, all the way up to Hook of Holland.

Central location right next to The Hague HS station. The city centre is within walking (10mins) distance. Living room with bedroom, open kitchen and bathroom with soft bath towels. Perfect for a night or longer stay in The Hague, your own skyscraper apartment!

The tower also features a business lounge with free access and a basic fitness facility (free entrance). New York's famous flatiron building served as th

There is public transportation hub right in front of the Tower with connections to places both in- and outside The Hague. In this authentic The Hague neighborhood you will be able to feel like a local.We are close to the city centre, it's just a 10 minute walk! name: B&B The Hague, Own floor, Shared front door
description:
Peace and quiet, privacy, taste.

Bed and Bath

FREE PARKING

You have the sole use of a complete floor with 2 rooms within a stylish pre-war flat.
(I live upstairs and only use the stairs.)

NO kitchen.

If 2 persons only, you can use the masterbedroom for € 69,- / € 79,-.

If 2 persons wants to sleep separately and they want to use also the bed in the smaller room, for € 99,- / € 109.-.
(please make a request for THREE guests.)

Good bus connections.

No smoking!

Breakfast is not possible.

The space
You have the sole use of a complete floor with two rooms, own bathroom, within a stylish pre-war flat

Guest access
- a spacious, luxurious double room with a quality box-spring bed (lits jumeaux) with a seat.
- a small room with a comfortable couch and working space
- large bathroom with a toilet, a shower, bath. A hairdryer for your
neighborhood_overview: Benoordenhout (the neigborhood where my B&B is) is a wonderfull quiet part of The Hague.
host_about:
Op mijn eigen reizen heb ik vaak gebruikt gemaakt van kleine B&B's.

De gastvrijheid, het persoonlijke contact en de kleinschaligheid heeft mij altijd aangetrokken.

Toen ik mijn appartement in Benoordenhout betrok, ben ik naar dit idee mijn eigen B & B gestart.

Ik heb een eigen atelier, waar ik werk aan schilderopdrachten.
Ik luister veel naar muziek, speel piano en zing in koren.

name: TOP Apartment | City Centre-Private Parking
description:
A special spacious TOP apartment, right in the old city center with both train stations at 500 meters. Private entrance, (private) private parking 15.00 Euro per day, separate toilet, spacious shower, fully equipped kitchen, washing machine and dryer. For Short-long Stay, weekend work and holiday stay.

The space
Short Stay MAFF TOP Apartment The Hague is a stylish, luxurious, trendy design apartment located in the center of The Hague, within walking distance (550 meters) from Hollands Spoor and CS The Hague. The Top apartment is housed in an old historic house and has its own entrance with intercom. To make your stay, weekend, long or short stay a fantastic and experience, the hotel apartment is fully equipped. A weekend in The Hague or for a business stay overnight, short stay TOP apartment is ideal for this. The Top apartment has its own private parking and internet. In the neighborhood you will find several supermarkets, restaurants, bakeries and other shops.
neighborhood_overview: International neighborhood, many restaurants, supermarkets and center in old city center. museums, thaters and dance theater within walking distance
host_about:
We are a friendly couple who live in the center of this beautiful city. Open-minded and easy going in life. We have a few trendy short Stay apartments right in the old city center of The Hague.  We are the place to stay When you are in need of accommodation. Whether it be for a business trip, an internship, a holiday or a transition period, we have plenty of possibilities. We have been around for a while and we know how to do things right. Service is our pleasure!

Our apartment is fully furnished, newly renovated and available for short term rentals Throughout the Year. Situated in the picturesque old city center of The Hague, within walking distance from both Central Station and Holland Spoor train station, it is the ideal 'home away from home'. Also within walking distance, one can find numerous at shops, grocery stores and restaurants. The all-in price includes furniture, fittings and fixtures, energy, water, internet connection, TV, service costs and a janitor. And of course there's a washing machine and a drier, pots and pans, bed linen, towels, a bathrobe, iron and ironing board, cups, plates and whatsoever.

name: Artistic loft in the center+parking, wifi, bikes
description:
Light and bright apartment (100 m2) right in the center of The Hague. Very comfortable and cosy. All amenities. Magnificent roof terrace for use in summer. Bicycle storage. City bikes available.

Parking place close by.

Bakery, supermarket and public transport around the corner. Wifi.

Check in and check out flexibel: depending on arriving and leaving guests. In general check in after 15.00 until 21.00, check out before 11.00

Use of bicycles and the parking in garage is at tenant's risk.

The space
Bright and comfortable loft right in the center of The Hague. Colourfully furnished, warm and cosy. 100 m2. Private entrance, very clean.

For one or more persons. Please read house rules before you book.

In fact it is one big space, divided in a sleeping and living area. A topfloor of a listed monumental house with many windows and nice views. It contains a funny kitchenette with all utilities: small
neighborhood_overview: Very nice neighbourhood, right in the center, with many restaurants, pubs, shops, museums and parks.  Close to Scheveningen/beach, by tram, car or bicycle.
host_about: My husband Jurriaan and I love the good things in life: family, friends, art and nature. Since 36 years we live in this big classic house right in the center of The Hague. First with our children, now happily together on the first floor.  Jurriaan used to run an art gallery downstairs, but now that space is rented out to an office. We both love The Hague and enjoy having guests from all over the world in our loft on the top floor. Helping them to have a great holiday in this area.

name: Beach&City B&B Shortstay
description:
Read in English.

The space
Welcome international traveller,
How nice that you're visiting our airbnb- page! Our Beach&City is situated in a lushy, green neighborhood with gardens and parks, within walking distance of the dunes and the Northsea beach. We like to welcome you in our small but complete and selfsupporting apartment with its own, private entrance and patio, toilet/shower, desk, free WiFi acces.

From April 1, 2023 the parking in this neighborhood has to be paid (every day from 18-24 hr; €2,50/ hour)

Please read the extra rules, how we deal with the increasing energy prices.

The Hague, being the International City of Justice and Peace is hosting the International Criminal Court, Europol, most of the embassies and the World Forum Convention Center. You can visit the GEM fotomuseum, Gemeentemuseum and Omniversum. City centre and shopping areas are nearby. Public transport is excellent. There is free parking in front
neighborhood_overview:
De mooiste groenste wijk achter de duinen in de mooiste stad achter de duinen : wat wil je nog meer. Je wordt gewekt door vogels en niet door stadse drukte.
Als je de drukte graag opzoekt: binnen 15 minuten (met tram, auto of fiets) in het bruisende centrum van Den Haag zijn, party time in Scheveningen is op 10 minuten van hier.
De rust van het stille strand is op slechts 15 minuten wandelen.
host_about:
Good taste, hospitality, humor and joy. 

We ( my husband Maurits and me) love to meet people from other countries, like to have a chat and also respect everybody's own space en privacy.

name: Trendy house near beach & center
description:
Our cool and comfortable 3 storey private house with 3 bedrooms and large sunny balcony is situated in a quiet, cosy street nested against the bristling old centre of The Hague. Just a 10 minutes drive to the beach.

The space
The large table in the living room is my favorite place in the house. It's next to the kitchen, and from here you have a view of the balcony. It's a nice bright living room, especially if the balcony doors are open during summer. On a summer evening it's wonderful to relax till late on the balcony.
On the second floor are two large bedrooms and a luxurious bathroom with a bathtub.
On the third floor (attic) is the huge master bedroom. If you are in the king size bed you can open the window above your head and sleep under the stars.
The house is especially suitable for a family with children.

Guest access
The house has a private entrance. The rented part of house consist of the 1st, 2nd and 3rd floor (a
neighborhood_overview:
Lively and very safe neighbourhood close to the city-center with shops, restaurants and large supermarket just around the corner.
Scheveningens famous sandy beaches are just a 15 minutes drive away.
host_about: I'm a graphic designer living with my husband and two daughters in one of the most popular neighboorhoods of The Hague. Close to the center and to the beach. We like traveling and have been to the most remote places in the world. I always have the ambition to find the best places to stay for our travel budget. Airbnb helped me with finding great places, so that's why I like to share my house with other travelers.

name: Lovely family home near the beach the Hague
description:
Close to the city and the beach! Stay across the from a city farm petting zoo with chickens, goats, cows and bunnies.

Very near the beach, easy access to public transport, an easy 10-minute bike ride to the beach, close to the center of The Hague. It is sunny and cheerful with great views. There is a lovely garden, and a full-stocked designer kitchen.

The space
A great place for families! We are right across the street from a petting zoo (goats, sheep, cows, bunnies etc.) and a 10-minute bike ride from the beach. Bikes are available for use. We are close to the city - a 20 minute bike ride gets you to downtown and train stations.

We have a gated back area which is very safe for children. There are many playgrounds in the area.

Very beautifully furnished! Has everything you would need.

Guest access
Bikes, internet, cable TV.

Other things to note
Unlike some AirBandB places that are p
neighborhood_overview:
The fact that the playgrounds, beach and city are so close by. We love the petting zoo. The trams are a few blocks away and busses are right in front of the door and take you everywhere you need to go. Shops, groceries and cafes nearby.

!Please note! Although you can easily park the parking in the street is not free. During the evening hours it is paid parking only. There is a parking machine in front of the house.

name: Spacious Unique Beach House with Green Garden
description:
Recently renovated beach house with terrace and spacious green oase garden.

Within walking distance from the beach area of Scheveningen and within 5 minute walking distance from the peacefull dune landscapes of The Hague. The city centre can be reached by bike (approx. 10 min)

For the sports fanatics we have multiple surfboards, skateboards and 2 bikes available that can be used in the area.

The space
Garden:
Spacious garden for some relaxation time between lots of plants.

Livingroom/Kitchen:
Fully equipped open kitchen including coffee-machine and juicer for your daily dosis of vitamines. The lovely dining room with open kitchen is colourfull and very light and the ensuite contains a nice cosy chill tv area and vinyl player with large collection of records to put on your morning groove! Doors from kitchen and living room will guide you directly to our upper terrace where you can enjoy your cup of coffee in the morning
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is situated right behind the beach area and within 5 minutes walking distance you will be able to acces the beautiful dune landscape of The Hague.

Within 15 minute biking distance you will reach the city Centre of The Hague including a wide variety of cultural sites and lovely restaurants.

name: Amazing SkyStudio on 30th floor 737
description:
Fully independent amazing studio apartment on the 30th floor of The Hague Tower, welcome to The Penthouse Apartments on Top of the City. Enjoy stunning views of city of The Hague and Rotterdam and Rijswijk

Enjoy your comfortable skyscraper home! Includes comfortable double bed, Samsung Smart-TV and Nespresso machine.

The space
Amazing studio apartment on one of the topfloors (30th) of The Hague Tower. This is Studio 737. Views are towards the South (Rijswijk/Delft/Rotterdam) and reach up to 45km!

Central location right next to The Hague HS station. The city centre is within walking (10mins) distance. Living room with bedroom, open kitchen and bathroom with soft bath towels. Perfect for a night or longer stay in The Hague, your own skyscraper apartment!

The tower also features a business lounge with free access and a basic fitness facility (free entrance). New York's famous flatiron building served as the inspiration for the build
neighborhood_overview:
We are close to the city centre, it's just a 10 minute walk! There are many interesting restaurants and shops nearby, all within walking distance. There is public transportation hub right in front of the Tower with connections to places both in- and outside The Hague. In this authentic The Hague neighborhood you will be able to feel like a local.

We will supply you with a digital guide with some of our best recommendations.
host_about: I am an advertising and event consultant. I live in the centre of The Hague, The Netherlands and really enjoy traveling. I have enjoyed AirBnB like hospitality in many countries, so now it's time to return the favor. Welcome!

name: Top floor loft with kitchen
description:
Sleep under the sky and have a view on the skyline of The Hague on a top location (Nassau quarter); fully equipped loft with kitchen including basic ingredients for cooking and breakfast. Walking distance to center and CS. Tramway to beach and HS on 200 meter

The space
The attic has been changed into a nice comfortable loft. It is three floors up. It is a very light space and has a nice view over the skyline of the Hague. Above the bed is a big window through which you can watch the stars. This window and the shades can be opened and closed with a remote control system.

Having experience myself with renting rooms/apartments I thought about what I have liked and what I have missed.

There is an independent heating system, there is WIFI.
The kitchen has a fridge, an electric oven/microwave and a dish washer. In the kitchen basic ingredients are available such as vinegar, olive oil, herbs, all kind of teas, coffee, cornflakes, muesli et
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood dates back to the end of the 19th century. My house was build in 1896 and the attic, where you will stay, was added to it in 1906. The houses are nice looking, the area is calm and the location is super. Just 300 meter away you will find plenty of restaurants and bars.

name: Modern family house 500m to beach/ private parking
description:
A modernly furnished family house with a view over the dunes. 5-minute walk to the beach with many cozy restaurants, the boulevard and 500m from the famous Pier of Scheveningen. first floor: the modern kitchen with dining table, the living room with fireplace and an adjoining sunny terrace with trampoline and dining table. 2nd: master bedroom (kingsize bed) and children's room with a loft bed, bathroom with bath and an home office. The house has a private parking place. Perfect for families!

The space
Spacious, bright and modern family house in 1st line of the beach of Scheveningen with private parking and spacious garden. Suitable for families with 1 or 2 children. Because of the stairs not recommended for toddlers.

Guest access
Access to the private parking, garage with bicycles and washing machine, living room, kitchen (dishwasher, oven, microwave), bathroom with bath, toilet, 2 (bed)rooms, balcony and terras/garden. Use of washing machi
neighborhood_overview: Surfing at the beach, walking through the dunes, picknick in the park (Westbroekpark) and shopping in the city center. Stroll along Europe's main boulevard with many restaurants (5 minutes walk). Chilling out at the beach bars (Zwarte pad). In 15 minutes by tram, you are in the historic city centre where you can visit many museums for example Mauritshuis and Escher in the Palace. Binnenhof and Vredespaleis are also nearby. And Madurodam and Legoland as well.
host_about: We live with our 11 year old daughter in this great house, 5 minutes walk from the beach of Scheveningen. At the weekend we enjoy nature or we make a cultural trip. We like to walk in the dunes, picnic in the park or go surfing or swimming in the sea. The Hague has a wide range of culture. Think of music (festivals) or visit a museum such as Escher in the Palace, the Museon or the Mauritshuis. Also nice for children. Within 5 minutes you stand with your feet on the beach and within 15 minutes in the city center. A great combination!

name: Chic in the Statenkwartier 1
description:
Comfortable room in one of the most beautiful areas of The Hague. In the international area, conveniently located for the beach and downtown. 'Fred' with its shops and several restaurants around the corner. The floor (3rd) has two guestrooms, so the kitchen, bathroom and toilet are possibly shared with other guests. Paid parking in the street.

The space
The spacious room is located on the 3rd floor of a 100 year old mansion. You sleep comfortable in a box spring. If you wake up rested, you can have breakfast, depending on the weather, on the balcony or in your room. It is possible to make a simple meal in the kitchen.

Guest access
You share the bathroom, a simple kitchen and the balcony maybe with other guests (we have another room for max 2 persons next to yours).

Other things to note
Is this room already booked for the period you want? We have another room. Look at our other advertisement whether this room is still
neighborhood_overview: The area where we live is called Statenkwartier. The name 'Statenkwartier' comes from the name of the old States executive boards of the Region Holland in the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries. Most of the streets are named after Dutch politicians of the seventeenth century. The district breathes old chic and is characterized by the Art Nouveau style that is often to be seen in the buildings.
host_about: Mijn naam is Marleen Rezaie. Ik ben getrouwd met Abbas en heb twee volwassen zonen. Ik ben directeur van een taalschool voor anderstaligen. Ik heb een echte talenknobbel. Vind het leuk om talen te leren (ik spreek ook Farsi) en mensen uit andere landen en culturen te ontmoeten. Lezen is een grote hobby, naast lekker genieten van al het moois dat het leven ons kan bieden.

name: Chic in het Statenkwartier 2
description:
Comfortabele kamer op de derde etage van een rijtjeshuis in een van de mooiste wijken van Den Haag. In de internationale zone, gunstig gelegen ten opzichte van strand en centrum. De 'Fred' met haar winkels en diverse horecagelegenheden om de hoek. De etage heeft twee kamers, dus de keuken, badkamer en toilet worden eventueel gedeeld met andere hiurders. Betaald parkeren in de straat.

The space
De ruime kamer bevindt zich op de 3e etage van een meer dan 100 jaar oud herenhuis. De verhuurder woont op de 1e en 2e etage.
U slaapt comfortabel op een boxspring. Als u uitgerust wakker wordt, ontbijt u, afhankelijk van het weer, lekker op het balkon of op uw kamer. Het is mogelijk om een eenvoudige maaltijd klaar te maken in de keuken.

Guest access
U deelt de badkamer, een eenvoudige keuken en het balkon mogelijk met andere huurders (nog een andere kamer voor max 2 personen).

Other things to note
Is deze kamer al geboek
neighborhood_overview: De naam 'Statenkwartier' komt van de benaming Staten van het oude dagelijks bestuur van het Gewest Holland in de zeventiende en de achttiende eeuw. De meeste straten zijn vernoemd naar Hollandse politici van de zeventiende eeuw. De wijk ademt oude chic uit en kenmerkt zich door de art-nouveaustijl die veelvuldig is terug te zien in de gebouwen.
host_about: Mijn naam is Marleen Rezaie. Ik ben getrouwd met Abbas en heb twee volwassen zonen. Ik ben directeur van een taalschool voor anderstaligen. Ik heb een echte talenknobbel. neighborhood_overview: Het Statenkwartier is een gezellige buurt met mooie herenhuizen en een van de leukste winkelstraten van Nederland. 15 minuten lopen naar de haven en 25 minuten naar het strand. In de buurt liggen het Gemeentemuseum (Mondriaan), Fotomuseum, Museon en Omniversum op 200 meter afstand. Op loopafstand is ook de  Internationale zone: Internationale Hof van Justitie, Joegoslavië tribunaal, Vredespaleis, Europol en OCPW. En Pauw57 is perfect gelegen voor deelname aan congres en conferentie in het World Forum.

name: Beautiful vintage guesthouse
description:
Spacious and light apartment in a beautiful and newly renovated mansion located in Belgisch Park, one of the oldest and nicest neighborhoods in the heart of Scheveningen. Ideal for exploring The Hague and Scheveningen. Our place is walking distance from beach and boulevard. Shops and restaurants are diverse and close at hand. Easy access to public transportation with direct lines to central station and The Hague city centre. Free parking is available on private property.

The space
Welcome! Thanks for checking out our vintage style guesthouse. This apartment is ideal for a short beach holiday in Scheveningen or a city trip to The Hague.

We are located in ‘Belgisch Park’ in Scheveningen, a beautiful green neighborhood in the middle of the city, near the beach and close to all the touristic spots. You can walk to the beach but it is quiet enough to avoid touristic crowds.

It is only 5 minutes walk to the Kurhaus, Pathe cinema, Holland casino, C
host_about:
We are a friendly and easy going Dutch couple who have lived abroad as well. We enjoy hospitality, home made food, traveling, the beach, all sorts of music and life in general. We live in The Hague for over 15 years and love the combination of city buzz and beach life. We have 3 girls of 6, 4 and 2.. 

Our home is an eclectic mixture of vintage curiosa and design. The top floor guesthouse is spacious, light and private, you have the whole floor to yourself. Ideal for a visit to The Hague and Scheveningen Beach. If you like a bit of retro and vintage design you will certainly feel at home  in our cosy guesthouse. 

We do our best to make our guest feel at home during their stay.  Looking forward to welcome you!

I am a young guy who is entrepreneurial and likes interaction with other people. I love to think the whole world stands in front of your doorstep because of this bed and breakfast concept.

name: Cozy room with a big balcony, right in City Centre
description:
I would like to help people for long-term applications and I ask my friends if their rooms are available. 1 large room for 750 euros and 1 small room for 650 euros. Let me know please.

This small room is cozy. The view to the outside offers a perspective. This room is on the quiet side. In the morning you will be awake by the birds' singing.

The space
This room located 100 m from Parkhotel, 200 m from Ibis hotel, 350 m from Novotel.

Despite a narrow bed, sleep in this room from time to time 2 people. Of course you have to love each other if you want to sleep well this night. Fortunately, I hear enough positive experiences. Love exists ;-)

In 15 minutes by bike you can direct connect between impressive center and passionate beach.

License number
0518 D5ED 6A83 4598 14E6
neighborhood_overview:
This place has a lot of possibilities in the middle of the city. You are right in the center with all the possibilities and sights around. Within a 5-minute walk you are in the palace garden (Paleistuin) and you will see our King's Palace while enjoying a walk in this garden. Behind the palace garden is the Royal stables which are open to the public on certain days. On the other side of the Peleistuin is the famous Noordeinde street with attractive shops for the sophisticated taste and on the other hand with endless numbers of pupil-inspiring galleries.

Within a 10-minute walk you will find the Escher Museum and enjoy its beautiful paintings in its detailed style with love for nature.

Panoramamesdag can not be missed either. Indulge all your senses through the greatest painting in the world.

The best of Dutch painting of the Golden Age is of course in Mauritshuis (5 minutes walking distance from your stay location).

The Binnenhof is the ol
host_about:
OVER MEZELF
Ik ben geboren in Oekraïne en ben trots op mijn moederland. Sinds 16 jaar geleden woon ik in Nederland (ingeschreven op november 2015) en ben dol op de mogelijkheden die dit (ik noem het mijn) vaderland aan mensen kan bieden. Vriendelijkheid, hardwerkende mentaliteit en discipline spreken me erg aan in Nederland. Ik hou even veel van die 2 prachtige landen.

WELKOM
In mijn huis voel je je gelijk op je gemak. Voel je je thuis en vergeet niet dat je op bezoek bent is mijn motto.

HET KOKEN IN HUIS OF BUITEN HUIS OM ETEN
Het delen van keuken en eetkamer gaat hier in samenwerking met elkaar. Ik kook op vaste tijdstippen: vaak om 17:00 uur. De tijd er voor of er na kan gebruikt worden voor het bereiden van je eigen maaltijd. Het halen van een lekker buitenlands gerecht is hier makkelijk te doen. Grieks, Perzisch, Turks (Istanbul), Chinees, Indisch (Ramna), Italiaans, Japans, Surinaams, Afrikaans en natuurlijk Nederlands eten is hier vaak op 5 minuten loopafstand / makkelijk te vinden.

KOFFIE EN THEELIEFHEBBERS
Voor koffieliefhebbers is Florencia (Italian Icecream) voor de deur. Coffie Company is weer te vinden op 250 meter loopafstand van huis terwijl Boon (koffiebranderij) met verschillende soorten koffie uit verschillende landen  zich op maar 50 meter loopafstand bevindt. Het bezoeken van Lola Bikes & Coffee aan het Noordeinde zorgt zonder meer voor een onvergetelijke ervaring. 
Natuurlijk kan je ook een bakkie koffie thuis zetten met Bialetti Moka Induction mokapot voor 3 kops. Zowel koffie als thee is gratis voor gebruik. 

AUTO PARKEREN
Voor mensen die laat komen of het te druk hebben met hun planning kan geheel kosteloos een bezoekers parkeerkaart gebruikt worden. Deze kaart heeft een beperkt aantal uren dus voor mensen met meer tijd is er mogelijkheid om hun auto ook gratis te parkeren op 15 minuten loopafstand van mijn huis met uitzicht op leuke bezienswaardigheden zoals Vredespaleis, Anna Paulona-straat, Koninklijke stallen en de Paleistuin.

description:
This 2 floor appartment is located at walking distance from Den Haag Centraal Station, stone trow away from the high ways and just right next to the city forest 'Haagse Bos.'

1st floor: relax living area with huge dual kitchen with terras to sit outside. A spare room has a 1x single bed with it's own balcony. Toilets at both floors.

The space

Guest access
all

License number
0518 A942 63FF E789 F234
neighborhood_overview: This street is just the best; food, coffee, nice shops ...you will find it all!
host_about:
I  am Dutch Horticulture lecturer; often traveling to visit farmers worldwide.  I have lived in Kenya and South Africa before so I know what it takes to built up a life somewhere else. 
Secondly I am a swim school owner too ;  we teach adults how to swim in case they fear the water. Most of them are none Dutch. That makes me involved with the expat community which I enjoy a lot.

Airbnb offers me the opportunity to travel countries and feel a bit as a local at the same time. 
In return I love to host visitors . I rent out the whole house while I am away myself.  Or I lent out the spare room to a student for a couple of weeks. I enjoy sharing and having that energy  in my place . I try to help out if needed but am too busy to act as a tour guide etc. The student has her own space & freedom while living with me.

name: Spacious house in central Den Haag
description:
A comfortable, light, modern 130 m² house in a popular neighbourhood next to the city center. Around the corner are dozens of design/vintage shops, coffee places and restaurants. The city center is at 5 minutes walking distance, and the beach is 15 minutes away by bike or tram.

The space
The house has four floors. The layout is as follows:

Ground floor:
Home office, toilet and storage room (with washing machine).

1st floor:
Living room and kitchen (with stove, oven, microwave and dishwasher). The dining table seats 6. There's no TV, but there's a video projector.

2nd floor:
Two bedrooms and the bathroom with shower and bath. One of the bedrooms is also the entrance to the terrace at the back of the house.

3rd floor:
Big bedroom and entrance to a small terrace at the front of the house where you can privately sit in the sun on summer afternoons and evenings.

Guest access
You'll
neighborhood_overview:
The house is in a kind of artistic neighbourhood ("Zeeheldenkwartier") next to the city center. It's popular among expats and young creative people. Around the corner are many second hand shops, coffee places and restaurants (including several great vegetarian ones).

Den Haag is the third biggest city in The Netherlands and it's located right at the coast ( = beach :)). Den Haag is an ideal base to visit Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Utrecht or the historical town center of Delft.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Lisa! I was born in Delft but i've been living in Den Haag for almost 20 years now. I work as a freelance graphic designer / web developer. I love music, maps, good vegetarian food, hiking, cycling and rock climbing. I don't smoke and i think of myself as a responsible person :)

I've been active on Airbnb and Home Exchange for several years now. I enjoy meeting and hosting travelers: it's always interesting to meet people from other countries!

License number
0518 18D6 E8D9 8211 84F7
neighborhood_overview: Its a lovely multicultural district with old and young, rich and poor,  lots of shops, restaurants and pubs and few small theaters too.
host_about:
Wij zijn Mirjam en Nico en verhuren onze bovenverdieping van ons Haagse Herenhuis uit 1899. De gasten geven aan dat zij de kamers  huiselijk, comfortabel en sfeervol vinden.Het keukentje geeft extra gemak en het balkon geeft vooral in de zomer de mogelijkheid om van de zon te genieten. Het huis heeft leuke authentieke details. De 2 BnB kamers liggen op de 2e etage en zijn  te bereiken via het trappenhuis met 2 trappen. 
De gasten hebben veel privacy.
De locatie is nabij centrum en strand . Een buslijn en tramlijn op 3 minuten  loopafstand gaan direct naar strand,  binnenstad, markt, stations,Scheveningen en Loosduinen .  De loopafstand naar centrum of Zuiderstrand en haven is rond de 25 minuten. Er zijn veel restaurantjes, café's en winkels in de directe omgeving. Evenals  verschillende theaters en musea.  Een culturele agenda is aanwezig .
Het huis staat in een levendige multiculturele wijk waar de bewoners een kleurrijke mix vormen van jong en oud, studenten en gezinnen, arm en rijk. Geen chique wijk maar wel heel sfeervol, een z.g.n. artiestenwijk. De wijk is rond 1900 gebouwd met een afwisselend straatbeeld.
Parkeren: Tot 18.00 uur kun je gratis parkeren. Tussen 18.00 en 24.00 uur kost het €1.70 per uur. Op 10-15 minuten loopafstand kun je de auto 24 uur gratis parkeren.
Ontbijten: Om de prijs laag te houden is die exclusief ontbijt.


Mirjam en Nico houden van alle dansbare muziek: soul, disco, funk, jazz, salsa, 

 Favoriete vakantielanden: Griekenland en Frankrijk
Natuur: Fietsen en wandelen door Nederland
Eten: gevarieerd

Ons levensmotto: Lachen is gezond.

We are Mirjam and Nico and have a nice refurnished town house with spacious rooms. It is a very nice home with many great authentic details. The 2 BnB rooms are on the 2nd floor by 2 flights of stairs. 
The guests have a lot of privacy. The floor has a private balcony on the South side, a concise kitchen and shower/toilet combination.
The location is close to city centre and Beach (Scheveningen). A bus line and tram line a 3-minute walk away going directly to beach or Center. The walking distance to centre or beach is around 25 minutes. There are many restaurants and shops in the immediate surroundings. As well as several theatres and museums. A cultural agenda is present.
The House is located in a lively multicultural area where residents form a colorful mix of young and old, students and families, rich and poor. The district is built around 1900 with a diverse street scene.
Parking: you can park for free until 18:00 PM. Between 18.00 and 24.00 costs € 1.70 per hour. On 10-15 minutes walking distance you can park your 24 hours for free.
Breakfast: in order to keep the price down is our tariff excluding breakfast.
You can order a breakfast for € 1250,-per adult and E7,50 per child.  If this is desired please request in advance.

Mirjam and Nico like all danceable music: soul, disco, funk, jazz, salsa,  Favorite holiday countries: Greece and France. Cycling and walking through Netherlands. Food: varied.

Our motto: laughing is healthy.

host_about:
Wij zijn Mirjam en Nico en verhuren onze bovenverdieping van ons Haagse Herenhuis uit 1899. De gasten geven aan dat zij de kamers  huiselijk, comfortabel en sfeervol vinden.Het keukentje geeft extra gemak en het balkon geeft vooral in de zomer de mogelijkheid om van de zon te genieten. Het huis heeft leuke authentieke details. De 2 BnB kamers liggen op de 2e etage en zijn  te bereiken via het trappenhuis met 2 trappen. 
De gasten hebben veel privacy.
De locatie is nabij centrum en strand . Een buslijn en tramlijn op 3 minuten  loopafstand gaan direct naar strand,  binnenstad, markt, stations,Scheveningen en Loosduinen .  De loopafstand naar centrum of Zuiderstrand en haven is rond de 25 minuten. Er zijn veel restaurantjes, café's en winkels in de directe omgeving. Evenals  verschillende theaters en musea.  Een culturele agenda is aanwezig .
Het huis staat in een levendige multiculturele wijk waar de bewoners een kleurrijke mix vormen van jong en oud, studenten en gezinnen, arm en rijk. Geen chique wijk maar wel heel sfeervol, een z.g.n. artiestenwijk. De wijk is rond 1900 gebouwd met een afwisselend straatbeeld.
Parkeren: Tot 18.00 uur kun je gratis parkeren. Tussen 18.00 en 24.00 uur kost het €1.70 per uur. Op 10-15 minuten loopafstand kun je de auto 24 uur gratis parkeren.
Ontbijten: Om de prijs laag te houden is die exclusief ontbijt.


Mirjam en Nico houden van alle dansbare muziek: soul, disco, funk, jazz, salsa, 

 Favoriete vakantielanden: Griekenland en Frankrijk
Natuur: Fietsen en wandelen door Nederland
Eten: gevarieerd

Ons levensmotto: Lachen is gezond.

We are Mirjam and Nico and have a nice refurnished town house with spacious rooms. It is a very nice home with many great authentic details. The 2 BnB rooms are on the 2nd floor by 2 flights of stairs. 
The guests have a lot of privacy. The floor has a private balcony on the South side, a concise kitchen and shower/toilet combination.
The location is close to city centre and Beach (Scheveningen). A bus line and tram line a 3-minute walk away going directly to beach or Center. The walking distance to centre or beach is around 25 minutes. There are many restaurants and shops in the immediate surroundings. As well as several theatres and museums. A cultural agenda is present.
The House is located in a lively multicultural area where residents form a colorful mix of young and old, students and families, rich and poor. The district is built around 1900 with a diverse street scene.
Parking: you can park for free until 18:00 PM. Between 18.00 and 24.00 costs € 1.70 per hour. On 10-15 minutes walking distance you can park your 24 hours for free.
Breakfast: in order to keep the price down is our tariff excluding breakfast.
You can order a breakfast for € 1250,-per adult and E7,50 per child.  If this is desired please request in advance.

Mirjam and Nico like all danceable music: soul, disco, funk, jazz, salsa,  Favorite holiday countries: Greece and France. Cycling and walking through Netherlands. Food: varied.

Our motto: laughing is healthy.

name: Bungalow in de prachtige Haagse duinen!
description:
Stevige strandwandelingen, een rustig, groot strand, gezellige strandtenten in het seizoen, prachtige fietsroutes, bruisend Den Haag, koninklijk Den Haag… Alles is onder handbereik vanuit SEA SKY!
Ons vakantiehuis heeft absoluut de mooiste ligging van Den Haag: vrij gelegen tegen de duinen aan de zuidwestelijke grens van Den Haag en de buitengrens van Kijkduinpark in beschermd Natura 2000-gebied. Alles voor een comfortabele en relaxte vakantie vindt u in SEA SKY!

Guest access
Op circa 15 minuten lopen bevindt zich bushalte 'kijkduin', hier stoppen bus 23 (mei t/m augustus), 24 en 26.

Vanuit het park heeft u direct toegang tot het uitgebreide fietsnetwerk van Nederland.

Parkeren van de auto kan op het terrein aan de voorzijde van het vakantiepark. Parkeren voor de bungalow is niet toegestaan, met uitzondering van laden en lossen.

name: Spacious loft in historic mansion
description:
This historic mansion was renovated in 2013 with great sense for detail. At the top floor an independent apartment was created that is a perfect place for a wonderful stay in The Hague. In a quiet street. Beach, shops, museums and restaurants nearby.

The space
HIGH SPEED INTERNET / WIFI

This loft type apartment is at the fourth floor, right below the original wooden ceiling, which makes it particularly cozy. At the same time the height and the light from the windows gives it a feeling of space.

The apartment is rectangular and is naturally divided into a sitting and sleeping area by one of the wooden beams that supports the ceiling. A door gives way to your own bathroom with a marble basin, a shower and a toilet.

All linens are provided, also for the kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen and living area have beautiful solid wooden floors that need to be kept dry.

Guest access
Facilities:
• ADSL internet
neighborhood_overview:
Located between the beach and the city centre Duinoord is a quiet historic residential area. The apartment is at walking distance from the Peace Palace (five minutes) and other international organisations.

I love living in Duinoord. You should go and eat herring in the traditional shopping street around the corner, visit the large collection of Mondrian paintings at the Gemeentemuseum, read your book at the beautifully kept Sweelinckplein and enjoy the restaurants and home decoration shops of the Zeehelden district. All at walking distance.

You can also ride a bike for ten minutes to Scheveningen beach or to the city centre, ten minutes the other way.
host_about:
Thank you for viewing my listing! I would like to tell you that I am married to Sebastian. He is interim manager for IT-projects and we have two children of school going age. 

We are living/working in the same house as the loft and the studio. At the ground floor we have made our office. At the fourth floor we have made two apartments. Nearby, we are also renting out two furnished two bedroom apartments to people who are going to live in the Netherlands for several months or longer. 

I work at the Netherlands Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Sebastian and I have traveled quite a bit. Now, I am fully enjoying the Netherlands and I hope that you will do the same.

The colorful areas and the surprising interior gives you a warm welcome and it even feels cosy during the coldest days. We offer 138 beds in different dormitories and 6 double rooms. So you can rent 150 beds and organize you own private party ;-)



The Jorcrew will always be around for questions, a chat, cleaning, tapping a beer, BBQ or to bake a delicious Flammkuchen Pizza!

The Keizerstraat is located in the old part of Scheveningen, so it's a characteristic part with old Dutch houses and loads of shops. It's between the harbour and the Pier. The boulevard and the beach are just a 3 minute walk from our hostel. Most perfect place in town!

Public transport is around the corner and will bring you to city centre and the train stations. Free parking is just a 3 minute walk and Rotterdam/ The Hague Airport is just 40 minutes by car and Schiphol Airport 50 minutes.

Prince, our lovely cat is happy to welcome you!

Geniet van de rust en wordt wakker in een groot bed in een prachtig huis in Voorburg. Ik verhuur deze ruimte alleen voor minimaal een week of langer.
Het huis wordt gedurende de week regelmatig schoongemaakt. ook de deurknoppen en lichtknopjes en knoppen van de keukenkastjes.

Enjoy the peace and quiet and wake up in a large bed in a beautiful house in Voorburg. I only rent this space for a minimum of a week or longer.
The house is cleaned regularly during the week everywhere

The space
De ruimte is een origineel huis uit 1930, de vloer en ramen en tegels zijn nog origineel uit deze tijd. Het huis heeft een nieuwe keuken en badkamer. De achtertuin is rustig en in de zomer kunt u heerlijk op het terras zitten. De buurt is rustig en beschaafd.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview: het is een rustige buurt vlakbij uitvalswegen. host_about: Hallo ik ben Mirjam en ik heb mijn huis prachtig opgeknapt om mijn huurders een mooie tijd te geven tijdens hun verblijf in mijn huis. Sinds vorig jaar is er dubbel glas geplaatst en een nieuwe keuken. . Mijn gasten zijn altijd erg tevreden met mijn huis omdat het groot is en er een fijne sfeer hangt. Respect voor elkaar en andermans spullen staan bij mij hoog in het vaandel. Omdat ik mijn huis graag voor langere termijn verhuur, vind ik het belangrijk dat de gasten goed met elkaar overweg moeten kunnen. Dat lukt tot nu toe prima zolang de huisregels worden nageleefd

name: Great City Appartment with Garden
description:
Private appartment in elegant neighbourhood with own front door and garden. Bedroom for 2, private bathroom with bathtub, living room with dinertable for 6, couch that turns into bed for 2, kitchen, lovely quiet garden with rocking bench. 1-4 guests.

The space
What makes this place unique, other than the light and clean appartment itself? The garden, the excellent location and easy travel facilities.

The Bezuidenhout area and the Beatrix business district host many companies like Siemens, CB&I, World Trade Center (WTC), Nationale Nederlanden, PostNL, BAM International, NWO, SDU, NVWA, Deloitte, MN, FNLI, NACO, AT&T, FMO Bank, Q8. The area is also known for its popular shopping street Theresiastraat, offering a wide variety of shops and restaurants. The modern public transport network is easy accessible and offers fast and reliable connections to other areas of The Hague as well as to Amsterdam, Rotterdam and Leiden.

B&B Parra-dise is part o
neighborhood_overview: Bezuidenhout is a quiet and very pleasant, calm and relaxed neighbourhood, just outside the city centre. At an 10 minute walk from the apartment there is a street with supermarkets, bakery and all kinds of other shops. Restaurants, both for extensive dining and for fast food, are situated at a stone's throw distance from the house.
host_about:
After travelling in various countries I know how important a welcoming, nice, clean place to stay is. I want to do my best to provide the same for my guests. Welcome in our house!

It is my experience that being in another country, in another culture, allows you to see your own life and what happens in your own country / environment into perspective. 

For the B&B it is my preference that people rent for minimal 1 week, so it's possible to have guests next to my daily work. But don't hesitate to apply if you want to come only for a few days. If it fits, we'll be happy to welcome you!

Apart from Dutch, we can attend you in English, Spanish, German and French. Looking forward to seeing you soon in beautiful The Hague!

name: Grosse, helle, ruhige Wohnung, 5min vom Meer
description:
Mindestmietzeit: 3 Monate Sehr ruhige, helle, große (70qm) 3- Zi.-Wohnung in typisch alt-holländischem Haus mit Balkon und steiler Treppe. Besonders für berufliche Aufenthalte geeignet. Es ist eine ruhige Wohngegend mit kleinen Geschäften in Scheveningen - dem Strandviertel von Den Haag. 15min in die Innenstadt und zur Nato, 20min zum Gerichtshof oder Interpol. Gemütlich eingerichtet, zwischen skandinavisch, marokkanischem und Natur, nicht überfrachtet. Freundliche, sichere Nachbarschaft.

The space
Die unmittelbare Nähe zum Meer lädt zu schönen Spaziergängen und einem phänomenalen Beachleben im Sommer ein. Die Dünen bieten Rad- und Joggingsportlern die ideale Landschaft. Kulturgeniesser bietet Den Haag aber auch die Nähe zu Rotterdam und Amsterdam sehr viele Optionen. Delft ist mit der Tram zu erreichen. Es gibt einen Reichtum an Restaurants ob italienische, surinamsische, indonesische, japanische uva Küchen. Es gibt Märkte mit Obst-, Gemüse-,Fisch- und Fleisch
neighborhood_overview:
Eine gute Wohngegend mit kleinen Geschäften wie das "Kaashius," Bäcker, Fleischer, Fischladen, DonnerstagsMarkt. Die Wohnung liegt in einer ruhigen kleinen Seitenstrasse im 1. Stock eines typischen holländischen 2-stöckigen Hauses und typischer steiler Treppe. Auf der selben Etage gibt es 3 weitere Eingänge. Wir sind in gutem Kontakt mit den unmittelbaren Nachbarn. Der Fahrradverleih ist ca 15 Gehminuten von der Wohnung entfernt.
Im Sommer ist der Strand ein Erlebnis, der sundowner kann auf großen Sofas eingenommen werden
host_about: Ich bin Physiotherapeutin, Lehrerin für Qi Gong und biete intuitives Bogenschießen in der Nähe der Wohnung an. Ich lebe in Berlin und Den Haag, liebe die Natur, gehe gerne auf Flohmärkte und reise viel und gerne. Ausserdem liebe ich es Wohnungen einzurichten. Ich bin verheiratet und habe einen Sohn.

name: Cosy studio close to beach & center
description:
Our cosy studio has been created to enjoy a pleasant stay. With two free bikes it is possible to go either to the city center or the beach in 10 minutes. In the direct area you will find a nice variety of restaurants, retailers and a supermarket.

The space
This studio for 2 persons has everything you need to stay both in summer and winter time.

In order to save space we installed a wall-bed system for 2 persons. It is of great quality (25 cm thick mattress with European slatted system) and is located in the living room. The wall-bed spring mechanism gives easy access, without having to make the bed. After sleep just fold the bed including the bed linen and you're done. Another space saver is the folding table made from re-used wood.

It has an open kitchen with induction cooker system, a nespresso coffee system, an electric water cooker and a fridge with a freezing compartment.

The separate bathroom has a toilet, warm shower and
neighborhood_overview: Built in the 1920's, our area is one of the cosiest of The Hague with many restaurants, retailers and a supermarket and public transport.
host_about:
You will find us in the dunes whenever we have the opportunity, travelling either by bike or walk.  It's great to walk in the dunes and beach and stop for a drink at one of the beach clubs, which are available April through end October. In winter time, if we go for a walk at the beach, we warm up at one of the restaurants at one of the boulevards in Kijkduin or Scheveningen, which are open all year, or simply end up in de City Center.

We like to work out creative ideas for our house and bring them to reality. With this in mind we designed and built our studio and part of our furniture and hope that you will enjoy it as much as we do.

name: Chambres d'amis
description:
Spacious, bright and quiet loft apartment in the heart of the city center, around the corner from the cozy catering industry on the most beautiful canal in The Hague, an 8-minute walk from the international train station, 15 minutes from seaside.

The space
Our house consists of two apartments that have been merged into one house. To make it easy we have given the different rooms a number and some a name. You will find it with the photos indicated on the map.
On the second floor there is a living room with an adjacent south-facing balcony, the balcony room (2.1). the PIP bedroom for max 4 persons (2.2), an NB bedroom for 2 persons (2.3). There is a bathroom with rain shower and toilet (2.4), a separate toilet with bidet facility (2.5) and a cheerful vintage kitchen (2.6). We offer space from 1 to 5 people.

Ons huis bestaat uit twee appartementen die zijn samengevoegd tot één woning. Om het makkelijk te maken hebben we de verschillende ruimtes
neighborhood_overview:
Koninklijke wachtkamer sinds kort te bezichtigen voor het publiek. De Stationsbuurt behoort tot de buurten van Nederland die zijn omschreven als krachtwijk, prachtwijk, achterstandswijk en soms door mijn eigen dochter ook wel gekscherend the getto wordt genoemd. Als je van mensen houdt in al hun hoedanigheden,uit verschillende landen met hun gewoonten en gebruiken, het heerlijk vindt om eens rond te neuzen in hun winkels of te genieten van een heerlijke massage Turkse nekmassage bij de kapper die je oorharen in vuur en vlam zet, dan ben je hier zeker aan het goede adres.
Het appartementencomplex stamt uit de jaren dertig van de vorige eeuw en is ontworpen door Dirk Roosenburg, een vooraanstaand Nederlands architect, leerling van de beroemde architect Berlage. Het is één van de eerste sociale woningbouwprojecten waarin alle appartementen waren voorzien van centrale verwarming en een douche. Het water werd warm gestookt in het grote ketelhuis die, inclusief markante schoorsteen, nog

description:

Ruim gratis parkeren direct voor appartement, WIFI en eigen ingang. Ruime tuin voor roken en BBQ. Gelegen in een groot stadspark met openbaar vervoer in de directe omgeving. Strand, stad en park, museum en sportmogelijkheden. Wandelen of joggen in het park.

Prijs is inclusief City tax a €4.45 voor de 1 persoon. Voor elke extra gast kost dit 4.45 pppn.

The space
In een apparte aanbouw gelegen ruim appartement op de begane grond met eigen toegang, keuken, huiskamer, slaapkamer, zeer fijne badkamer en (gratis) parkeerplaats. In de tuin is ook heerlijk vertoeven. bij lekker weer bbq? genieten

Guest access
Entree hal naar appartement, huiskamer met keuken, bedbank, koffie en thee. Vanuit de huiskamer uitzicht op het park en toegang tot de slaapkamer. gezellige tuin met zitjes en lounge bank. Apa
neighborhood_overview: Het appartement is gelegen in een groot stadspark, lekker wandelen, hardlopen etc.  In de directe omgeving zijn alle voorzieningen zoals winkels en openbaar vervoer  aanwezig.
host_about: Wij zijn woonachtig in Den Haag en zijn ondernemende mensen. Wij hebben een AIR B&B appartement naast ons huis en een Beauty Salon. Ik werk als facilitair adviseur en interieur architect buitens huis. Wij hebben een paar leuke honden en zijn uit de kinderen. Regelmatig zitten wij in ons huis aan de Costa Blanca waar we ook een appartement verhuren. Kortom, druk maar genieten. Lekker eten drinken, reizen, vier het leven.

name: Nice cottage at the beach
description:
Cozy house with sunny front and backyard. It's a fun and friendly neighborhood. Near a shopping street with varied shops. Both the beach and the center are only ten minutes by bike.

The space
The garden is very beautifull and it's very enjoyable to be there. It is a very cozy house and for us its a daily pleasure to live here.The house is cozy and has a lot of atmosphere itself . The kitchen is our favorite place to cook together and to long dining. And to relax is the living room lovely with the fireplace and the big sofa.

Guest access
You have everywhere access to all leave , we will do a few wardrobes locked but certainly empty one in every space for your clothes .

Other things to note
Once in three days, you have to get the water tank out of the basement and empty into the garden . By hot weather I want to ask you to water the garden, that would be very nice.

License number
0518 F312 D186 E
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is located near the beach. It is a street with many shops and lunch options, it calls 'the Fahrenheitstraat'. You can visit the town museum and cycling to the Omniverse and Frederick Henry Street is a nice shopping area ten minutes away and of course you have to see the beach every day . The beach club 'strandtent op palen' in Monster is a nice place to go to . So also when you start your walking at beach club 'parker Beach' and go to the left, you can walk along a very beauiful part of the beach, the name is  'de zandmotor'. Their are a lot of kite surfers and view is very special. The bicycle path along the coast from Kijkduin to 'Hoek van Holland' is very beautiful. In the center of The Hague is also much to experience fun , a boat ride to the Ooievaart is quite nice and the Courtyard ('binnenhof'). The shopping area the 'denneweg'  with all the antique shops and on their is a square with nice cafes and entertainment in the evening.
host_about: I'm very happy with my family, my husband Frank and  our two adult children Merel en Jelle. I prefer to be outside all day, rain or shine. Preferably on the beach for a long walks or to exercise. It's always nice to hear the sea and watch the beautiful skies.  Love spontaneous things with friends, gardening and cooking.

name: Big Room incl. roof terrace
description:
Private Large bedroom (2 single boxsprings/beds) including a roof terrace at the back of the house (quiet). Private toilet.
Shared rooms with owner: bathroom including washbasin, shower and bath, kitchen, diningroom, corridor. Breakfast is possible!

The space
The house has situated in a quiet street very close to the center of The Hague, the beach and surrounded by various shopping streets.

The house has build in 1904 and had renovated into the original style including ornaments, ensuite doors in the diningroom and stained glass.

The beach is located 8 minutes by bike or 20 minutes walking. The center of The Hague has located about 10 minutes by tram or bike, or 20 minutes walking.

Guest access
The private rooms for the guest:
- bedroom (2 single beds) at the back of the house (calm).
- toilet

The shared rooms with owner:
- bathroom including washbasin, shower and bath
- kitchen inc
neighborhood_overview: The Neighborhood has a very calm atmosphere and offers various shopping streets, nice restaurants, pubs and it is located close to the center of The Hague and close to the beach.
host_about:
Hi,

My name is Guido. I'm a calm and friendly guy and i love hospitality. I live in The Hague for 7 years now and i love this city because of the beautiful beachlife. 

I can not live without the beachlife, kitesurfing, windsurfing and wavesurfing. I also like to go running or biking in the dunes and getting a cocktail at one of the lovely beachclubs. I love to give you a beachtour if you into that!

The center of the city is also an amazing spot with a lot of multi culture, lots of historic things to see, very good restaurants and many more to explore! A must  see for your experience!

I love traveling around the world while The Hague feels like holidays when i come home. 

I live in this house for 7 years and i have a beautiful room extra for airbnb.
The house has situated about 10 minutes from the middle of the center and 7 minutes on a bike from the beach, the dunes and woods.

name: Bizstay Harbour 10B
description:
Comfortable 1-bedroomapartement situated in the harbour of Scheveningen.

The space
This apartment is situated on the first floor (elevator present) and offers a view on the brand new venue of the Dutch Olympic Sailing Association.
The comfortable livingroom has a cosy seating area with flatscreen TV, a dining table that seats 4 guests and a kitchen, fully equipped with everything you need during your stay; pans, pots, crockery, cutlery, glasses, a Nespresso coffee machine, dishwasher, water kettle, toaster and an oven/microwave. From the living room you can access your own private balcony.
The quiet bedroom has a double bed than can be separated into two single beds. From the bedroom you can access to the bathroom with walk-in shower and double sink. Toilet is separate, as well as the washer and dryer.

This apartment comes with a private parking spot in the parking garage.

Guest access
You have the whole appartement to
neighborhood_overview: The address of this apartment is: Hellingweg 10B, 2583 WG, The Hague, situated in the apartmentcomplex ‘Nautisch Centrum’ in the second harbour of Scheveningen. host_about: It all started with an idea and three apartments in the year 2010. name: Spacious familyhouse incl. garden near sea/center
description:
Welcome in our light, cozy and spacious (270m2) familyhouse and sunny garden.

The house has everything you need for a terrific stay and nice parks, shops, cafe's and restaurants just around the corner. You reach the beach and city center in just 10 minutes. So make yourself at home,  enjoy the house, neighbourhood, The Hague and have a good time :-)

The space
Our sunny and spacious house has 3 floors and is build in 1897. In 2015 its fully renovated to the standards of nowadays. We like traveling, art, nature, comfort, cooking and fun with our family and friends and you will feel that atmosphere in te house.

The sunny house has a lounge area, dining area and big open luxury Bulthaup kitchen with doors to the sunny garden, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 1 balcony facing south. all floors have wooden oak floors. For children there are a lot of toys, 3 skate-bords and 1 step and a big trampoline in the garden.

The ground floor has a b
neighborhood_overview: The place where we live is called 'Duinoord'  and lies between the centre and the beach. There is a beautiful square called Sweelinckplein. All kind of thing to do are in the environment: groceries, coffee, lunch, diner, musea, the beach, parks are just around the corner.
host_about: Samen met Pascal, onze twee zonen en hond Cooper wonen we in Den Haag op de rand van Scheveningen. We houden van de stad, de zee en de natuur. De eerste twee vinden we in den Haag, de rust en natuur vooral in Drenthe in onze 2 boshuisjes. We houden van koken en lang tafelen met familie en vrienden, spelletjes, wandelen, lezen en een gezellig aangekleed huis. Dit zie je terug in alle huizen. We vinden het leuk onze huizen en de mooie omgeving te delen met anderen en verwelkomen jullie graag in Den Haag en Drenthe. Heb je een vraag over het huis of de omgeving, let me know :-)

description:
Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment (224m2) at the nicest ditrict in the Hague in the immediate vicinity of the lange Voorhout, central station, Fancy Denneweg, musea, shops, restaurants and overlooking the canal. Also close to the Beach (5 min by tram)

The livingroom is 100 m2 and have a lot of Seats to feel cosy.
The master bedroom has a open stairs to top floor bedroom so less privacy .

Guest access
Main entrance

Other things to note

2 bathrooms, 3 toilets, livingroom 100m2

This is the most beautiful old and central area in The Hague close to everywhere and everything
All kinds of restaurants are in this neighbourhood for breakfast/lunch and dinner.(10 meters distance)
host_about: Ik woon al weer meer dan 28 jaar in Den Haag en geniet nog steeds van deze mooie stad. Mijn 4 kinderen groeiden op in deze mooie hippe culturele en groene stad en ook nog eens vlakbij het strand. DenHaag is op alle gebieden een geweldige stad waar veel te doen is. Veel musea, mooie tentoonstellingen, een filmhuis, heerlijk shoppen prachtige architectuur, het parlement en de paleizen van de koninklijke familie zijn allemaal te bezichtigen. Ook het prachtige Vredespaleis is het bekijken waard. Er zijn ook vele restaurantjes  om het appartement heen, wat wil je nog meer.  In de zomer zit je heerlijk voor ons appartement  met een drankje te  genieten van de bootjes en de cultuur. Kortom een plek waar rust, cultuur, traditie maar ook een bruisende sfeer hangt. Wat wil je nog meer.

Leuk karakteristiek 'vissershuisje' op loopafstand van het strand, de boulevard van Scheveningen en de gezellige Keizerstraat. Het huisjes beschikt over twee verdiepingen waarvan de bovenverdieping de slaapverdieping is met twee slaapkamers.

Ruime living met aangrenzende keuken. Boven twee slaapkamers, een badkamer en balkon.

name: Fully equipped flat near the beach of The Hague!
description:
Mijn modern ingerichte appartement ligt in een leuke buurt in Den Haag Zuid. De duinen en het strand noem ik altijd mijn achtertuin ;-)
De ligging is zeer centraal. In directe omgeving vind je gezellige lunchrooms, supermarkten en diverse winkels. Het centrum van Den Haag is per fiets of met het openbaar vervoer zeer snel en makkelijk te bereiken. Een ideale uitvalsbasis voor een weekendje weg. In onderling overleg behoren andere data en tarieven zeker tot de mogelijkheden!

The space
Mijn jaren '30 appartement (portiekwoning op eerste verdieping) bestaat uit een modern ingerichte woonkamer en-suite, een compleet ingerichte keuken met een 6-pits Smeg gasfornuis/oven en een vaatwasser, een ruime slaapkamer met een heerlijke tweepersoons boxspring, een ruime douche, apart toilet, wasmachine en wasdroger.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
Een redelijk rustige buurt, vlakbij strand & de duinen. In de directe omgeving (Appelstraat en Vlierboomstraat) vind je diverse winkels en horecagelegenheden zoals een bakker, groenteboer, avondwinkel, buurtsupermarkt en restaurant Appels & Peren. Het is mogelijk om in de buurt gratis te parkeren. Alle details hierover vind je in mijn appartement. Direct voor de deur is het dagelijks betaald parkeren van 18.00 tot middernacht.

Het ruime winkelcentrum met gratis parkeergelegenheid aan het Savornin Lohmanplein (met onder andere een Albert Heijn, Aldi, kaasboer, Gall&Gall, Hema & drogisterij) vind je op slechts 700 meter.

De Reinkenstraat is ook een hele gezellige straat met diverse horecagelegenheden, maar daarvoor heb je echt het openbaar vervoer, auto of fiets nodig.

In de reisgids vind je al mijn favoriete locaties in de omgeving.
host_about:
Een sportieve, vrolijke vrouw die positief in het leven staat. Life's good is mijn motto ;-)
Ik houd van uitgaan, wijntjes drinken en lekker koken & eten. Om in balans te blijven sport ik bijna dagelijks: racefietsen, fitness, een rondje hardlopen over het strand en door de duinen.... Heerlijk! Natuurlijk ga ik ook graag op vakantie. Wintersport, weekendjes weg, een actieve fietsvakantie of gezellig met vriendinnen naar Ibiza; het kan allemaal!

Omdat ik in de weekenden vaak elders verblijf, verhuur ik mijn heerlijke appartement graag aan levensgenieters zoals ik. Het is modern ingericht, ruim, licht en van alle gemakken voorzien. Het strand en de duinen noem ik altijd mijn achtertuin; je bent er namelijk zo!

neighborhood_overview:
This place has a lot of possibilities in the middle of the city. You are right in the center with all the possibilities and sights around. Within a 5-minute walk you are in the palace garden (Paleistuin) and you will see our King's Palace while enjoying a walk in this garden. Behind the palace garden is the Royal stables which are open to the public on certain days. On the other side of the Peleistuin is the famous Noordeinde street with attractive shops for the sophisticated taste and on the other hand with endless numbers of pupil-inspiring galleries.

Within a 10-minute walk you will find the Escher Museum and enjoy its beautiful paintings in its detailed style with love for nature.

Panoramamesdag can not be missed either. Indulge all your senses through the greatest painting in the world.

The best of Dutch painting of the Golden Age is of course in Mauritshuis (5 minutes walking distance from your stay location).

The Binnenhof is the ol
host_about:
OVER MEZELF
Ik ben geboren in Oekraïne en ben trots op mijn moederland. Sinds 16 jaar geleden woon ik in Nederland (ingeschreven op november 2015) en ben dol op de mogelijkheden die dit (ik noem het mijn) vaderland aan mensen kan bieden. Vriendelijkheid, hardwerkende mentaliteit en discipline spreken me erg aan in Nederland. Ik hou even veel van die 2 prachtige landen.

WELKOM
In mijn huis voel je je gelijk op je gemak. Voel je je thuis en vergeet niet dat je op bezoek bent is mijn motto.

HET KOKEN IN HUIS OF BUITEN HUIS OM ETEN
Het delen van keuken en eetkamer gaat hier in samenwerking met elkaar. Ik kook op vaste tijdstippen: vaak om 17:00 uur. De tijd er voor of er na kan gebruikt worden voor het bereiden van je eigen maaltijd. Het halen van een lekker buitenlands gerecht is hier makkelijk te doen. Grieks, Perzisch, Turks (Istanbul), Chinees, Indisch (Ramna), Italiaans, Japans, Surinaams, Afrikaans en natuurlijk Nederlands eten is hier vaak op 5 minuten loopafstand / makkelijk te vinden.

KOFFIE EN THEELIEFHEBBERS
Voor koffieliefhebbers is Florencia (Italian Icecream) voor de deur. Coffie Company is weer te vinden op 250 meter loopafstand van huis terwijl Boon (koffiebranderij) met verschillende soorten koffie uit verschillende landen  zich op maar 50 meter loopafstand bevindt. Het bezoeken van Lola Bikes & Coffee aan het Noordeinde zorgt zonder meer voor een onvergetelijke ervaring. 
Natuurlijk kan je ook een bakkie koffie thuis zetten met Bialetti Moka Induction mokapot voor 3 kops. Zowel koffie als thee is gratis voor gebruik. 

AUTO PARKEREN
Voor mensen die laat komen of het te druk hebben met hun planning kan geheel kosteloos een bezoekers parkeerkaart gebruikt worden. Deze kaart heeft een beperkt aantal uren dus voor mensen met meer tijd is er mogelijkheid om hun auto ook gratis te parkeren op 15 minuten loopafstand van mijn huis met uitzicht op leuke bezienswaardigheden zoals Vredespaleis, Anna Paulona-straat, Koninklijke stallen en de Paleistuin.

neighborhood_overview: Het appartement ligt aan het Pomonaplein in de gezellige Vruchtenbuurt, vlakbij winkels, restaurants, strand, duin en bos.
host_about:
Den Haag is een heerlijke stad om te wonen. Afkomstig uit een klein dorp in Friesland woon ik al weer 25 jaar in Den Haag. Een stad met internationale allure, maar dorps tegelijk en het strand is nooit ver weg! Het appartement (wat ik dus niet zelf bewoon) maakt onderdeel uit van mijn ruime Haagse portiekwoning (1933), waardoor ik de gelegenheid heb om jullie gastvrij te ontvangen en te laten ervaren waarom dit zo'n fijne plek is. Zelf ben ik vaak te vinden in de duinen of het strand, lekker uitwaaien of zonnebaden, een drankje op het terras van een gezellige strandtent of op de boulevard van Kijkduin of Scheveningen.

Hi, I'm Nienke and I live already over 25 years in The Haque, a beautiful city, with a lot of history, the beach and easy to reach the rest of Holland by Public Transport. I'll  be happy to have you as my guests and  will do my best to make your stay as comfortable as possible, so you'll be having a wonderful time.

name: 4 floor luxury canal house + garden
description:
In historic centre of The Hague a 4-story 19th century mansion overlooking two canals. It is refurbished, sunny, with exclusive African art. 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and a study. It has a sizable garden for the summer & 2 cosy fireplaces for winter.

The space
Often houses at the canals are split into various parts: but this house is in one part, right in the centre of the Hague. It is well isolated, solar-powered and extremely charming.

Guest access
The guests can access the entire house. In some instances (and after discussion) the au-pair might be in the house to accompany you and help you out.

Other things to note
You can use our wireless internet, use the coffee, tea and other essentials you will find in the fridge!

neighborhood_overview: We are at the residential side of the centre. There is a nice square in front of our house with a lot of pigeons and people feeding them. There are a lot of flowers and people at the square and you can observe this all from close-by from the living room! If you prefer the quiteness, the garden is an ocean of peace in the city centre!

name: B&B holiday beach room
description:
Lovely beach room just 2 minutes walking to dunes and beach.

The space
In this lovely beach apartment you can find everything you need to enjoy a light and carefree holiday/weekend. The apartment has 2 bedrooms, of which I rent one as bed&breakfast. The room has a double bed that can turn in 2 single beds as well. The sleeping room connects to a cozy living room. The sleeping area with living room will be your private space. You will also have acces to shower and toilet; a fully equipped kitchen with oven and dishwasher. In the back there is a sunny balcony where you can enjoy your cup of coffee and where you can light the barbeque for some nice grill sessions. The house has a excellent internet connection.

The apartment is situated 2 minutes walking from dunes and beach. The natural reserved protected dunes and parks in the surroundings are absolutely stunning for long walks, running and bike rides. In front of the door there is a bus stop that takes

name: Private bedroom, Luxurious floor, Centre The Hague
description:
In lively area of Bezuidenhout I offer a renovated etage on the fourth floor, equipped with new facilities and situated just around the corner of a shopping area, supermarket across the street. No kitchen, however microwave, Nespresso machine and water cooker available. Two railway stations on walking distance. The airport Schiphol is only 29 minutes by train. Amsterdam central station is only 48 minutes by train. Public transport is very close to my house. The center is on walking distance.

The space
A masterbedroom with a super comfortable new kingsize bed 1.80 x 2.00 (Auping). There's also a lovely living area with two sofas, a fridge and a brand new HD tv with lots of channels. No kitchen available, but there's a microwave, Nespresso machine and a water boiler. Supermarket and take away options are around the corner.

The bathroom has recently been renovated and has a bath, separate rain-shower and a toilet.

Optionally, there is a second
