description:
Fully independent apartment on the 38th floor of The Hague Tower, welcome to The Penthouse Apartments on Top of the City. Enjoy stunning views of city of The Hague and the coastline, all the way up to Hook of Holland.

Enjoy your comfortable skyscraper home! Includes comfortable double bed, Samsung Smart-TV and Nespresso machine.

The space
Amazing apartment on one of the top floors (38th) of The Hague Tower. This is apartment 770. Enjoy stunning views of city of The Hague and the coastline, all the way up to Hook of Holland.

Central location right next to The Hague HS station. The city centre is within walking (10mins) distance. Living room with bedroom, open kitchen and bathroom with soft bath towels. Perfect for a night or longer stay in The Hague, your own skyscraper apartment!

The tower also features a business lounge with free access and a basic fitness facility (free entrance). New York's famous flatiron building served as t
neighborhood_overview:
We are close to the city centre, it's just a 10 minute walk! There are many interesting restaurants and shops nearby, all within walking distance. There is public transportation hub right in front of the Tower with connections to places both in- and outside The Hague. In this authentic The Hague neighborhood you will be able to feel like a local.

We will supply you with a digital guide with some of our best recommendations.

name: Arty, spacious, big garden and near beach&center
description:
Mijn ruimte is vlakbij het strand en het centrum van Den Haag en een leuke winkelstraat met restaurants en bijzondere winkels. Het is een lichte en comfortabele woning met veel kunstzinnige details en alle kenmerken van een woning uit 1910. De woning heeft een grote en zonnige tuin. Mijn ruimte is geschikt voor stellen, zakenreizigers en gezinnen met oudere kinderen ( vanaf 8 jaar).

The space
De ruimte bestaat uit de begane grond verdieping met een grote huiskamer van 13 meter lang ( met schuifseparatie), een open tuin en openslaande deuren naar de tuin. Op de tweede verdieping bevindt zich een grote slaapkamer met een serre met planten ( aan tuinkant), een grote slaapkamer aan de straatzijde en nog een kleinere slaapkamer. Op deze verdieping is ook een badkamer met ligbad, douche cabine en wasmachine en droogtrommel.

Other things to note
Ruimte wordt gedeeld met Katharina.

Lovely appartment in one of the most populair neighbourhoods "the Archipel" in The Hague,
7 minutes by tram or bus to the beach in Scheveningen or Central station, walking distance to lots of nice restaurants and cafes also nearby lovely shopping streets and most of the touristic hot spots including Vredespaleis, Lange Voorhout, Mauritshuis,Gemeente Museum,Hofvijver and Madurodam.

shower and toilet, washmachine, cosy kitchen with all you need( dishwasser , microwafe, blender,

Wifi and telivision

name: Whole upperfloor in Characteristic 1912 mansion
description:
The characteristic rooms on the top floor are located in one of the most beautiful neighbourhoods of The Hague. Within walking distance from the beach, this quiet street is the perfect spot to get around in this fantastic city. The house is a traditional Dutch architecture mansion, built in 1912.

The space
The rooms are bright and on the top floor of a traditional, 1912 built, Dutch mansion. The tree rooms and the house are full of character. You just share the stairs with me, the top floor where there is your sleeping rooms, kitchen/shower, a newly built small bathroom ( second shower and and a sink), toilet and balcony. The kitchen is small but fully equipped with fridge, microwave, coffee machine... If you miss items you can always ask and get it. The balcony is large and sunny in the afternoon and end of the day.
There is a table for 7 to eat in the largest room .
There is a baby bed available and children under five are free of charge.
neighborhood_overview:
- 20 minutes walk to the beach
- 15 minutes by bicycle or tram to the inner city
- beautiful local area with traditional Dutch architecture
- very close to museums, omniversum, international court of justice
- within 5 minutes walking distance there are nice pubs, restaurants, coffee places, shops and grocery stores.

name: Amazing bright room+ bedroom at The DanckertHouse
description:
Private living room and bedroom, bright and fully furnished to make you feel at home at "The DanckertHouse", which is located in one of the best neighbourhoods (Statenkwartier) of The Hague.
Excellent as a base for professionals who plan to stay long term, as the stay can be extended for longer term, if available.
We require a minimum of 90 nights stay.

The space
Feel at home in your cosy private double room, while enjoying your stay in The Hague. Both rooms are very bright, with large windows and overlook the gardens across the street.

The characteristic old-style house is located in the Danckertsstraat in a peaceful neighbourhood, while still very close to the city centre and lively "Fred" shopping street.

Guest access
- Fully furnished private living room (22m2) + Bedroom (7m2)
- Kitchen shared with one
- Bathroom shared with one
- Private sink in the room
- Fast wireless internet, cable TV
neighborhood_overview:
Statenkwartier is one of the best neigbourhoods of The Hague / Den Haag. Many expats live in this area and enjoy the wellknown "Fred" (Frederik Hendrik) shopping street (5 min walk away).
Several grocery stores, restaurants and a bar are at the streetcorner. A supermarket is a five minutes walk away.
The city centre and the beach can be reached in ten minutes by bus or by bike.

name: Gezin, vrijstaand, onafhankelijk, strand
description:
Onze vrijstaande vakantiewoning 'Haags Duinhuis' gelegen in Den Haag/ Kijkduin; Gerenoveerd in 2016, compleet uitgeruste keuken, sauna, openhaard, 3 slaapkamers, 2 badkamers, waarvan 1 met bad, zonnig terras waar tot laat de zon komt, rook en huisdiervrij. Gelegen op het kindvriendelijk Kijkduinpark, met binnenzwembad, 600 meter van het strand, 1 km via de duinennaar de gezellige boulevard van Kijkduin, 9km naar het centrum van Den Haag, mooie fietsroutes naar Delft, Rotterdam, Hoek van Holland.

The space
De woning is ideaal voor gezinnen en families die met (groot) ouders reizen. Je bent helemaal op jezelf, maar kan eventueel de gezelligheid en voorzieningen van het park opzoeken.
Deze gezinsvriendelijke vakantiewoning telt 110 m2 ruimte; 3 slaapkamers, Sauna, 2 badkamers, grote woonkamer en eetgedeelte. De keuken is compleet uitgerust met een combimagnetron, 4 pits kooktoestel en een prima koelkast. Er is een terras op het Zuiden en één terras op het Ooste
neighborhood_overview: Gelegen op recreatiepark Kijkduinpark, een golfbaan ernaast en een natuurgebied om doorheen te fietsen/wandelen. In de duinen van Den Haag/ Kijkduin en dichtbij de stad om ook op regenachtige dagen leuke activiteiten te kunnen ondernemen.

name: Colourful spacious house with garden, near beach.
description:
This is a perfect spot to spend a quiet holiday at the beach in a popular neighbourhood.
Shops, supermarket and restaurants are walking distance. Our home is very colourful, made with ecological materials. The garden is south-west, you can relax in the sun all day. In the garden are some raspberries, apples, grapes and a small vegetable garden. The beach is 15 min by foot, 8 minutes cycling or 5 min by tram!
Our home is very suitable for families with children at any age or for a couple.

The space
Our home and neighbourhood are very quiet, yet many services are only 5 tot 10 minutes by foot.
For small children our home is safe en we have a lot of things to play with for children up to 8 years old, especially girls. For older children and adults we have a big amount of books and also dvd's. We have a piano where you can play on. In winter you can enjoy the fire in our living room and experience the comfort of floor-heating in another part of t
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighbourhood is called the tree-neighbourhood. There are many different trees in this area and every street has the name of a tree.
It's very popular, the atmosphere is friendly and lively, there are shops and restaurants, yet at the same time it's very quiet. Location close to the beach makes it one of the most popular neighbourhoods. Lots of international people live here.

Your own apartment on 2nd floor in this beautiful building!

name: Family home by beach and dunes  - design kitchen
description:
Our family home is located right behind the dunes of the nature reserve of Westduinpark giving access to the beautiful wide sandy beach, Our beach is only an 8 minute walk away and is a quiet beach with only a few beach restaurants. For more lively beaches Scheveningen or Kijkduin are only a few KM away. Our house is modern and comfortable and located in the quiet, green quarter the Vogelwijk, a family friendly area in the city of The Hague. Our home is only suitable for families with children.

The space
The house is a 3 story house built in 1933.
On the ground floor you have the hallway, a vanity room with toilet. The kitchen and living room are open plan and measure appr. 40 sqm. The kitchen is a design Bulthaup kitchen with Gaggenau appliances like dishwasher, separate Qooker (r) (boiling water from the tap), gas cooker with 5 hobs, freezer with 4 drawers, XL fridge (170x58 cm), conventional oven with pizza stone (275 C) and steam oven. By the kitchen w
neighborhood_overview: The Vogelwijk is a green and family friendly neighborhood by the beach. The Vogelwijk is a unique area as it has a "village-feel" but is located in the city of The Hague.
host_about: We are a family of four who love to travel. We love the mountains and the sea. We rent out our vacation homes on Bonaire in the Dutch Caribean and on Bali in Sumberkima Hill (via management company). When we are enjoying a vacation we rent out our home in the Netherlands as well.

name: Ruim gezinshuis dichtbij strand
description:
Op het randje van het centrum én in de buurt van het strand, daar staat ons gezellige ruime gezinshuis. In onze rustige straat of in de tuin kan er volop gespeeld worden. Met het OV (openbaar vervoer) ben je in 10 min in het centrum van Den Haag. Zeer centraal gelegen en met 30-45 minuten ben je zo in Delft, Rotterdam, Amsterdam. Rotterdam (The Hague Airport) is dichtstbijzijnde vliegveld.

The space
Willen jullie lekker een avond thuisblijven? Dan is onze lichte, moderne keuken voorzien van alle gemakken. Zo is er een oven, een magnetron en een 6 pits gasfornuis beschikbaar. En voor de fanatieke bbq-ers onder ons, is de zonnige, beschutte tuin met bbq ideaal.
Naast de ruime woonkamer met open keuken is er 1 grote slaapkamer (2 persoonsbed), 2 kamers met tweepersoonsbed (twijfelaar 140cm breed) en 1 kamer met 1 persoonsbed, waarvan het bed uit te schuiven is naar een 2 persoonsbed. Op dezelfde verdieping bevindt zich de badkamer met bad, douche en 2e toilet.
neighborhood_overview:
Zin in het strand? Pak gerust onze fietsen, waarmee je in tien minuten bij het strand aankomt, voor een "bakkie", lunch of een hapje eten bij een van de vele leuke strandtenten.
In de buurt zijn kleine winkeltjes en restaurantjes te vinden. Een grotere supermarkt ligt in het nabijgelegen winkelcentrum.

name: Scheveningen, 100 m beach, luxe family house
description:
Groot familiehuis met tuin in Scheveningen inclusief alle luxe voorzieningen geschikt voor een gezin met maximaal 3 kinderen. Geen vriendengroepen! Beddengoed, handdoeken, koffie/thee, alles staat klaar! Bewoners verhuren het huis (incidenteel) tijdens eigen vakantie. Op steenworpafstand van het strand, de boulevard, het circustheater en de gezellige terrasjes. Tram en bus naar Den Haag centrum en centraal station zijn vlakbij.

The space
Our family beachhouse in Scheveningen have 2 double beds and 1 single bed and has all the amenities including a spacious living room, luxury kitchen with seating / TV, 2 spacious two / three person bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and each floor has its own separate toilet. Linnen, towels, coffee, tea, etcetera everything is included! Only suitable for a family with a maximum of three kids. Not suitable for a group of friends. The villa is available only during vacations of the owners.

Ons huis heeft in de verhuurperiode 2 twee
neighborhood_overview:
If you look at the map you can already see it, our house is a stone's throw from the beach and the boulevard. It has the perfect location for water sports enthusiasts or to explore Scheveningen (on foot)! By bike you can make beautiful trips to the beautiful beaches in the area. Think of Wassenaar, Katwijk, Noordwijk and Kijkduin. And The Hague center can be reached by tram / bus in about 10 minutes.

Als je op de kaart kijkt zie je het al, ons huis ligt op een steenworp afstand van het strand en de boulevard. Het heeft dé perfecte ligging voor watersporters of om Scheveningen (lopend) te verkennen! Per fiets kunt u prachtige tochten maken naar de mooie stranden in de omgeving. Denkt u aan Wassenaar, Katwijk, Noordwijk en Kijkduin. En Den Haag centrum is met tram/bus binnen ongeveer 10 minuten te bereiken.
host_about: Hallo. Met ons gezin gaan we zo nu en dan een weekend op pad. Die dagen verhuren we ons eigen huis aan zee aan een gezin met maximaal 3 kinderen. Wees welkom in ons waanzinnige huis, alles staat klaar voor een heerlijk strandweekend!

name: Quiet forest home - retreat for your family
description:
Wonderful family home on the outskirts of The Hague and Delft! Four bedrooms and two bathrooms, garden with swing set and lounge chairs. Sleeps up to 6 people. Near forest with walking trails, bike paths and lakes. Quiet neighbourhood with free parking and lots of playgrounds.

Central location for discovering The Netherlands: 10 minutes to Delft, The Hague city and beach, 20 minutes to Gouda, Rotterdam and flower fields, 45 minutes to Amsterdam. Easy access to highways and public transport.

The space
Welcome to our house!

We love the house because of the large space and the ideal location. It is a great place for families and provides everything for adults and kids: private parking on the property, large living room, fully equipped kitchen with American fridge, 2 tv's, 4 large bedrooms, jacuzzi, 2nd bathroom, swing set in backyard, Weber BBQ, arts & crafts table, balcony with view, and many other things.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is easily accessible and is located in a very quiet area with canals, walking trails and bike paths. There are a lot of young families and it is low traffic. It is perfect for a relaxing stay with your family, while still being close to major cities and landmarks. The neighborhood is only 15 years old and consists of typical Dutch row houses and free standing houses. It is a very comfortable and safe living environment.
host_about:
I live with my two kids and in beautiful The Hague, The Netherlands. On the weekends we love to venture out and go to the beach or go for walks or bikerides. When we travel we like to do roadtrips in Europe and are avid users of Airbnb during these trips.

We are very proud of our house and take great pride in maintaining it. Welcome!

name: Beach & City Family House w Garden & Bikes
description:
Our family home is a 3-story house built in 1905, completely renovated in 2015. We live on a lovely, very quiet and cozy street with lots of families just outside the center of town. A perfect place to feel like a local yet be minutes away from all the best attractions Den Haag has to offer.

The space
The house was built in 1906 and renovated 2015 top to bottom.

-Ground Floor: kitchen, dining room, living room with fireplace, WC #1, garden.
-1st Floor: WC #2, bathroom with walk-in shower, laundry room with washer & dryer, large bedroom with bunkbeds overlooking the street side, and 2nd bedroom with loft bed and balcony overlooking the garden.
-2nd floor is a large open loft with a massive 3 meter wide bed & sitting area.

Guest access
-Hi-speed WiFi
-Fully equipped kitchen
-Linens and towels included
-One adult bike with child seat (back 5+yrs) and child saddle on front (3-7yrs). Another adult bike can be
neighborhood_overview:
We live on a lovely, very quiet and cozy street with lots of families just outside the center of town. Within 3 minutes walking you can find supermarkets, shopping, parks, and playgrounds. Within 2 minutes walking you can access trams (3 & 12) and bus (21) which take you to the beach, city centre, Central Station, Holland Spoor, museums, shopping and more. We are 30 minutes by train from Schiphol airport and 45 minutes from Amsterdam.

We have one bike you can use with kids seats. OV-Chip card you can also use to ride all public transport. Parking on my street (or surrounding streets) is FREE during the dat, or with my guest pass 24/7 but you must be arranged in advance for €20. You only have to remember to log-in each evening online from 17:00. You do not need a car to explore Den Haag or The Netherlands, though. There is free 24/7 parking within a 10 min walk.

Our home is not a hotel--it is lived in. It's clean and spacious but you will be among our personal bel
host_about: We are Kelley (born and raised in Florida) & Rick (born and raised in The Hague) with two little boys. We look forward to sharing our home with you.

Near public transport to Delft and Amsterdam, easy access to best shops and crawling distance best restaurants!

The whole apartment has wooden floors and paneled doors.

name: Spacious house, centre The Hague, garden
description:
Wonderful spacious house with sunny garden in 17th century area of The Hague. Walking distance to restaurants, Houses of Parliament, (film)theaters, museums and the main Hague shopping area. The garden has an entrance to 'Spinoza Alley', which leads to a classical Dutch canal. To get to the beach takes you 20 minutes by public transport. Free use of bicycles. Both main train stations at 800 meter, every 15 min train to Amsterdam (45 min).

The space
Downstairs the room is impressive, with a view to the garden. in the middle of the spacious room is a kitchen with a glass roof. Two different stairs lead you to the first floor. On this floor: a classical study with a snooker table and stained glass, the masterbedroom, a bedroom with a bunkbed and a bathroom. On the second floor there is another bedroom and bathroom, and another study, including a kitchen.

Guest access
The whole house is freely accessible.

License number
0
neighborhood_overview:
In the historic area of The Hague there are several royal palaces, both Houses of Parliament and the Knights Hall at the Binnenhof, the 'Hofvijver' and famous museums including The Mauritshuis and Escher Museum. Also in the direct neighbourhood: many good restaurants and bars, (film)theaters and shops. The Hague's Chinatown is around the corner, in the Wagenstraat. The entrances of the neighbourhood are marked with two huge Chinese gates with sculptured dragons.
The area used to be the Jewish quarter of The Hague. After a revamp by the municipality since the 1970s it became a very popular urban area.

name: Amazing SkyStudio on 29th floor 731
description:
Fully independent amazing studio apartment on the 29th floor of The Hague Tower, welcome to The Penthouse Apartments on Top of the City. Enjoy stunning views of city of The Hague and the coastline, all the way up to Hook of Holland.

Enjoy your comfortable skyscraper home! Includes comfortable double bed, Samsung Smart-TV and Nespresso machine.

The space
Amazing studio apartment on one of the top floors (29th) of The Hague Tower. This is Studio 731, with views toward the West (coastline, The Hague) and South (Delft, Rotterdam).

Central location right next to The Hague HS station. The city centre is within walking (10mins) distance. Living room with bedroom, open kitchen and bathroom with soft bath towels. Perfect for a night or longer stay in The Hague, your own skyscraper apartment!

The tower also features a business lounge with free access and a basic fitness facility (free entrance). New York's famous flatiron building served
neighborhood_overview:
We are close to the city centre, it's just a 10 minute walk! There are many interesting restaurants and shops nearby, all within walking distance. There is public transportation hub right in front of the Tower with connections to places both in- and outside The Hague. In this authentic The Hague neighborhood you will be able to feel like a local.

We will supply you with a digital guide with some of our best recommendations.

name: Bluebeach Scheveningen
description:
Bluebeach is on the ground floor of our original 19th century fisherman's cottage in the heart of Scheveningen (The Hague).
Walk in 10 minutes through the cozy shopping street Keizerstraat to the beach or ride the tram in 10 minutes to the center of The Hague. There are numerous restaurants and takeaways in the pleasant neighborhood. Breakfast can be a 2-minute walk away at Brasserie Up or opt for a surf breakfast at TigersharkCoffee.

The space
This newly renovated apartment of 35m2 is situated on the ground floor and has a completely new bathroom (shower, sink and toilet), a living room( wooden floor) with flat screen TV, a 2 persons sofa bed ( 125cm) , a bedroom with a comfortable double bed, a kitchenette with refrigerator, microwave, oven, Nespresso machine, kettle, egg cooker, a toaster and free wifi. The kitchenette is suitable for making breakfast and lunch and heating something in the combi microwave
At 2 minutes walking you can enjoy a deliciou
neighborhood_overview:
Walk through the Keizerstraat, a nice shopping street in 10 minutes to the sea and the beach of Scheveningen, with tram 1 you are within 10 minutes in the center of The Hague.

World Forum ( International convention centre ), Madurodam, Gemeentemuseum, Peace Palace, Parliament Buildings, the station and several other museums, restaurants and shops are easily accessible by public transport or bike.

For a nice lunch or diner you can walk to the harbor of Scheveningen (10 min), the Kurhaus with the boulevard and the shopping area the Palace Promenade is a 15 min walk or by public transport accessible.

name: Appartment: nice garden, close to beach&centre
description:
Ons appartement (140m2) met een grote tuin (180m2), in een groene wijk, is een gezellig huis gelegen aan een park met speeltuin. Onze tuin heeft een trampoline, een terras, een hangmat, een skelter en in het park genoeg plek om te voetballen. Het strand is op 10' fietsen, er zijn mooie wandel- en fietsroutes in de duinen en een winkelstraat op 200 meter lopen. De bus stopt voor de deur en brengt je naar de mooie binnenstad van Den Haag of naar Scheveningen/Kijkduin.

The space
Het appartement heeft 2 verdiepingen: boven een ruime woonkamer+keuken, een badkamer/slaapkamer en een werkkamer met een logeerbed. Beneden in het (nieuw gebouwde) souterrain is een 2e badkamer en 2 slaapkamers. Verder hebben we 3 hele lieve, sociale poezen die 2 x per dag eten nodig hebben, vers water en wat aandacht ;-). Je hoeft geen kattenbak te verschonen.
Op 200m lopen is de Fahrenheitstraat, een gezellige winkelstraat.
Wat is er te doen? Eindeloos wandelen door de duinen of
neighborhood_overview: Ons appartementencomplex ligt aan de rand van een villawijk, de 'Vogelwijk'. Het is een ruim opgezette, rustige, zeer groene wijk. Achter deze wijk beginnen de duinen; je kunt vanaf daar mooie routes lopen of fietsen richting strand, richting Kijkduin of Scheveningen.
host_about: Mijn naam is Annemieke en ik ben samen met mijn man Douwe ouder van 3 kinderen. We zijn een muzikaal gezin: mijn man en ik zijn professioneel (klassiek) zangers, onze kinderen zingen ook veel en spelen o.a. piano, trombone, gitaar en ukulele. Verder houden we van lezen, het strand, knutselen, taarten bakken en kamperen in Frankrijk.. We hebben geen design-huis, onze stijl is meer als 'gezellig' te omschrijven. Wij hopen dat je geniet van ons fijne plekje in Den Haag, zoals wij dat ook altijd doen!

Our spacious (220 sqm) historical house (built in 1901) is located in a residential child friendly area within walking distance to the center and close to a shopping street. The private backyard garden is a perfect play and relaxing place.

It is the perfect home from for a Family stay with kids. it has 3 floors: living/dining room, kitchen, 3 sleepingrooms. & 2 bathrooms. There are tons of interesting things to do. There are many activities for children in the town.

The space
Centrally located
Everything within arm's reach. The Hague Central Station and exit roads to Amsterdam, Utrecht and Rotterdam are less than five minutes away. Public transport will be right on your doorstep and Scheveningen beach is practically around the corner.

Guest access
You will have access to whole house

description:
Luxury, peaceful and safe vacation in the House by the Sea! Located in The Hague, just a few minutes walking from the dunes and beach. On the entire 2nd floor there are two cozy bedrooms with private bathroom (max. 4 persons). Large breakfast is included. You are also welcome to use kitchen, living/dining room, sauna and the garden (joint use with the lady-owner). Highest cleaning standards, free parking, Wi-Fi is available. name: Vrijstaand vakantiehuis aan zee voor vijf personen
description:
Geniet van onze sfeervolle vakantiewoning voor maximaal vijf personen, pal achter de duinen van Kijkduin. Het huis heeft o.a. een open haard, 47 inch smart tv met Netflix, een badkamer met bad en een ruim terras. Op het vakantiepark heeft u de beschikking over een overdekt zwembad, restaurant en supermarkt. Dichtbij het strand van Kijkduin maar ook Den Haag en Scheveningen. Het huis is ook voor langere tijd te huur. Onze tarieven zijn inclusief toeristenbelasting (€ 5,35 per persoon per nacht).

The space
De woning van 75m2 telt drie slaapkamers en vijf boxspringbedden (met zeven comfortzones). Er is gratis wifi en een berging met een wasmachine en een droger. Verder beschikt u over een zonnig en beschut terras (op het zuidwesten) met tuinmeubilair, een barbecue en een elektrisch zonnescherm.

Guest access
De vakantiewoning staat op een autoluw vakantiepark. U parkeert uw auto op het parkeerterrein direct achter de slagboom die toegang geeft
neighborhood_overview:
Het strand van Kijkduin is rustig en schoon en er zijn uitgestrekte duinen om door te wandelen en te fietsen. Kijkduin ligt aan het lange-afstandsfietspad LF1. Via deze route fietst u door de duinen naar Scheveningen of juist in de andere richting naar Hoek van Holland en de Haven van Rotterdam.

Skinboarders, kite-, golf- en windsurfers hebben in schiereiland de Zandmotor een ideale plek gevonden om hun sport te beoefenen. Wetenschappers onderzoeken hoe de Zandmotor zich ontwikkelt om te kunnen vaststellen of deze innovatieve methode van kustbescherming inderdaad werkt. De Zandmotor is vrij toegankelijk voor iedereen. Bezoekers kunnen wandelen over de uitgestrekte zandplaat waar zeehonden al regelmatig hun weg naar toe vinden.

Kijkduin biedt gedurende het hele jaar genoeg mogelijkheden om lekker en gezellig buiten de deur te eten. Van maart tot oktober zijn er op het strand de vele strandpaviljoens. Onze favoriet is Blow op het dichtstbijzijnde strand (strandsla
host_about: Gezin, 2 zonen van 18 en 20

name: Modern family home in the city center
description:
Right in the city centre of The Hague, only 15 minutes away from Scheveningen beach. Situated in China Town, the old historical Jewish neighborhood. In an authentic monumental, typical Dutch herenhuis.

A minute walk to the Bierkade, a culinary avenue with plenty of restaurants along the canal, and shopping streets with famous warehouses.

Your stay will be unforgettable!

The space
Our modern home is a two story house on the 2nd, and top floor of a monumental Dutch building.

The entrance of our house is on the 1st floor with a small, but convenient hallway to store jackets, take of your shoes, and get comfortable - we have heated floors so we recommend a shoeless experience 😉

A beautiful authentic wooden stairway leads to the second floor. With a separate toilet in the hall. An industrial glass framed door gives entry to the living room, lounge with a large family sofa, dinner table that fits six people, and a comple
neighborhood_overview: The vibrant city center of The Hague is waiting for you to explore!
host_about:
Hello, my name is Lou.

Together with my husband (Thomas), and son, I live in a beautiful home in the city center of The Hague.

We look forward to welcome you in our lovely family home!

name: Little Piece of Heaven
description:
This cozy rooftop apartment is perfectly suited for couples or friends who want to enjoy a rejuvenating get away. The atmosphere is relaxing and peaceful, whilst the abundance of light offers a spacious feeling to the space. The apartment provides an open living space with a double bed, fully equipped kitchen, a washing machine, a bathroom with a bath and a shower, a separate toilet, and a wonderful balcony where you can enjoy the evening sun.

Guest access
The guest can make use of the biggest part of the apartment.

License number
0518 59C6 934F AE3E 8A88
neighborhood_overview:
Besides the unique atmosphere of the apartment, the location of this place is ideal. The neighborhood is cozy and vibrant. You will find plenty of cafes, nice little shops, restaurants, a supermarket, public transport, and a cute community garden on a walking distance.

To make your stay even more complete, I can provide you with more tips and recommendations about good restaurant, and special places to visit.
host_about: I'm a freelance performer and dance teacher based in The Hague (Netherlands). I love traveling, the power of nature, good food, connecting with people from different parts of the world, sharing precious moments, laughs and memorable conversations together. I’m amazed by life and how it’s filled with unpredictable events and magical coincidences. I’m fascinated about how the impermanent nature of things keeps unraveling to me and how I can explore ways to find peace within that by practicing vipassana meditation and yoga. I love the simplicity and the Truth of this present moment.

host_about: Wij vinden het leuk om gasten in ons huis te hebben. De één doet gewoon zijn eigen ding en spreek je niet veel en met anderen drink je een kop koffie of een wijntje en heb je leuke gesprekken. Wij helpen je graag met het vinden van een leuk restaurant, het Openbaar Vervoer, enz.

name: Stylish STUDIO, walking distance from all hotspots
description:
Stylish studio with own entrance in most populair area of The Hague, just a few minutes walk from all the hot spots: Palaces, Museums, Houses of Parlement (Binnenhof), Peace Palace, Palace Garden, Shops, cafes, restaurants. Only 15 min. to the beach of Scheveningen since the tram stops nearby. The small studio (24m2) is located on the ground floor with Wi-Fi, Smart TV, comfortable bed, private bathroom and kitchen incl. all basic kitchen supplies.

The space
- The studio is completely independent, you have your own house key.
- We live next to the studio, keys can be picked up there.
- Breakfast is not included, but supermarket AH -XL nearby. Breakfast is also possible in one of the many coffee places a few steps away. Clarence with delicious coffee, Crunch, Bagels & Beans or cozy with a cat on your lap in the Cat Café (Ditjes & Katjes)
- Bathroom with shower, sink and toilet, toilet paper, towels, bath amenities.
- Kitchen with cooker, ref
neighborhood_overview:
Studio is located between Centre and popular Zeeheldenkwartier with vintage and designshops.
Visit: The Mauritshuis, Peace Palace, Noordeinde Palace, Panorama Mesdag, Escher Museum, China town, etc. Or take tram 1, to Scheveningen beach. with boulevard, Ferris wheel and pier. Sculptures by the sea, sea life, Omniversum, Museon,
Madurodam and of course always a beautiful exhibition at the Municipal Museum.
host_about: Pietertje lives together with Zeger and two children (12 and 14) in this nice neighbourhood in The Hague. They are both artists. love to travel but work mostly at home.

name: Scheveningen Beach Apartment
description:
Our apartment is on walking distance: from the Beach (10 min), the harbour (4 min), shoppingstreet Keizerstraat (3 min), Circustheater (10 min).
An absolutely romantic gettaway for couples, who will enjoy beach life in old Scheveningen!!

Geniet van het strand in de bekende badplaats Scheveningen, de watersport, leuke winkels en restaurants op loopafstand!!
Een gezellig appartement, met leuke woonkeuken!!

The space
Een heerlijke nieuwe boxspring, die fatantastisch slaapt, achter in het appartement dus erg rustig.

De woonkeuken is compleet voorzien van een wasmachine, droger, blender, Nespresso, tosti-ijzer, melkschuimer, en alle gemakken om te genieten.
Deze woonkeuken komt uit op de patio, een gezellig klein binnenplaatsje.

De woonkamer heeft een lekkere hangbank om na een heerlijke stranddag televisie te kijken. Voor een frisse avond kan er ook gezellig de electrische openhaard aan.

Guest access<
neighborhood_overview:
Loopafstand van het strand, de achtertuin van dit appartement!!

Het is ook nog 4 min lopen van de gezellige haven in Scheveningen, als je iets doorloopt komt je uit op de Frederik Hendriklaan, de leukste winkelstraat van Den Haag.

Verder is het maar 3 min van de Keizerstraat (het centrum) van Scheveningen, waar de boodschappen gedaan kunnen worden, en waar je gezellig kan eten in leuke restaurants.

Dichtbij de tram om naar het centrum van Den Haag of Haagse markt (grootste markt van Europa) te gaan.

De beste surfspot van Nederland!
host_about: Reislustig, optimistisch, kan genieten van de kleine dingen!

name: Quiet family home next to the forest near Delft
description:
Quiet, charming family home bordering forest and lakes.

Our modern authentic home is all yours during your stay with everything a family needs: Spacious living room, fully equipped kitchen, four bedrooms, bathroom with shower and bath, three seperate toilets and a nice terrace overlooking the forest.

Put on your walking shoes or take one of our bikes and explore the woods, swim in the lake or enjoy the many terraces or museums of Delft, the Hague and beach, Rotterdam and Amsterdam.

Guest access
In general, the house is completely yours. If you will not use all the bedrooms, we will close the ones that will not be used.
In the kitchen, you can use everything that is in the fridge or in stock, as long as you replace it by the same products. A very nice bottle of wine will do too...
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is very quiet, especially in summer. At night you may hear the rustling leaves of the forest and the owl. At day time just some passing neighbours or guests enjoying the "dijk" to walk.

We are happy to have lots of excellent restaurants/cafés and shops around:
*Café du Midi (http://www.cafedumidi.nl/) 5 minutes by bike. Our favourite! High quality food. Perfect service. Book in advance!
* Cafe de Vang (http://www.devang.nl/) 5 minutes by bike
* Cafe Knus (http://www.knus.nl/) 7 minutes by bike
* Weilandwinkel (http://hoevebiesland.nl/deweilandwinkel/) Local products at the farm, fresh bread every day. 6 minutes by bike
* For supermarkets and all basic shops (http://www.parade-nootdorp.nl/ ) 6 minutes by bike.
host_about: Dutch history teacher who travelled and lived abroad extensively. Now based in the Netherlands with husband and 12 year old twins (boy and girl). Looking for culture, atmosphere and relaxed places to stay.

Alleen niet-rokers graag (ook niet op de balkons), geen huisdieren, geen feestjes. TWEEDE PERSOON GRATIS ! De prijs is incl. schoonmaakkosten. In overleg is op dezelfde etage een extra tweepersoons kamer beschikbaar. Evt. kan extra nacht worden bijgeboekt.

name: THE BRIGHT ROOM / tussen strand en het centrum
description:
royale slaapkamer in een appartement in een mooie oude hollandse stijl. name: Light and Bright Family Friendly Beach House
description:
Family friendly beach house near the beach of Scheveningen in the city of The Hague. Light and bright with lots of space and very suitable for children also.

The space
Our home is situated in the lively beach-neighbourhood of Scheveningen. we share our front yard with our neighbours who are very friendly and welcoming. You are very welcome to use our bikes and bbq also so you can feel at home in our place. We have downstairs a large kitchen. Then in the basement you'll find a guest room with a queen size bed. Upstairs we have a big living room and a smaller children's room where (if needed) we can put an extra bed. In the attic is the master bedroom with a kingsize bed and we have the bed for a small child. Attached to this bedroom there is also a balcony.

Other things to note
You're welcome to use our inflatable SUP board in the sea or in the channel in the nearby park (you could even paddle into the city center!).

License n
neighborhood_overview: The boulevard and beach make Scheveningen a unique and lively place. There are lots of bars, restaurants and beach clubs to find entertaiment. Also for kids there is lots to do; we even have a small animal farm to visit in the neighbourhood. There is also a big park with a play ground within walking distance.

name: Top location-2bedroom apt+garden&parking
description:
Breathe in the vibrant though peaceful city’s historical town. Take a 2-min stroll to enjoy your morning coffee or dine out in the classy “Denneweg” right around the corner! The cozy ground floor apt is situated at one of the Hague’s most beautiful areas. The apt combines a modern interior with typical Dutch old brick walls. It has a spacious garden which feels like an extension of the living room, with automatic romantic lighting in the evening. Free parking license & bikes included.

The space
Kitchen is fully equipped with microwave, oven, dishwasher and high end cooking equipment such as professional Global Knifes, garden has sun during the day and a table and chairs to sit outside, furniture is all design (hästens bed), in-built luxurious closet, design table and chairs, Miele wash machine and separate dryer, design TV including Netflix, wifi and Sonos speaker in living room.

Guest access
washing machine, dryer, bathtub, garden, ground
neighborhood_overview: My neighborhood is a residential very peaceful, secure and beautiful area. right around the corner of Hague's oldest shopping street, the Dutch parliament and any embassies. The tram to the beach and other public transport to get to for example Schiphol International Airport are nearby.
host_about: Rein is an experienced entrepreneur & vacation rental owner who knows exactly what it takes to provide extraordinary experiences. . .which makes him a top-notch host in various different countries around the world. Born in Holland, he's planted his roots in the beautiful country of Colombia after falling in love with the culture, people, and food. Upon meeting Rein, you'll encounter his friendly smile, humility, and desire to provide incredible experiences for his guests. In his free time, he loves to get lost in a great novel, travel the world, boogie to Salsa & Bachata, or enjoy a delicious meal at the foodie hotspots around town! You can rest assured you're in good company when staying in Rein's vacation homes.

A private apartment freshly renovated and located on the 3rd floor on the top of our home :
- A small bedroom with floor pallet bed (+ drawers and hangers)
- A private and open kitchen (fridge/freezer, cooker and sink)
- A private bathroom (toilets, sink and shower) with a roller blind for intimacy
- A private living room with four skylights (sofa convertible)
- A private small balcony.

On the top floor of our house with a common entrance, three flights of stairs that could be a bit steep but normal for Dutch standards.

Guest access
Access to the attic (3rd floor) through a common entrance (and stairs) plus the laundry room on the seco
neighborhood_overview: We chose to live in the Zeeheldenkwartier because we love its spirit and architecture. It's centraly located with everything you need few steps away. Large choice of restaurants, antic shops, gardens, supermarkets and touristic attractions.
host_about:
My wife and I love to travel and to discover new cultures as we come from international backgrounds. We have moved from Paris to the Hague and we enjoy living here with our children!

We have recently moved to our new house and renovated it, we are now finalizing the deco.

We are sociable so feel free to share with us your story around a a fresh juice or a coffee. Otherwise, we know how to respect your privacy.

We look forward to welcoming you in our home.

description:
It is a family house just a five minutes walk from the beach. The house is practically new. Just six years old now. The house is in the middle of a carfree zone. It is really nice and quite. The space

The flat, located in a good, quiet neighbourhood, on the 1st floor is only accessible by stairs.
Only 2 minutes walk to public transport (20 minutes to the centre/Central Station). The beach is about 20 minutes walk, 5 minutes with the tram. Scheveningen is about 1/2 hour by bus. Nearby (5 minutes walk) are 2 supermarkets and a shopping street with many restaurants.

The space

bookcase and a few plants. Sufficient lamps are available.
The fully equip

The house is located in a quiet area overlooking a canal with lots of greenery and trees.
There are 2 supermarkets both 4-5 minutes walking from my home. They are open during daytime. One supermarket is open 8am-9pm from Monday till Saturday and from 10pm-6am on Sunday. name: BizStay Harbour 56D
description:
Spacious 2-bedroom apartment situated in the harbour of Scheveningen.

The space
This apartment is situated on the ground floor and offers a view on the harbour and its boats from both bedrooms, and is facing the seaside on the other side.

The comfortable livingroom has a cosy seating area with flatscreen TV, a big dining table and an open kitchen, fully equipped with everything you need during your stay; pans, pots, crockery, cutlery, glasses, a Nespresso coffee machine, dishwasher, water kettle, toaster and an oven/microwave. From the living room you can access your own private balcony.
The quiet bedrooms have a double bed than can be separated into two single beds and a flatscreen TV.

The bathroom has double sinks, a bathtub and a spacious shower. There is a separate area for the washer / dryer.

This apartment comes with a private parking spot in the parking garage.

name: Beautiful family home 50m from the beach
description:
Enjoy your stay at our family home at the beach! Our sunny back yard (noon-night ) links directly to a municipal playground for children. We have a spacious living room with open, full-facilitated kitchen. We have a large seating area and a big dining table for the whole family to enjoy. On the first floor you'll find two bedrooms and a bathroom (shower and bath) and separate toilet. The second floor includes our guestroom, washing area and a second shower.
Temporary parking license possible.

The space
Love the beach? Our home is just a few meters away from your toes in the sand.... Located just behind Scheveningen Pier, you have direct access to the beach, boulevard, playgrounds, numerous beach bars, shopping centre and public transportation.
Turn 180 degrees and within 1 minute you enter the 1875 acres of coastal dune park Meijendel with numerous walking and cycling paths.

name: Gorgeous 17th century canal house, city centre
description:
Enjoy all the pleasures of this spacious, quiet and delightful canal house in the centre of The Hague’s city life. A central location, on the most beautiful canal of The Hague, also known as 'Avenue Culinair' due to the many charming high quality restaurants situated here. The city centre and the international train station can be reached within a five minute walk. Numerous shops, boutiques, restaurants and cafes are just around the corner. All this makes the house a unique place to stay.

The space
The picturesque ground floor apartment with private entrance is tastefully furnished including a sofa bed for 1 extra guest, piano, flat screen TV, fridge, washer and dryer, iron and coffee maker. The apartment also has a spacious kitchen including a dishwasher, a bathroom with a rainshower and a separate toilet. Then there is a roomy bedroom with lots of cupboard space that opens out onto the little patio where you can sit when the weather is nice. A gorgeous and comf
neighborhood_overview: For centuries, this neighbourhood is the home and workplace of many artists and free spirits. The house where the philosopher Spinoza lived is just around the corner. Three master painters of the Golden Age, Paulus Potter, Jan van Goyen and Jan Steen lived and worked from the Dunne Bierkade (opposite the apartment), the place where beer was delivered into the city. You can still enjoy a beer here, cosy establishments can be found along the old routes of the canal boats, with appropriate names like De Pakschuit or De Paas. The canals and old avenues are being restored more and more. You can embark on a boat cruise of The Hague or the neighbouring municipalities. Those who like to discover on their own can hire canoes and explore the waterways themselves.
host_about: My name is Marjan and I'm living together with my husband and son in a 17th century house canal in The Hague city centre. My daughter is moved out already and she is studying Architecture in Belgium. We love to go out for dinner, to enjoy the sunset at the beach, to cycle in the dunes or to stay at home and prepare an excellent meal for friends. I love cooking, fine arts, reading, styling interiors, visiting antique and flea markets and travelling around. Futhermore I work in Amsterdam as a brand strategist and I travel by train in just 45 minutes to my office in the middle of the city center of Amsterdam. We look forward to welcome you!

description:
Newly renovated family, couple and business-friendly spacious light 70 m2 apartment in a hip neighbourhood walking distance to the centre and 12 min with tram from beach.

The space
The flat is fully equipped, located in a family friendly neighborhood with a great green playground 50m from the door. There’s a double king bed in the bedroom, double sofa bed + optional single high (25cm wide) floor mattress. The flat provides a dining/living space with 21st century connectivity (Netflix via Apple TV, high-speed internet), a work and reading space (serre), and an en-suite bedroom with a large double bed and adjoining bathroom with a generous shower. We are fully equipped for families with small children. If you like to cook for yourself, you'll appreciate the fully equipped new kitchen. There is a small cute balcony to relax. Located 14 minutes with the tram from Central station and 12 minutes from the beach. Tram stops are within 100 metres from the apartment.

Welcome to our family beach cottage. Enjoy your holiday with your family or romantic with just the two of you at our dune villa. Discover all the fun and beauty this countryside of The Hague has to offer.

The cottage has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, kitchen, fireplace en big sunny terrace. the cottage is located in a holiday park with indoor swimming pool, tennis court, supermarket, and bicycle rental. As our guests you will ave access to all the facilities the park has to offer.

The space

neighborhood_overview: The cottage is located in Kijkduin, The Hague. Kijkduin is a beautiful nature reserve where you can go out for a long walk or cycle along the coast or just enjoy and relax at the beach. Within 15 minutes you are in the city center of The Hague. The Hague is a beautiful city with typical Dutch architecture and has a lot to offer whether you are into culture, music, shopping or party. You'd rather prefer to stay near to the beach? Try a (kite) surf introduction course or visit Kijkduin (Deltaplein). You'll find some nice restaurants at the boulevard or at the beach and watch the beautiful sunset. Also Scheveningen is close-by and fun to visit.

name: Royal Suite midden in het centrum van Den Haag
description:
Heerlijke twee kamer loft op een prachtige locatie midden in het Hofkwartier, het mooiste stukje van Den Haag.

Deze locatie is van 1880 en is gelegen in het Hofkwartier van Den Haag. Een levendige buurt met alle belangrijke en koninklijke bezienswaardigheden, musea zoals Panorama Mesdag, Mauritshuis om de hoek.

Maar het meest bijzondere van mijn gastenverblijf is toch wel het uitzicht op de paleistuinen en het werkpaleis van de koning Willem Alexander en koningin Maxima: Paleis Noordeinde.

The space
Fijne, vrije topetage met uitkijk op de paleistuin van de koning en koningin.

De etage is voorzien van een ruime, slaapkamer, douche en toilet en een grote woonkamer voorzien van kabel TV en WIFi.

Voor €20,- per dag kunt u een parkeerplek huren in het centrum van de stad. Dit kan bij ontvangst geregeld worden.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview: U verblijft in het oudste gedeelte van Den Haag, een parel van de binnenstad. Mijn appartement bevindt zich midden in het hofkwartier, grenzend aan de paleistuin en het paleis Noordeinde. Binnen loopafstand van winkels, restaurants en allerlei gezelligheid. Aan de achterzijde (waar u overnacht) hoort u alleen de vogels fluiten en bevindt u zich in alle rust en kijkt u uit op de rustgevende paleistuin en paleis Noordeinde.
host_about: Ik hou zelf ook erg van reizen en heb veel ervaring met andere b&b, hotels etc. wereldwijd. Vindt het heel leuk om nu zelf gasten te ontvangen en hun wegwijs te maken in het mooiste gedeelte van Den Haag, namelijk het Hofkwartier. Je kijkt bij mij uit op de tuinen van en het Paleis Noordeinde. Wat wil je nog meer!

name: Scheveningen Beach studio
description:
The characteristic villa was built in the early 1900's and has recently been fully restored. All the old elements have been maintained: beautiful panel doors and ceiling ornaments. It is situated at the NO 1 location in Scheveningen: across from the Circus Theater, a 5 minute walk to the beach, famous Kuhrhaus and shops/restaurants & bars. The studio gives you all the privacy you need. Bathroom, kitchen, furnished spacious living room and a balcony will be yours during your stay in Scheveningen.

The space
The location is the absolute number 1 of Scheveningen. Only 1 minute from beach, boulevard, Kurhaus, restaurants, cinema and circus theater. The studio is quiet, at the gardenside and it has all the comfort you need.

host_about: Hi! I am Donald. For work I travel all over the world and I am fortunate to see many different places. But to be honest: Scheveningen is my favorite, it is the homebase and I like all aspects of living in this town. It is vibrant but also easy going and the house is in a quiet green zone, close to the sea. all ingredients for a nice holiday! name: ☆Modern family apartment close to beach & centre!
description:
Modern family-friendly apartment, fully equipped and located in the popular ‘Regentessekwartier’ close to The Hague centre, international organisations, restaurants, shops, cafes, and the beach! This is a great space for up to 4 adults and 4 kids (2 bunk beds).

The space
Private entrance to this historic apartment (built in 1916, façade has heritage designation) on street level. The apartment has a large open main room with a comfortable living room and new 65-inch Smart TV, a large dining area that seats up to 8, and a bright kitchen with stone counters and modern appliances including a 5-burner gas hob and big oven, fridge/freezer, wine fridge, coffee machine, food processor, blender, microwave oven, dishwasher and all the cookware necessary to make a gourmet meal!

The kitchen leads to a courtyard garden with outdoor seating and a gas BBQ.

There is a spacious bathroom with a walk-in rain shower and large bathtub, double sinks, and a towel
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located on a quiet street in the sought after Regentessekwartier, next to Zeeheldenkwartier and Duinoord. This multicultural, vibrant neighbourhood is a well-loved place to live, with restaurants, cafés, bakeries, bars and gyms close by. Grocery shops, including a large health food store, are around the corner. We also love being close to The Hague centre and the beautiful dunes and beach with excellent seaside cafés/restaurants. International organisations like the ICTY, OPCW and the Peace Palace, and countless embassies are also close by.

Just around the corner is Emma’s Hof, a truly lovely urban garden/park maintained by local residents, offering a quiet place for nature lovers to read or share a drink/picnic. The Dutch King and Queen have supported this special community-run space.
host_about: We're Danya (Canadian) and Emiel (Dutch) living in The Hague with our two young girls. We're a fun loving professional couple who like to travel as much as possible. Hope to meet you soon!

*** Due to the coronavirus we disinfect all surfaces in the room before guests arrive. During your stay we will regularly clean in common areas (hall way and stairs).

This light, airy room (27 m2) features a balcony onto the street (please note, no smoking on the balcony), a double bed, seating arrangement with sofa or chairs, wooden cupboard, drawer cabinet with mirror, a coat rack and clothes hangers. The room has central heating , a refrigerator, an electric fan and a good wifi connection

name: Spacious room in renovated house with roofterrace
description:
I am the very proud owner of a house (115 m2) in the popular & green neighbourhood Leeuwendaal, near De Vliet (canel). The house is characteristic (1929), but also brand new & renovated. The house also have a big roofterrace (40 m2) with a beautiful view. Near the highways, public transport and Oud Rijswijk/The Hague/Delft. I would love to meet & welcome you as my guest (in a spacious/modern room with a double bed).

The space
As my guest you can use the spacious doubleroom, the bathroom (with a bath, a rainshower and two sinks), the two toilets, the roofterrace (with loungeset and dinerarea), the kitchen (with a big oven, magnetron, stove and refrigerator) and the livingroom (with a big living trunk table and a sittingarea with netflix ;-)). Everything shared with myself, except the double room, which is your temporarily property.

Other things to note
The tourist tax is not included. It is a requirement by law that I charge all guest a tour
neighborhood_overview:
I live in a green and characteristic neighbourhood in Oud Rijswijk, near De Vliet (canel).

Distances:
500 meter - centre Oud Rijswijk
2,5 kilometer - centre Oud Voorburg
3 kilometer - citycentre The Hague
5 kilometer - citycentre Delft
8,5 kilometer - beach Scheveningen
20 kilometer - citycentre Rotterdam
20 kilometer - citycentre Leiden

With tram 1 (near the house) you can achieve The Hague in 12 minutes, Delft in 14 minutes and Scheveningen in 30 minutes.

name: Oud vissershuisje aan het strand
description:
1 minuut lopen van het strand. Gezellige buurt gelegen in oud Scheveningen. De oude vissershuisen zijn gebouwd in 1875 en hebben een unieke sfeer.

The space
De voorkant van het huis ligt aan de Ankerstraat maar de voordeur is te bereiken via de Zeilstraat. Na het passeren van een steegje kom je in een klein hofje terecht waar de voordeur zich bevindt. Hier kom je binnen in een ruime keuken met alle voorziening van dien. Aangrenzend aan de keuken bevindt zich de woonkamer. Er is een snelle wifi aanwezig in het huis en er bestaat de mogelijkheid om films of muziek te luisteren via je telefoon op de tv of de boxen. Via de trap in de woonkamer is de slaapkamer te bereiken.

Guest access
Uiteraard gezellig om een Lp de beluistern op de platenspeler, hier moet echter wel voorzichtig mee worden omgegaan. Dit betekent dat de naald voorzichtig op de plaat gezet moet worden om krassen te voorkomen. De platen vastpakken aan de buitenrand van de plaat.
neighborhood_overview: Het oude vissershuis ligt centraal in Oud Scheveningen. Aan de ene kant bevindt zich de grot haven met vissersboten, aan de andere kant ligt het Nationaalpark Meijendel waar je van de rust en de unieke flora en fauna kan genieten. Slechts 1 minuut lopen van het huis is het strand te bereiken. Hier kan een wandeling gemaakt worden over de boulevard van Scheveningen. Er heerst een gezellige sfeer met veel recreatie mogelijkheden door de grote hoeveelheid aan strandtenten, winkels, attracties en culturele evenementen. Het centrum van Den haag is binnen slechts binnen 10 minuten te bereiken. Voor de sportieve Airbnb gast bestaat er ook de mogelijkheid om een surfboard te huren of een surfles te volgen.

Ideaal voor een gezin met 2 à 3 kleine kinderen.

The space
Heerlijk verblijf voor een weekend, een week of een een paar maanden. Prima ruimte om te werken. Vlakbij World Forum, Interpol, International Court en ambassades, Gemeentemuseum, Fotomuseum, de haven van Scheveningen en het centrum met de overheidsgebouwen.

description:
A very light and cozy studio, on the upper floor of our house. It's spacious, and with a stylish interior. The studio has it's own kitchen, a bathroom and a sunny balcony.

The apartment is located in a beautiful early-20st century residential, green neighbourhood. There are many shops and some bars/restaurants just around the corner. Beaches, dunes and the Scheveningse harbour are on a 12-30 minutes walking distance. World Forum and musea are nearby; just as good public transport facilities.

The space
A large living 65 m2 with 2 balcony's with a view on a green square at the front and on gardens al the back. All is new and clean with behold of historic details. The apartment has a wooden aok-floor. The sleeping room and the open kitchen are aside; Moreover there is a spaceous new bathroom. In total the studio is 100 m2.

Guest access
The second Floor in total and the entree and stairs.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is a residential area near the see and the beaches of Scheveningen. Also harbour and boulevard are nearby. Just around the corner there is the shopping street with shops for food, clothes, flowers and books, just as good restaurants and bars. The World forum with international congresses and performances is on 5 minutes walking. By tram 16 or by bicycle you can go the center of The Haghe. Also parks, dunes and cultural activities as the Gemeente museum are all nearby.
host_about: I am a retired urban designer, living with my partner, who works as an artist. I like to play tennis and sing, and take care of my grand children. I also enjoy to go to theater, cinema and musea, and to travel.

host_about:
Hi! My name is Suzanne. Thanks for your interest in this spacious apartment only 200 meters from the North Sea in Scheveningen! This place is my brother's but since he lives in the States I take care of this house and its guests.

I have lived and traveled many countries in the world but for me my hometown Scheveningen is one of the best places to live and enjoy good things in live. Why? Because of the location for instance: the sea close to your doorstep and you can reach historical cities like Amsterdam, Leiden, Delft, Gouda, Haarlem and Alkmaar within an hour by car or public transport.

Scheveningen is founded in the 11th century. It has an interesting history, influenced by the North Sea. The beautiful wide beach and boulevard invites you to enjoy! 

I have the pleasure of hosting people in my hometown for some time now and I think I am very lucky that I have this opportunity. I love the interaction with people from all over the world. I will make sure you will enjoy your stay.

I hope to welcome you! Just send me an email or give me a call if you want more info. Greetz Suzanne

name: Happy room near beach, OPCW,  World Forum, Europol
description:
Our house is located between Scheveningen and the dynamic historic city of The Hague. The World Forum, Peace Palace, Gemeente Museum are within walking distance. Tram line 1 is only three minutes away and within ten minutes you are on the beach of Scheveningen or the city The Hague.
Our house is located in the tranquil and lovely Statenkwartier. The bathroom is shared with the other guests. That is why you should keep in mind sometimes a waiting time.

The space
This room has a fridge, a kettle and mugs for coffee or tea and a desk. There is also a hairdryer available. Also there is a micro wave in the room.

Guest access
You have access to the room you booked and the shared bathroom, the rest of the house is private.

Other things to note
Het huis is gelegen vlakbij Scheveningen en de dynamische stad Den Haag. Op loopafstand van het Strand, World Forum, OPCW, Europol, het prachtige Gemeentemuseum en Madurodam. Met
neighborhood_overview: Close to our house is a shopping street with a supermarket (Albert Heijn), restaurants, shops etc. The street is called 'Frederik Hendriklaan'. Thera are many coffee shops and bakery's with terraces were you can take breakfast or lunches. In the same street there also restaurants Chinees, Italiaan, Thai and snackbars. Not so far from our house is the harbor, 10 minutes walk. There are any all-kind of top restaurants. The beach is very near, also there all kind of restaurants.
host_about:
As a mother of five I have always tried to create a nice and cozy ambiance in our house. Now some of my children have left the house, I enjoy hosting people and making them feel home in this same atmosphere.

Every morning I try to make time to go to the forest to get a taste of the clean and fresh air in nature. Thanks to the location of our house it is also possible to visit the beach very easily. Sunshine or stormy weather: the sea is always a beauty to me!

I like to cook, read and love nature, but religion is most important to me. Religion and prayer gives me strength to do my daily tasks with passion and joy.

Hopefully we will meet soon.

Irene

name: Unique Monumental House In City Centre The Hague
description:
Enjoy a stay in the Centre of The Hague in one of the oldest streets. This characteristic monumental house, build in 1625, offers room for 4 people and a baby.

Within a minute walking distance is the shopping centre, lovely squares, supermarkets, restaurants and public transport (tram, bus, metro) towards all directions.

This home is the perfect base for all trips to the beach, other cities or just to stroll through this lovely city.

The space
This house is fully equipped with everything you need, from enjoying your stay indoors and cook a lovely meal, to sit in the garden or on the roof top terrace.
The house has 3 floors. On the 1st floor the bedroom forms a loft with the living room. The bathroom (with rainshower & bath) and toilet are also on this floor. The bedroom on the 2nd floor has steep stairs to get to, and you also have access to the roof terrace there. The beds are very comfortable as is the rain shower and everything els
neighborhood_overview: There are tons of nice places and sight seeing locations within walking distance. We have prepared a map for our visitors with our favourite places.
host_about:
Hi, I am a visual design freelancer from the Hague who likes to travel, run, cycle, surf, swim, go out for dinner and just enjoy life and the outdoors :). Whenever I'm away, I love to welcome people to stay at my beautiful house in the city centre to have the experience that I always like when travelling. 
Interior Styling by Styleloket ( (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name: Fabulous apparment close to sea & all highlights
description:
Luxurious light apartment (180 sq/m) on top floor(with elevator) in a green area close to the sea, Madurodam, all musea , the Peace Palace and interesting spots of The Hague. All on walking/ biking distance or by public transport. Plenty of shopping areas with charming shops, Noordeinde with is Palace and garden and lots of galeries.
Too much to mention here!
After all this you can have dinner on our huge romantic terrace (90 sq/m) overlooking the skyline of The Hague..and see the sunset.

The space
Spacious, light appartment, with all facilities. Big kitchen, ideal for cookinglovers. Dining area with big table for 8-10 people, and connecting little terrace. Living area with tv, netflix , wifi, available.
2 bedrooms at main floor, one with dubbel bed, connecting great bathroom with bad and separate shower, toilet. This bedroom has also a nice terrace, very sunny when having a glass of wine before dinner.
Second bedroom has a single bed wit
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is one of the high end areas of the Hague. The bus stops at 200 m, and other transport (tram) at 3 min walk.
Next to our house is lots of green and we are at walking distance (20 min.) from the sea with lots of beach restaurants an d sunbathing facilities. (By bus or tram is even faster;)
At the opposite of our house is a friendly restaurant for lunch and maybe dinner. But at few minutes driving or biking you will find a lot more to choose.
host_about:
We are the proud owners of this nice appartement. Our children are self-sufficiënt and therefore we are able to travel more often. We love the Cote d’azur where we have a house. But also we love Capetown area where we hope to travel to once a year. 
Our lovely light luxurious apartment is situated at walking distance from the sea (20min walk, 8 min bike) in a green area. Madurodam is at 3 min. walk and also all the interesting spots, like the Peace Palace, musea etc. are easy to reach, by bike or public transport. 
This 190 Sq/m apartment is at the second floor ( by elevator) in a beautiful Jugendstil building and has a huge terrace (90 sq/m) with pergola and bbq where you can spend romantic evenings overlooking the skyline of The Hague.
Besides this, it has 2 other smaller balconies, one at streetside and one at backside of the house. 
The area is the most expensive area of the Hague because of the many green areas, the location to all activities and the sea. 
Definitely a safe place.

name: Spacious and sunny apartment near the beach
description:
This sunny, spacious private floor has its own livingroom with a balcony, a pantry microwave), a big bedroom with adjacent bathroom.

The apartment is perfectly situated in The Hague's old "Statenkwartier" (Scheveningen) and is a great base for cycling trips, hikes and cultural activities. The harbour, the beach and nice restaurants are close by.

The tram stops right around the corner and brings you to the city-center within several minutes. The beach is only a 14 minute walk away.

The space
On the 2nd floor of our mansion you have the entire floor at your disposal. The entree and the staircase to the 1 floor are shared with the owners.

In the living room you can relax, eat and having a sunbath on the balcony.
The pantry is equipped with kitchen utensils for breakfast and lunch, a coffee maker (dulce gusto), waterkettle, sandwich maker and toaster. Coffee and tea can be used freely, for drinks a small amount is asked. Not
neighborhood_overview:
The Hague's "Statenkwartier" is known for its international ambiance. The beach is always within walking distance, as are several renowned museums and some of the most authentic shops in The Hague. Nice restaurants are never far away with both the harbour and the "Fred" (Frederk Hendriklaan) at less than 300 meters.

Some highlights in the area:
- The Gemeentemuseum
- The International Court of Justice
- The World Forum
- The Circus Theater (Musicals)
- The Omniversum
- GEM (Museum of photography)
- Museum Beelden aan zee (sculptures at sea)
- The old town of Scheveningen
- Hikes in the dunes
- Swimming at sea!
host_about: Wij wonen al 35  jaar met veel plezier in het Statenkwartier, daarvoor studeerden wij in Den Haag. Aad is Fysiotherapeut en leraar lichamelijke opvoeding, Inge is lerares lichamelijke opvoeding. Nu zijn we met pensioen. We houden van tennissen, wandelen  en lezen graag. We reizen veel, vooral met de fiets waarbij Azië op de 1e plaats komt. We vinden het dan leuk andere mensen te ontmoeten.  Dus een Airbnb beginnen met onze geheel vrije etage was een logische stap. Elke gast moet zich op zijn gemak voelen: de een door veel contact te hebben, de ander door zijn eigen gang te gaan. Fijn dat wij als verhuurder kunnen bijdragen aan een goed verblijf in het Statenkwartier

Als ik iets ben, ben ik een Hagenaar!

name: Studio in Scheveningen, close to harbour and beach
description:
Welcome to our studio directly behind the marina in Scheveningen. Private entrance with sunny garden. Upon arrival, a sweet baking is waiting for you, prepared by hostess Annemarie (winner of the The Great Dutch Bake-off 2016). No breakfast, but a complete kitchen to cook. Many nice restaurants 50 meters away. Dunes and the beach within walking distance.

The price does not include tourist tax of € 4.45 per person per night (to be paid in cash or per bank card upon arrival)

The space
For decades, the studio was a carpenter's workshop within our family. Several photographs and accessories in space remind us of this former destination.

Guest access
It is a studio with a private entrance and a (shielded) garden that is completely accessible to the guests.

Other things to note
We live next to the studio ourselves. Our children regularly play in our adjacent garden.

License number
Exempt
neighborhood_overview: The studio is located 100 meters from the marina with all its nice and cozy restaurants. The boulevard, the beach and the dunes are within walking distance. Supermarket at the end of the street. The Frederik Hendriklaan, a beautiful shopping street with many nice shops and eateries (also for breakfast) is also within walking distance. By bike or public transport you are in 20 minutes in the bustling center of The Hague!
host_about:
Wij zijn Annemarie en Michiel Pronk en we heten je van harte welkom in onze Bed and Brownies 'In de werkplaats'. Die naam behoeft wel wat uitleg:  In 2016 won ik (Annemarie) 'Heel Holland Bakt', een fantastische en onvergetelijke ervaring! En tegelijkertijd een start van een periode van nieuwe kansen en mogelijkheden. Voor mij het moment om een aantal dromen waar te gaan maken. Waaronder het organiseren van bakworkshops, maar ook het realiseren van deze 'Bed and Brownies'. In de door Michiel compleet verbouwde, oude timmermanswerkplaats van mijn schoonvader, ontvangen wij je graag voor een heerlijk verblijf. Wij wonen met onze kinderen direct naast de studio en zijn zoveel mogelijk beschikbaar voor jullie vragen of een gezellig praatje, al kan je je natuurlijk ook lekker terugtrekken. De studio is splinternieuw, met prachtige nieuwe keuken en badkamer, vloerverwarming en elektrische aupingbedden voor een heerlijke nachtrust. De Bed and Brownies ligt direct achter de gezellige jachthaven in Scheveningen. Ook het strand en de duinen bevinden zich op loopafstand. Ontbijt kun je zelf verzorgen in de compleet uitgeruste keuken of kun je nuttigen in een van de restaurants in de buurt aan de haven of in de gezellige winkelstraat de Frederik Hendriklaan! Geen B dus van Breakfast, maar van Brownies, want uiteraard zorg ik voor een heerlijk zelfgebakken lekkernij bij aankomst. 
We zien er naar uit je te ontmoeten. Van Harte Welkom!

We are Annemarie and Michiel Pronk and we would like to welcome you to our Bed and Brownies 'In de werkplaats'. That name needs some explanation: In 2016 
I (Annemarie) won de Dutch version of 'The Great Britisch Bake off':  'Heel Holland Bakt', a fantastic and unforgettable experience! And at the same time a start of a period of new opportunities and possibilities. For me the moment to follow a few of my dreams. Including organizing baking workshops, but also realizing these 'Bed and Brownies'. In the old carpenter workshop of my father-in-law, completely renovated by Michiel, we would like to welcome you for a wonderful stay. We live right next to the studio with our children  and we are available as much as possible for your questions or a nice chat, although you can of course also retire. The studio is brand new, with beautiful new kitchen and bathroom, underfloor heating and electric auping beds for a great night's sleep. The Bed and Brownies is located directly behind the cozy marina in Scheveningen. The beach and the dunes are also within walking distance. Breakfast can be arranged in the fully equipped kitchen or can be enjoyed in one of the restaurants nearby at the harbor or in the pleasant shopping street Frederik Hendriklaan! No B of Breakfast, but Brownies, because of course I provide a delicious home baked treat on arrival.

description:
Welcome to Benoordenhout, where this 145m2 large apartment has it all. This 3-bedroom, large place is ideal for families or small groups seeking quiet and peace. It has a large living room and large roofterrace. Every room a balcony. Enjoy the sun.
With tv, internet, a fully equipped kitchen and laundryroom. It’s a joy to stay in this typical Dutch square. Ideally located, minutes from the city centre, beach, parcs and central station. Due to local regulation max 4 persons. Beware of cat.

name: Beach-style fishermans house by the sea
description:
This is a cozy, more than 100 year old fisherman's house. It is modernly renovated with a private garden. The house is very well located in a quite naborhood, only 5 min walk to the sea. Shops and cafes are nearby.

Guest have access to the entire house including: kitchen, living room, toilet, shower, bedroom and the garden.

The space
Entrance:
The house is entered by a long indoor hallway that is used as storage for our tools, bikes, wetsuits etc.

Garden:
Behind this area lies our garden through which you approach the little house. The garden has a lounge area and a table to eat outside.

Livingroom/kitchen:
Two big doors lead to the livingroom/kitchen area that has everything you need for cooking. Next to the living room there is a toilet and a shower.

Bedroom:
Upstairs is the bedroom with one queensize (140cm) bed, a few drawers for your personal stuff and a desk.

Guest access<
neighborhood_overview: Scheveningen is an old fishing town right at the ocean in  between two nature reserves.  Old style fisherman's houses are combined with modern buildings and a renovated boulevard. There are several watersport options on walking distance. For example there is a very good surfschool (The Shore) and kitesurf possibilities. Scheveningen has some nice shopping but also has the Hague city in it's backyard for the real city feel.

In case you want to go to the city center of The Hague, you can take tram line number 1, which will bring you through a scenic route passed the world forum and the peace palace, within 12 minutes. With tram line number 9 you can also go to the city center or to miniature city Madurodam.

The space
The apartment is completely yours as the space is seperated from the owners. It is new spacious, and bright. You can sit outside in the backyard or can get some more fresh (sea)air if you walk up the street.

name: Cheerful room near beach Europol OPCW World Forum
description:
Het huis is gelegen vlakbij Scheveningen en de dynamische stad Den Haag. Op loopafstand van het Strand, World Forum, OPCW, Europol, het prachtige Gemeentemuseum en Madurodam. Met bus lijn 28 van CS naar halte World Forum. Dan is het 3 minuten lopen naar mij. Binnen tien minuten bent u op het Scheveningse strand of in de stad. Het huis ligt in het rustgevende en heerlijke Statenkwartier en heeft een met andere huurders een gedeelde, royale heerlijke badkamer. Vrij parkeren op zes minuten lopen.

License number
0518 2A6F C1B8 DC7B FEF4
neighborhood_overview: Close to our house is a shopping street with a supermarket (Albert Heijn), restaurants, shops etc. The street is called 'Frederik Hendriklaan'. Thera are many coffee shops and bakery's with terraces were you can take breakfast or lunches. In the same street there also restaurants Chinees, Italiaan, Thai and snackbars. Not so far from our house is the harbor, 10 minutes walk. There are any all-kind of top restaurants. The beach is very near, also there all kind of restaurants.
host_about:
As a mother of five I have always tried to create a nice and cozy ambiance in our house. Now some of my children have left the house, I enjoy hosting people and making them feel home in this same atmosphere.

Every morning I try to make time to go to the forest to get a taste of the clean and fresh air in nature. Thanks to the location of our house it is also possible to visit the beach very easily. Sunshine or stormy weather: the sea is always a beauty to me!

I like to cook, read and love nature, but religion is most important to me. Religion and prayer gives me strength to do my daily tasks with passion and joy.

Hopefully we will meet soon.

Irene

name: apartment with beautiful garden, centrally located
description:
Cosy apartment close to the centre & beach

The space
The apartment is fairly compact (87 square meters) with a small sitting room, a large, cosy kitchen with table and chairs and access to the garden with seating and table / chairs accessible from the kitchen and downstairs bedroom. One of the two bedrooms is spacious, the second is rather smaller and is reached via a fairly steep staircase (see photograph) and is not suitable for use by small children.

Guest access
The whole apartment is available for your use. This is my home so you will find some of my possessions still around. However there will be plenty of space (ie in wardrobe, chest of drawers / cupboards) and of course all spaces will be clean and prepared for your stay.

Other things to note
Den Haag council charges €5,35 per person per night tourist tax. This is included in the charge for the apartment.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the popular Archipel neighbourhood. It has a supermarket diagonally across the road and specialty bakeries, cheese, fish and greengrocery shops as well as small cafes and cosy restaurants around the corner.  There are easy transport links by tram and bus from the neighbourhood with connections to the beach, city centre and both main stations (Centraal and Hollands Spoor).
host_about: I have lived in The Hague for a few years now and have found it a beautiful and welcoming city.  I have a dog and like long walks which are easy as the apartment is close to woods, parks and the beach.  Public transport is excellent and so the dog and I can get everywhere easily.  One of my hobbies is gardening and that is just as well as I have a lovely, sunny and cosy garden with many plants, shrubs, trees and comfortable seating areas.  My travel destination is usually the UK which used to be my home.
