name: Family home near the beach
description:
Cosy and comfortable home. Situated near several large parks and just 5 minutes away from the beach (by car) or a nice 15 minute walk through the nearby park that connects directly to the Beach.

This home is ideally suitable if you are traveling with kids and want to enjoy a nice holiday near the beach. Cultural visits, restaurants and shopping are found at Kijkduin beach resort or in the city center of the Haque.

You'll have a spacious private terrace(50m2) with sauna, relax chairs,table,etc.

The space
The house is located on ground floor. The house consists of three floors:
1st floor : hallway, bedroom, bathroom
2nd floor: living room, kitchen, terrace(50m2), toilet.
3rd/open attic: two bedrooms

The living room offers a large relaxing sofa and chair. The dinner table is back room next to the kitchen.

There is a spacious private terrace(50m2) with sauna, relax chairs, picnic table and (kamado) bbq grill
neighborhood_overview:
This house is in a quiet part of the haque. There is not much traffic around and you will find several nice parks with playgrounds for kids. You are near:
Beach resort Kijkduin (15 minute walk, 5 by car)
Beach resort Scheveningen with the famous harbor, SeaLife, Lots of shopping, restaurants etc. (30 minute by bus, 15 minute by car)
The Hague city centre with many nice cultural places to visit and lots of shopping areas.

For inspiration on places to visit see: http://denhaag.com/en
host_about:
I live with my family in the Hague. We have a lovely house near the beach that we love to share with other people several times a year, often during holidays.

It's always a pleasure to hear that quests loved staying at our house. There is a lot to do and to see in the Hague! 

I work as a software engineer and love to sport. Especially running is my favorite. From our house I often run through the dunes of Kijkduin to the harbor of Scheveningen and back.

Me and my family hope to welcome you in our house.

neighborhood_overview: Hardly any other city in Holland has as many attractions as The Hague. In this regard, the royal city by the sea occupies a leading position in Europe. Visit the parliament buildings or take a selfie in front of the world famous Peace Palace? Do you take a boat through The Hague's canals or relax on the beach of Scheveningen? One thing is certain: there is something for everyone! Check denhaag.com for all the details. Written in english, german and french. All this can be reach within 15 minutes by bike or tram.

name: Spacious and light apartment near dune and sea
description:
Spacious apartment of 95 m2 on the top floor of a traditional Hague apartment.
Suitable for a family with young children.
The entrance is on the first floor, after which you enter a large light hall with a large staircase. All rooms are located around this hall.

The property is suitable for 2 adults and 3 children.

The space
A large living room with kitchen. On the kitchen side is a small balcony with 3 seats.

In the kitchen there is a very large dining table with couch where you can linger.
The kitchen is equipped with a fridge, freezer, dishwasher, large 6-burner gas stove with oven, a combi microwave and all kitchen utensils.
In the living room a 3-sofa and 2 armchairs, TV with Netflix and DVD player.

At the rear is the master bedroom with a double bed, bedside tables and a wardrobe with space for hanging clothes.
Also in the rear a children's bedroom with a single bed. (90 x 1.90 m)

At the
neighborhood_overview:
The house is in a pleasant, quiet neighborhood with many families with children.
Immediately around the corner there are some local shops with 2 bakeries, a drugstore, an ice cream parlor with delicious ice cream, a cafeteria and a large supermarket that can be seen from the balcony.
There are also 2 playgrounds nearby. One on the ‘Irisplein’ and one behind ‘Kruidvat’ on the ‘Blauwe Druifjespad’.
A little further is the ‘Fahrenheitstraat’ with even more shops, including Hema.

But the most beautiful thing is that you can walk to the most beautiful dune area in The Hague with a short 10-minute walk (via the Kwartellaan). The Westduin Park where Scottish Highlanders graze. Another 10 minutes walk and you are at the quiet and beautiful Zuiderstrand. This is the beach of the locals in contrary to the beach of Scheveningen.
host_about:
Hoi! Ik ben Fanny, ik ben 43 jaar en woon sinds 6 jaar met mijn 3 dochters van 9, 12 en 14 jaar in ons mooie lichte appartement. 
Ik hou van koken en bakken, yoga en hardlopen of bootcamp in de duinen die vlakbij liggen. 
In mijn werk als coach en ook als interieurarchitect ben ik op dagelijkse basis bezig met het creëren van een fijne en geborgen plek in huis en in jezelf. Een plek waar je je thuis voelt en jezelf kunt zijn en waar je altijd naar kunt terugkeren. 

In de vakanties stel ik mijn huis open voor de verhuur. Vlakbij het strand en ook bij de stad is dit ook voor toeristen een super fijne plek om in 'thuis te komen' tijdens een bezoek aan de mooie stad Den Haag!

name: 3 Bedroom Villa 200m from The Hague Beach Kijkduin
description:
Whether you want a trouble free week with the whole family or a weekend away with friends, our 3 bedroom holiday home in Kijkduin The Hague (Den Haag) is the perfect get away and only 200m from Beach and Sea. Relax and unwind, take a long walk on the beach, enjoy the sea or be active and ride a bike on the most beautiful dune trails; everything is possible! A holiday in The Hague with all its cultural attractions is nearby.

The space
Our house is located on Kijkduinpark and what makes it so unique (besides the fact it's only 200 meters away from Beach and Sea) is that it has been furnished in a very cozy and comfortable way. So a nice big couch, a fireplace, a kitchen with all the necessities, etc. Lots of DVDs and three bedrooms all on the ground floor.

Guest access
The whole house is just for you!

Other things to note
The price includes tourist tax and includes bed linen and towels. So nothing is added.
There i
neighborhood_overview:
Beach Resort Kijkduin - The Hague
Beach Resort Kijkduin borders on a wide sandy beach, at the heart of a large swathe of dunes. Not too big, not too small. Kijkduin, The Hague's second beach resort, has a very cosy feeling about it. In this charming family resort on the south side of The Hague, stylish beach pavilions provide a wealth of enjoyment for children and adults. A variety of beach clubs and restaurants on the boulevard serve organic, fresh and delicious meals. The covered terraces are open all year round and heated in the winter. Sports lovers are also in the right place at Kijkduin. The Sand Motor peninsula, especially for wind and kite surfers, makes this the ideal place to learn the sport. Enjoy the sun, sea, sand, and get a taste of freedom in Kijkduin!

Ideal holiday resort
Kijkduin is ideal for a day out and for longer holidays. The beach at Kijkduin is quiet and clean with large swathes of dunes to walk or cycle through; kite surfing is wonderful

name: Sunny 2-floors apartment in Den Haag
description:
Lovely 2-floors apartment in the Benoordenhout area of The Hague. This is the house that we live and love. We rent it out when on holidays, so not that often.
We are happy to welcome professionals/students attending conferences and courses, as well as families with babies visiting the country. Guests will have access to all the property.

The space
Our apartment has the entrance on the ground floor, and the develops on the 1st and 2nd floors of a small condo. On the 1st floor, there is a big and lightly dining area with a well equipped kitchen, a modular dining table (the table can be extended up to 9 people) and a very sunny balcony. On the same floor, there is a spacious living room and a toilet. On the 2nd floor, there is a very big master bedroom with another balcony, a guest room (with double-sofa bed) and a kid room (with 70x140cm bed). Also on this floor there is a bathroom (with bathtub), a toilet and the landry. we also have a foldable single bed t
neighborhood_overview: We live in the lovely Benoordenhout area, one of the greenest in The Hague. The house is within walking distance of Clingendael park and Den Haagse Bos, and 15min biking from Scheveningen beach. The Hague Centraal Station can be reached in 10 min walking,  and public transports to the other train station are around the corner. It is also near A4 and A44 highways to Amsterdam, Utrecht and Rotterdam.
host_about:
I am Italian living in the Netherlands since 2013. I am an expert in communication for international organizations, so I worked and studied in many different countries and continents. I am a multicultural lover. 
Here in Netherlands I am living with Edoardo, my partner and mate in sharing life experiences. We both have a strong passion for travels, nature and adventures. And we have a 2 years old daughter named Aida, who is also learning travelling with us.

The Zeeheldenkwartier is one of the most pleasant and vibrant neighborhoods in The Hague. Numerous sights, shops, sympathetic restaurants and cafes, museums, local hip shops and beautiful Art Nouveau buildings. The neighborhood is very popular with The Hague Locals.

Magnificent new designed and renovated four bedroom apartment, brimming with unique design features and an abundance of style and class, housing eight people in The Hague’s Bomenbuurt.

Offering the ultimate city base for an extended family or a group of friends, this striking abode is certain to leave a lasting impression. Shielded from the tourist crowds, the residence ensures peace, comfort and the height of luxury for a memorable experience. Also The World Forum is just a 15 minute walk away

The space
Handsome wooden floors, floods of natural light, sleek décor and beautiful stained glass windows accentuate the living space, which grants an enticing spot for relaxation. During the warm summer months, a beautiful garden awaits with a trendy dining table and a sumptuous covered terrace. Back indoors, the open kitchen supplies all the essentials for home-cooking, with a bright dining space on hand to host memorable culinary occasions. Stylish and sooth
neighborhood_overview:
Idyllically nestled between The Hague’s historical core and its picturesque waterfront, the accommodation makes a fantastic city base for both business and leisure travellers. The neighbourhood enjoys a tranquil vibe unspoilt by the tourist crowds, boasting a variety of local gems. The nearby Fahrenheitstraat offers a great collection of stores and cafes, plus the nearest supermarket, which is accessible on foot in just five minutes. An eclectic array of eateries are also close at hand, with highlights including The Indian Curry House, Simply Thai and Brasserie Beekink and Co.

Exploring such popular landmarks as the Binnenhof and the Mauritshuis Museum is simple, as the nearby public transport links enable admission to The Hague’s bustling centre in 20 minutes. The beautiful coastline is even closer to home, which can be reached through a leisurely 15 minute bike ride through the surrounding woodland and rolling dunes.

name: Brugwachtershuisje Wijkerbrug
description:
Geniet van dit monumentale huisje gelegen aan de Vliet, direct naast de brug. Het huisje is het woongedeelte van een voormalige boerderij, jarenlang gebruikt als brugwachters post. De brug wordt nu op afstand bediend, daarmee verloor het huisje haar functie. Nu is het een heerlijke en prachtige plek geworden om te genieten van het leven aan het water. Vanuit het huisje heeft u ruim uitzicht over de Vliet

The space
Op de begane grond is een fijne woonkamer, een pantry (met vaatwasser, keramische kookplaat, kleine oven en koelkast) maakt het bereiden van een maaltijd mogelijk. Uiteraard zijn er koffie- en thee faciliteiten. Ook vindt u de badkamer met douche en toilet op de begane grond. Op de voormalige hooizolder (1e etage) is de slaapkamer, heerlijk slapen in een boxspring onder het schuine dak. Buiten zit u op het ruime terras genietend van het uitzicht over de Vliet met alles wat langs komt varen.

Guest access
Contactloze verhuur. Het ge
neighborhood_overview:
Voorburg is een fijne plek om te wonen. Een gezellig oud centrum met diverse leuke winkels en goede restaurants. Maar ook bij de gezellige Sluis in Leidschendam met leuke restaurantjes op loop afstand is altijd wat te beleven.

Ook de natuur is dichtbij, het water van de Vliet, maar ook de Noordzee is niet ver weg (15 auto minuten), op de fiets rijdt u zo de polders, met de bekende drie molens van Stompwijk, van het Groene Hart in.

Ook genieten van cultuur is dichtbij: met het OV (halte op loopafstand) bent u in 10 minuten in het centrum van den Haag. Ook Delft, Leiden en Rotterdam zijn goed en makkelijk bereikbaar.
host_about: 4 jaar geleden werd het brugwachtershuisje aangeboden in het lokale Krantje. Wij bedachten een spontaan plan om er een B&B in te vestigen. Na flink wat procedures en een grote restauratie en verbouwing is ons plan en ook onze droom gerealiseerd. U bent van harte welkom om op deze unieke plek te genieten. Wij Theo en Willeke heten u van harte welkom.

name: Pleasant Cozy room near Beach, World Forum, OPCW
description:
Our house is between Scheveningen and the old city of The Hague. Access: From Schiphol airport to my house. From Schiphol by train to Central Station (CS) The Hague. Bus 28 runs between The Hague CS starting point (bus platform) and Zuiderstrand endpoint. Our house is near the World Forum stop and then a 4-minute walk. This bus runs all day on all days of the week. The bathroom is shared with the other guests. That is why you should keep in mind sometimes a waiting time.

The space
This room has a private fridge and a sink. This room is popular because it's very quiet and light. This room has a kettle and mugs for coffee or tea. There is also a hairdryer available. A cupboard and a table were you can place your laptop and of course, there is a chair. Our house is located between Scheveningen and the dynamic historic city of The Hague. The Beach, The World Forum, International organization, Peace Palace, Madurodam, and the beautiful Gemeente Museum are within walki
neighborhood_overview:
Er zijn vele fijne restaurants op loopafstand. Op de Frederik Hendriklaan, circa 4 minuten lopen van mijn huis, tref je tal van heerlijke restaurants aan, zoals Pizzeria, Libanees, Thais, Chinees. Vele speciale koffie - ijssalons. Culinaire ontbijt met hun eigen verse bakkerij en koffiebars. En een echte Hollandse Snackbar, voor friet enzovoort.
Binnen een afstand van tien minuten tref je de beste verse visrestaurants aan. Natuurlijk zijn er volop ook vele winkels en supermarkets. Eet smakelijk en geniet! Irene
host_about:
As a mother of five I have always tried to create a nice and cozy ambiance in our house. Now some of my children have left the house, I enjoy hosting people and making them feel home in this same atmosphere.

Every morning I try to make time to go to the forest to get a taste of the clean and fresh air in nature. Thanks to the location of our house it is also possible to visit the beach very easily. Sunshine or stormy weather: the sea is always a beauty to me!

I like to cook, read and love nature, but religion is most important to me. Religion and prayer gives me strength to do my daily tasks with passion and joy.

Hopefully we will meet soon.

Irene

Take advantage of being close to beach, but still just 15min from The Hague city centre. Everything you need is within walking distance as well as plenty of entertainment, restaurants, outside space and public transport.

Our airbnb is registered 0518 6FDB 4FE5 FEFB 1C8A

The space
You will have the whole top floor of our house for yourself – this includes a huge bedroom, living area, kitchenette, luxurious bathroom (with rain shower) and a spacious Roof terrace. The floor is accessed via the main entrance of our house and requires to go up 3 flights of stairs. The only part of the house you share with the owners/host is the hallway to get to the top floor. The space is nearly 40 m2. As the airbnb is located in our house, from time
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is couple min walk from the beach. You walk out the door, go left and within no time you will have a lovely view of the boulevard, beach and sea. On the left Is the harbour and on the right is the famous Scheveningen pier. The Pier, Sea Life, Circus Theatre, and Lego Discovery Centre is all less than 10 min walk.

World Forum and Peace Palace are less then 10min by public transport (or about 20-30 min walk if you feel active). The Hague City Centre is easy reachable within 15min by public transport. And this Public Transport? Both Bus and tram are less then a minute walk from the house. You can’t get it any more convenient!

By public transport it will take you this long to get to the airbnb

From Schiphol – will take you 1 hour door to door

From Rotterdam (when arriving with Eurostar) – will take about 50min

From Eindhoven Airport – 2,5 hrs (door to door)

Let us know if you require help with public transport, h
host_about: Hi, I'm Santos - Loving life in Scheveningen, The Hague. Surfing is my main passion and am very lucky that most weeks there's a day or 2 where the waves are good (but cold! in winter). Besides taking care of the airbnb, I'm a stay-at-home-dad for our 2 daughters and little dog. Occasionally I go back to my previous career as a chef. My wife Simonetta, who co-hosts with me works full-time in software.

Feel free to use the washer/dryer combo, bath, rainshower, hairdryer, outdoor eating area,
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in a quiet neighbourhood in the hip area of the Hague: the well-known Scheveningen. Within 5 minutes you can:
-Take your towel and go for a swim in the sea;
-Sip a cocktail at one of the cafés on the boulevard while looking at the sunset on the beach;
-Take a stroll along the Pier, where you can go bungee jumping, zip lining or hop on the Ferris wheel to see Scheveningen from up high;
-Go for a walk or run in the outstretched dunes along the beach, see if you can spot a fox!
-Find a restaurant that fits your liking on the boulevard;
-Go windsurfing at the beach;
-Sport to the swimming pool, tennis court or bowling alley;
-See a movie at the cinema, a play at the theatre or take your chances in the casino;
-Take a tram to the centre where you can enjoy a day of sightseeing (Parliament, castles, the Peace Palace, Mauritshuis museum, Maduraudam, and classic old Dutch houses) and shopping!

description:
Set in a quiet street with canals all around and a few minutes walk to the quaint Old Rijswijk with its restaurants and shopping.
Easy and fast public transportation to The Hague Center, train Station HS, Voorburg, Delft and the up and coming Binckhorst neighborhood. Easy access to highways linking to the rest of the country.

The space
The remodel of this unit was just completed so everything is new, bright and clean .

Guest access
I will do my best to welcome you personally or provide a key at your arrival.

Other things to note
Please note: 1. for stays longer than 30 days an additional 50 euro cleaning fee per month will be charged. We will schedule our professional cleaners once a month for you.
2. Registration is possible. Additional charge of 35-40 euro per month as owners are charged per registered person.
neighborhood_overview: Neighborhod is very quiet. Lovely neighbors. Charming Old Rijswijk is walking distance as well as Old Voorburg with its reataurants and beautiful typical Dutch buildings.
host_about:
I share my time between The Netherlands and Portugal and happy to host travellers in both countries. 
I invested in those lovely condos in The Netherlands and newly in Lisbon, and I am very happy working with Airbnb on managing them.
I myself enjoy staying at Airbnb locations when I travel as I get to know the local people, their customs, food and also get lots of information where to visit. 
I promise as an Airbnb Super-host I will provide a very clean, comfortable and well equipped unit for you to enjoy your visit to the max!

name: Ideal family house at sea
description:
Our spacious beautiful house is the ideal family-holiday-stay. Enjoy the beach and boulevard at only 100 meters from our front door. Search for more quietness and nature and grap our bikes to explore the nature reserve of Meijendel with its dunes and wood alongside the coast. The Hague's shopping centre is around the corner. Amsterdam is a 35 minute drive by car. But you might feel just as comfortable back home in our garden, while the children take lessons at HeartBeach surf School!

The space
The house fits families perfect; people who like the beach, adore nature, have cultural interests or city lovers...Scheveningen has it all. The house is cosy and luxury furbished but practical. With three bedrooms a great place for a family of four. A nice garden on sunny side morning till 6 pm. Free parking at 700 meters in a save area.

PLEASE UNDERSTAND THAT WE DO NOT ALLOW GROUPS OF FRIENDS. THE HOUSE AND NEIGHBORHOOD SUIT A FAMILY LIKE OURSELVES BEST.
neighborhood_overview: Dunes, Beaches, Museums, Restaurants, Bars, Playgrounds, small shops, theme park for kids
host_about:

Please note that it is a Family House so for that reason and the community around us we do not rent it to groups of friends. Hope you do understand !  We will do everything to make your stay at Scheveningen a pleasant one and are sure that you will enjoy our place. 

Hope to see you soon!!

Greetings Jacqueline Marc and Leander

name: Beautiful little fisherman’s house near the beach
description:
Welcome in our beautiful white fisherman’s house!

The space
Welcome in our beautiful little fisherman’s house!
Dash to the beach for a surf. Dine at a restaurant. Cycle along the boulevard of Scheveningen. Go out for a run in the beautiful dunes. Picnic in the parks....All within walking distance!!

Why not make our fisherman’s house your favourite home away from home!
The house is ideal for small families or couples (unfortunately dogs are not allowed!) to enjoy all year round.

The fisherman’s house is located near the popular (surf)beach of Scheveningen.
There are week-end markets, fine food, shopping streets, cycle ways parks and nature walks everywhere
you look. Not to mention the famous casino and cinema Pathé at the center of the Scheveningen boulevard.

There is a small private garden and one bedroom.

Available NOW!

*Check-out: until 11:00 AM

Spacious family house centrally located. A perfect house for a longer stay: either for vacation or as home-basis while working for one of the international organizations.
The house is perfect for a family and suitable for small kids: we welcome them!
Spacious livingroom, garden, 3 bedrooms.

Guest access
When you take our house, the besides one room we closed and a cupboard the house is yours during your stay.

Other things to note
Non-smoker household: we appreciate if you're a non-smoker too.

name: Stylish studio between city center & the beach!
description:
A great base from which to explore The Hague and the beach. The brand new studio is thoughtfully designed to offer comfort and amenity you'd expect from a luxury hotel.

The space
- Studio on the first floor
- Free wifi
- Kitchen with combi-oven, fridge (small freezer) and nespresso and watercooker
- Large comfortable bed
- Linen and towels provided
- Bathroom with bath and rain shower
- Infrared heating

Other things to note
As you can see on the pictures, there is no stove in the apartment, and it's not allowed to bring your own. On the other hand, there is a combi oven / microwave and a lot of nice bars, lunchrooms & restaurants closeby!

name: Town house two minutes from Scheveningen beach
description:
Unique 19th century townhouse, only 2 minutes walk from the beach, in the quiet part of the vibrant beach resort of Scheveningen. 45 to 60 minutes from Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Delft, Leiden, Utrecht. Very spacious house with lots of daylight. Over 200 m2 living space, high ceilings, garden. Scatepark and playground in front, ideal for families. Shops on walking distance. Public transport (tram and bus) in front of the house. Minimum stay 5 nights, preferably more.

The space
The kitchen (dishwasher available) is on the ground floor with doors opening to the garden, scullery with washing machine. Mezzanine with bedroom (foulding bed) or game room (family games available). First floor spacious living room (fireplace NOT to be used, sorry....) with large couch and table. Mezzanine with bathroom (separate rain shower and bath, two sinks). Top floor three bedrooms, two with balcony. Pictures still shows a loft bed, that has now changed to a normal bed, pictures to follow
neighborhood_overview: Quiet part of the vibrant beach resort of Scheveningen. 2 Minutes walk to the beach, the Pier, boulevard, surf hotspots, ice cream shops, cinema, ferris wheel, restaurants, musical theater and Sea Life. Nearby Madurodam (miniature city). Few tramstops from downtown The Hague for shopping and musea. Shops for daily groceries (supermarket, bakery) in walking distance. One hour travel time to Amsterdam, 30 minutes to Rotterdam.

name: Sfeervolle parterrewoning, oud herenhuis met tuin.
description:
De woning bevindt zich in een sfeervolle en rustige straat (Valkenboskwartier). Zowel dichtbij de stad als het strand. Een populaire plek voor stelletjes die het heerlijk vinden om erop uit te gaan. Er zijn vele restaurants, musea en activiteiten in de buurt. Ook zijn er leuke koffietentjes op loopafstand, perfect voor ontbijt en lunch. Er zijn 2 fietsen tot je beschikking om je avontuur door de stad te vergemakkelijken.:)

name: Single room with 1 single bed & lots of space
description:
This 2 floor appartment is located at walking distance from Den Haag Centraal Station, stone trow away from the high ways and just right next to the city forest 'Haagse Bos.'

There is 1 room available for 1 female. In total there are 3 women living here ( incl the house owner) and 2 cats.
House is kept clean well.
* girls only*

The space
Come and enjoy being part of The Hague for a while.
This 2 floor appartment is located at walking distance from Den Haag Centraal Station, stone trow away from the high ways and just right next to the city forest 'Haagse Bos.'

1st floor: relax living area with huge dual kitchen with terras to sit outside. At this floor is one single room with own balcon. Toilets at both floors.

2nd floor: luxorious bathroom to share , second single room.
*girls only*

License number
0518 A942 63FF E789 F234
neighborhood_overview: This street is just the best; food, coffee, nice shops ...you will find it all!
host_about:
I  am Dutch Horticulture lecturer; often traveling to visit farmers worldwide.  I have lived in Kenya and South Africa before so I know what it takes to built up a life somewhere else. 
Secondly I am a swim school owner too ;  we teach adults how to swim in case they fear the water. Most of them are none Dutch. That makes me involved with the expat community which I enjoy a lot.

Airbnb offers me the opportunity to travel countries and feel a bit as a local at the same time. 
In return I love to host visitors . I rent out the whole house while I am away myself.  Or I lent out the spare room to a student for a couple of weeks. I enjoy sharing and having that energy  in my place . I try to help out if needed but am too busy to act as a tour guide etc. The student has her own space & freedom while living with me.

name: Family house with garden close to the beach
description:
Our spacious family house (200m2) with sunny garden is located in a child friendly area, very close to the beach. It is a perfect house for a family holiday.
Downstairs: living room with wood stove and open kitchen and large table. Upstairs: 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.

The space
You will have access to the whole house. The house consists of a large living room with wood stove and open kitchen. A sunny garden with a lovely veranda and a large dining table for a nice dinner outside.

On the first floor there are 2 bedrooms, 1 with a kingsize bed (180x200) and 1 with a single bed (90x200 ). The bathroom has a nice bath with separate shower. On the second floor there are 2 more bedrooms, both with single beds of which one can be made a double bed and another bathroom.

The house is situated in a quiet child friendly street with a playground. Easily accessible bye car or public transport.

In the area close to the house you find all
neighborhood_overview: Our house is located in a very child friendly area with a playground just one minute away from the house. The beach is easily accessible by bike (15 min), bus or car (10 min). A bus will bring you right to the city center or to the central station. It is possible to park (paid parking) the car in the street.
host_about: We are a family of 4 enjoying live in The Hague. We love to travel and explore new places!

name: 2nd private floor in family house
description:
Ideal for couples or friends wanting to stay in two separate, spacious and bright bedrooms. These two private rooms and the bathroom will be available for you on the second floor.  It is a beautiful and save neighborhood with a very central location. It is near the city center. The beach with nice surf spots and the Scheveningen boulevard with many restaurants and music bars are nearby. Across the street you find beautiful dunes for walking or biking.

The space
You have the whole second floor to your disposal.

Guest access
You will enter our house through the front door . As soon as you enter you will find the staircase.

Other things to note

name: Het 33 - 41 m2 Cozy B&B - Museum quarter - Centre
description:
Our 41 m2 B&B is situated in one of the most luxurious location of the center of The Hague, Voorhout, and located at a walking distance from many of the top points of the city.
Our apart boutique is a fusion of modern furniture and classical decoration - Dutch blue and oil paintings – giving contrasting harmony. It is prepared to make your stay cozy, comfortable, and pleasant.
A tourist tax of 5,35 euro per p/p p/night is included in the price.
Breakfast on request for 15 euro p/p.

The space
You will find amenities such as smart TV, WiFi, microwave, small fridge, iron, ironing board, plates, cups, glasses, cutlery and a Nespresso machine to enjoy a good coffee.
Het 33 is located on the ground floor of our house, but it is completely independent, with no common areas. The door opens directly to the street, no stairs or hallway. You enjoy 41 m2 of complete privacy.
After a full day in The Hague, you can relax in our separate boutique in
neighborhood_overview: It is located in one of the best neighborhoods: Voorhout, and is within walking distance of many of the city's main points: the Escher museum, the Hotel Des Indes, the Mauritshuis museum and Parliament, the central commercial area, the Central station , Noordeinde Palace (workshop of friendly Willem-Alexander), Panorama Mesdag, summer antiques market (April to October).

neighborhood_overview:
De woning van V&D ligt in Den Haag, Zuid-Holland, Nederland.

The sights of Scheveningen are a five minute walk from our house. The famous Kurhaus,
Afas theatre, casino, cinema, boulevard and Pier, to name just a few of Schevenings finnest. But if you like to see the city of The Hague, with its Musea or Houses of parlement, just take the tram or rent a bike (at verhuurscheveningen.nl at the Badhuistraat). Within ten minutes you are there.
So much to do so much to see.........come and explore!!!

name: Spacious apartment in hippest area of The Hague
description:
A spacious 2-room apartment / mini-hotel Floris IV in the lively Piet Heinstraat, with private bathroom and hotel facilities. There is a spacious living room with sitting area, large table and kitchen with free coffee (Nespresso) and tea making facilities. It's located in 'het Zeeheldenkwartier', in the center of The Hague, with many nice (take-away) restaurants and nice little shops.

The space
Book a complete hotel! Our mini-hotel / apartment Floris IV consists of two hotel rooms with private bathroom with a spacious living room with sitting area, large dining table and kitchen, located in one of the nicest streets in the center of The Hague. In good weather you can have a drink in the afternoon sun in front of the door (terrace). A parking space and bicycles (both for a fee) available.

Guest access
Book your own mini-hotel. The entire mini-hotel/apartment consisting of two private bedrooms with private bathrooms and large living room (we
neighborhood_overview: The hip Zeeheldenkwartier is within walking distance of the city center of The Hague. In this old multicultural city district of The Hague you will find a variety of nice home furnishings stores, trendy design stores, good breakfast & coffee shops, super cozy lunchrooms, cafés, real bakers, the best wine shops in the Netherlands, sunny terraces, a funky T-shirt shop and a tattoo shop. The beach can be reached in 15 minutes by bike and / or public transport. The major shopping streets can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.
host_about:
We zijn een familie uit Den Haag die zelf ook heel erg van reizen houden. In de zomer vaak naar warme landen (Griekenland, Italië, Frankrijk, Spanje en Thailand) soms zeilend of kitend, of gewoon lekker aan het strand! In de winter gaan we graag skiën. Sinds 2019 zijn we de trotse eigenaren van een mini-hotel/appartement in de leukste buurt van Den Haag: het Zeeheldenkwartier.

We are a family from The Hague, who loves to travel! During the summer to foreign Mediterranean or Asian countries. In the winter we love to ski! Since 2019 we are the proud owners of a mini-hotel / apartment in the nicest area of The Hague: the Zeeheldenkwartier.

name: Excellent appartement - quiet yet central
description:
I am looking for a very trustworthy and reliable single person or a couple who is interested to stay in my apartment​ for the time I am on holiday. The 1st-floor apartment with 2 balconies has a beautiful view of a Park, very bright when there is sun from morning till late evening.

The space
The flat is my privat apartment that I wish to sub rent to people who enjoy a place that is very quiet, yet very close to the public traffic facilities and the centre of The Hague.
Due to fast wifi (50 mps) this listing is ideal for guests who want to work from home.
The appartement is a stricly non-smoking space.

Other things to note
no pets, no partying, no smoking Appartement, use my stuff with respect, please.

description:
License number
0518B986B111EA2E9642
host_about: Hi! I am Donald. For work I travel all over the world and I am fortunate to see many different places. But to be honest: Scheveningen is my favorite, it is the homebase and I like all aspects of living in this town. name: Unique Ocean view beach apartment in Scheveningen
description:
Ocean view apartment right on the beach of Scheveningen next to the characteristic red lighthouse. Perfect for a beach get-away! Enjoy the sunset from our living room or step outside for a nice beach walk. Wake up to ocean sounds and ocean view from our master bedroom. Close to beach restaurants and shops.

The space
The house consist of three levels (95m2). The first level consist of the living and dining room area (with balcony), kitchen(with oven, dishwasher and cooking area) and toilet. The 2nd level has one master bed room (with option to split the double bed in two singles) and the bathroom including bad, toilet and a separate shower room. The attic includes the 2nd master bed room with both ocean and city view.

Free Wifi and Netflix.

License number
0518 BEB8 EDCF F4EE 47D5
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is right beneath the iconic Scheveningen lighthouse built in 1875. Scheveningen has lots of beach restaurants during summer time. We are a 5 minute walk from the Scheveningen harbour with many different dining options. From luxury sushi to fish and chips.

The Hague city center is only 20 minutes away with public transport. The Hague is rich in museums with art from many famous painters like Vermeer (girl with the pearl earring) and Mondriaan.

First time visitors should have look at the next sights:
- The pier
- Beelden aan zee has beautiful sculptures
- Het gemeente museum
- Mauritshuis

There are more things to do in Scheveningen than hang on the beach all day. Visit the casino, circus theatre, the pier or the indoor mall.

If you are more into activities. Rent a bike to explore the dunes or rent a surfboard and play in the waves.
host_about: Outdoor enthousiast. Surfing and kitesurfing are my passions besides chocolate!

name: Entire Apartment in The Hague w/ Private Garden
description:
Our 2 bedroom apartment is on the ground floor with a private entrance and private garden. It is located in the charming 1930's red brick neighborhood, the vruchtenbuurt (where all the streets are named after fruits). Just 5 minutes from Kijkduin Beach by bicycle and 15 minutes to the city center by tram, our apartment is perfectly situated for a holiday or work. Our home accommodates up to 5 people (including children). Borrow our bicycles for a beach day and relax in the private garden!

The space
Our 2 bedroom apartment has a bathroom with a sink and shower. The toilet is in a separate room in the typcial Dutch style. The master bedroom has a king size bed (190 cm) and the second bedroom has a bunk bed (90 cm) and a single bed (90 CM). The living room and kitchen are fully equipped with dishwaser, stove, oven, refrigerator, freezer and microwave. Feel free to use our pots, pans, dishes, and whatever you need to make your stay comfortable!

Gu
neighborhood_overview:
Like no other city in the Netherlands, The Hague is truly and international city in which you only need to speak English to get by! It offers a unique combination of city life and beach life.
In our charming neighborhood, The Vruchtenbuurt (the fruit neighborhood) all the streets are named after fruit. Built of red brick in the 1930s the neighborhood feels like a village where you can walk across the street for fresh fruit from the grocer, warm fresh bread from the baker, hot roasted chicken from the poelier, and flavorful sizzling kabab and turkish wraps at 'Pizza Corner'. You can mail a letter at the stationary store Primera and pick up a game from Koper Pion one of the largest board game stores in The Netherlands. We have a charming cafe, Appels en Peren where you can sit outside in the summer and watch the neighborhood children play in the park across the street and listen to the locals chat over coffee and sandwiches.
With events year round, The Hague is the fe
host_about: Hello!  My husband and I both a re educators and we have two daughters.  Because of our work schedule we love traveling during school holidays and long weekends.  We love hosting visitors in our home and always seem to have an international group of friends, family, and guests staying!  Our family is very conscientious, clean & neat, and responsible.  We always leave a home as tidy as it was when we arrived!

Vanuit de keuken

name: Nice ground floor family apartment near the beach
description:
A large 120m2, cozy, modern family ground floor apartment, with front and back garden. The fully equipped kitchen and living area are nice and light. The 3 children's bedrooms are ideal for young families. With lots of toys and room to play.
Enjoy the luxurious spa bathroom with whirlpool and double shower.
Only 10 minutes by bike or tram to the nearest beach and 15 minutes by bike or tram to the city center.
We accept families only (2 adults and up to 4 kids)

The space
Our house is perfectly located in The Hague right between the city center and the beaches. The house is about 120 m2 and has a little front garden and a large garden at the back, with playhouse and outdoor kitchen.
The living room and kitchen are connected, so it easy to have an eye on the children while cooking or stay in touch with the other guests. The kitchen has a large refrigerator, microwave oven, large stove, blender, coffee machine and waterboiler. The kitchen and li
neighborhood_overview:
The tree and flower neighbourhood is a vibrant neighbourhood close to the beach, sea, dunes and city center. Located only 10 min by bike or tram from the beach. Our house is situated in walking distance from shopping area and many playgrounds. City center is only 15 minutes by bike or tram. There is even a bus towards Scheveningen, with its boulevard and beach nearby. So if you prefer a little more action and activity, you're also situated perfectly.
With kids we recommend to take the bike down the street and to the right. Drive down the road till the end of the tramline 12. There you'll find a less crowded family beach with good beach restaurants.
The nearby shopping area has many coffee bars and restaurants.
host_about:
Hi, we are the family Brussee (Michael and Madelon). We have been together for more then 12 years. We are the proud mum and dad of three children in the age of 9, 7 and 4.  We are both high school teachers, which allows us to go on holiday for quit a long time. We like to travel with our motorhome all across Europe. We are an active family, we like to go hiking, skiing, sailing and cycling. 
We like to welcome you in our home,as we do often with guests. We hope you will feel yourself at home. It is a perfect place to enjoy the city.

description:
This beautiful big mansion (180m2) is located in the middle of the popular The Hague Zeeheldenkwartier. The house is renovated and has a fresh Scandinavian interior. A perfect house for a family with kids! Just around the corner you will find lots of cozy restaurants, bars, shops and parcs. Places close by are the the Peace palace, Panorama Mesdag, Madurodam, the National Parlement. The city centre is on 10 minutes walking distance and the beach at 10 minutes by bike or public transport.

The space
At arrival there will be welcome package including a short description of the neighborhood and places to visit.
Bikes are available and there is a lot of toys for the kids.
The house is perfect for a family with kids (from baby till teenagers).

neighborhood_overview: The Zeeheldenkwartier is one of the nicest city districts in The Hague. Located on the edge of the city center of The Hague, this is the area where you will find shops, lovely restaurants and cafés, sunny squares and beautiful Art Nouveau buildings. The most important shopping streets are the Prins Hendrikstraat, Zoutmanstraat, Piet Heinstraat and the Anna Paulowna street. In these streets your cool shoes, trendy design stores, galleries, small clothes shops, supermarkets and numerous specialty shops with special offers.

name: Lovely Bright apartment next to City center &Beach
description:
The perfect location to explore beautiful The Hague: near the city centre and the beach at only 15 minutes away!

in 2018 we renovated our early 20th century ground-floor home (1912) into a modern apartment with high sustainability standards, preserving traditional characteristics.

With large windows on multiple sides of the house, the place is full of daylight.

The apartment is equipped with a modern all-electric kitchen. Basic needs like towels and shampoo are available.

The space
The apartment consists of one bright living room with a kitchen, a bedroom, a room for the baby and clothes, a study-room and a bathroom and toilet. There is a garden both in front of the building and at the back.

The kitchen is equipped with electric stove, dishwasher, oven and all basic things you need. You can have dinner on either the large living room table,in the garden or at the kitchen-island bar.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is 10 minutes south of the city centre and 15 minutes east of the beach (bicycle minutes). It is an area with a nice combination of old dutch houses, hip coffee bars and a mixture of different cultures. The street is cozy and quit with very limited car traffic. Acces to public transport taking you to the city centre or the beach is just around the street corner.
We made an overview for you of all the nice things to do in the area (if we say so ourselves;)

name: Clean chic cozy home in vibrant part of The Hague!
description:
Welcome to our beautiful home in one of the most vibrant areas of The Hague!!!
Our apartment is a 180m2 old classical Dutch ‘Herenhuis’, i.e. the first and second floor as well as the attic including a breathtaking sunny roof terrace. Grab a glass of wine or a cold beer and enjoy the magic!!!

The space
The social area on the first floor comprises our living room with open fireplace (including 🍎 📺 etc pp) a dining room connecting with the open kitchen. From there you directly get out on our large and sunny roof terrace. Get your glass of wine or grab a beer and feel the magic…!

The second floor consists of two fully equipped kids rooms (one of them with a huge balcony), the bath room and a small laundry room including a washing machine as well as a tumbler.

In the attic you will find our master bedroom as well as a small office/guest room. But watch out folks: The guest room is only reachable via our bedroom. You have the possibility to
neighborhood_overview:
Weimarstraat is located in the wonderful Regentessekwartier right next to the super-hip Zeeheldenkwartier. In fact, Weimarstraat is to our opinion the coolest street of all. You will find cozy cafés next to art galleries, pubs, little interior design shops and grocery stores, a vegan supermarket or an ordinary one (just as you like), playgrounds for kids etc. pp.

Parking is for free in side streets until 18:00.

In case you would like to blend in perfectly with the colourful and lovely community surrounding you, we recommend you walk downstairs and get some inked art as an eternal memory of your stay in the tattoo studio located right next door. If that is a bit too much for you, no worries, the wine store including a wonderful small pottery will get you another sort of souvenir (which you can get rid of a bit more easily if you wish so).

The bicycle shop across the street will rent you your preferred means of typical Dutch
transportation. The beac

Multiple apartments for people that need a place to stay for the winter.

if you want to stay until at least February. We can offer you great rates. we have multiple studios available ranging from 1200 until 1600. We can offer the best prices for people that stay from till March/April . Please connect to us to discuss possibilities.

all apartments are fully equiped with kitchen and pricate bathroom.

name: Something special; house at the park/near beach
description:
Dit bijzondere en complete huisje is in het verleden door een architect onder handen genomen. De voorkant is gelegen aan het “Westbroekpark” en achter het huis bevindt zich een smal tuintje met duurzaam theehuisje/werkplek in een groene omgeving. Met 15 minuten wandelen staat u op het strand, het park ligt meteen voor de deur. Het gehele huis is voor jullie beschikbaar en wordt niet gedeeld met anderen. Het huis heeft een eigen ingang.

Den Haag registratienummer 0518 3C7E 6C6D E037 E87F

The space
Entrée met keukentje, deze is voorzien van een 4 pit inductiekookplaat en is compleet incl. pannen/borden en bestek, koelkast met vriesvak en spoelbak.
Badkamer met toilet, wastafel en douchecabine. Hoge en lichte leefruimte voorzien van zitbank, tuingericht. Metalen wenteltrap naar 1e etage, voorzijde slaapkamer met een 2 persoons bed, achterkamer met balkon en zonnescherm. Kelder met wasmachine en opslag.

Tuin met tuinstoelen en zitkussens,
neighborhood_overview:
Heerlijk rustig met een uitgestrekt park voor de deur en op loopafstand gezellige lunchrooms en koffietentjes. Alle overige voorzieningen zoals supermarkt etc. in een straal van de 1km.
Madurodam bevindt zich aan de andere kant van het park.
host_about: Jonge enthousiaste man, geniet van het strand en elke dag in dit unieke huis. Sportief aangelegd en doe veel aan watersport in de directe omgeving (surfen, kitesurfen) Kan lekker wegdromen bij elke zonsondergang.

name: Close to Central, quiet, clean&safe. Female only.
description:
This room is for Female Only. Relax in this quiet haven in a fully renovated grand old 'herenhuis'. It's a few minutes from the city center, 100 meters from tram and bus stops, 750 meters from Den Haag central Station. Great restaurants and Supermarket and convenience stores are only 100 meters away.
This home is one of the best streets in The Hague, in the Theresiastraat precinct. The Haags Bos (Central park/forest containing the Royal Palace) is a short walk away.

The space
You'll have your private room, sink, mirror, cupboards all you need. A nice clean, quiet room.
In the common area a view with skylights to let in the light.
Lovely kitchen and fully furnished.

Other things to note
Female only. Please remove shoes. Please wash your own dishes. Breakfast is not included, however, you are welcome to use the kitchen facilities. Supermarket is just up the street, very convenient.
Smoking is strictly prohibited in th
neighborhood_overview:
Good neighbours. Close to everything you need, it's all within easy walking distance. Forest, shops, transport, you name it...
It's a quiet, clean and safe neighborhood and it is very close to the park (Haage Bos/forest) and only a walking distance to THe Haage center (CBD). Very convenient. Tree-lined street, central, quiet, convenient. Supermarket only 120 metres away.
host_about:
My name is Cherlene Robson. I am married. 
I am a professional pastoral counsellor. 
I like to learn and respect different cultures. I am particular with cleanliness; your place will be tidy when we leave. 
Thank you and I look forward to get to meeting you. 
Cherlene Robson

name: Spectacular 200 sqm beach house!
description:
Very modern renovated house (200 sqm) with new furniture and luxurious equipment. Scheveningen beach only 300 meters away. House has completely been renovated and only the best materials have been used. Kitchen with 2 dishwashers, 2 ovens, cold filtered/sparkling and cooking water from the tap. Great garden for the kids with artificial grass, trampoline and slide. 2 Bathrooms with 3 showers and a bathtub. Amazing experience in summer! Only for families!

Other things to note
Supermarket and variety of shops around the corner.

name: Beautiful family house near the beach
description:
The house (116m2) is located in Oud-Scheveningen, a 5-minute walk from the beach.
It is a family home but also really suitable for 4 adults.

In the summer you can enjoy the beach life and the numerous beach bars. We can give various tips for a great stay. In the other seasons there is more than enough to do in the area. Beach, city-centre, parks, restaurants, shops, all within reach!

The space
The ground floor apartment is very suitable for families with children. There is a master bedroom and 2 children's rooms. The two children's rooms are located at the front of the house, 1 on the ground floor (with a bed, which can be converted into a double bed) and 1 in the basement (note: there is no window, but there is ventilation). The master bedroom is located at the back of the house.
The living room is wonderfully light and has a half open kitchen (fully equipped: big stove with oven, a big refrigerator and ice cubes-machine). In the living ro
neighborhood_overview:
It's a quiet neighborhood with many activities within walking distance.

In the neighborhood at 2 minutes walking distance:
Restaurants
Stores
Grocery store

Activities nearby at 5 minutes walking distance:
- The beach and the sea
- boulevard of Scheveningen
- Children's farm
- bike rental
- playground
- football field
- indoor pool

At 10 to 15 minutes walking distance:
- cinema
- casino
- Theatre
- Sea Life
- Surf rental
- a park where you can rent rowing boats

- The center of The Hague can be reached in 15 minutes by bus / tram.

name: Den haag The Whole House Free Parking
description:
Het huis is voorzien van milieuvriendelijke energie, warmtepomp en zonnepanelen.
Het water wordt gefilterd en is kalkvrij . Parkeren is gratis op de privé parkeerplaats. Het huis staat in zijn geheel ter beschikking. Openbaar vervoer naar het centrum van Den Haag en het strand van Scheveningen is op 3 minuten . Winkelcentrum Mariahoeve is op 5 minuten .
De Westfield Mall of the Netherlands Leidsenhage, 280 winkels, eetgelegenheden, ontbijt en lunch, op 5 minuten .

The space
De woning heeft begane grond, een 1e slaapverdieping(bed 160x200cm), een dakterras en een tuin met overdekte veranda met verlichting.
Voor de woning ligt een priveparkeerplaats die altijd beschikbaar is. Vooral in de zomer is de grote glazen schuifpui naar de tuin prettig. Er hangen inbetweens die inkijk en direct zonlicht voorkomen. In de maanden april, mei, juni is een langer verblijf dan 7 dagen bespreekbaar.

Guest access
De hele woning staat ter
neighborhood_overview:
De woning is vlakbij het paleis van de koning van Nederland gelegen. Zeer uitgebreide wandel en fietsroutes door de duinen en bosgebied zijn aangelegd en beschikbaar.
Op een paar minuten loopafstand zijn supermarkten, winkelcentrum- en NS station met een keur aan winkels en allerlei openbaar vervoeraansluitingen. Fitnesscentrum F4F is ook in dit winkelcentrum.
Op zo'n vijf fietsminuten afstand is het grootste overdekte winkelcentrum van Nederland (Mall of the Netherlands, Leidsenhage) met 280 winkels, 4000 gratis parkeerplaatsen.
Binnen een paar minuten zit je op de snelweg, het centrum van Den Haag ligt op ongeveer een kwartier fietsen en ook het strand van Scheveningen is gemakkelijk bereikbaar.
Daarnaast zijn er talloze voorzieningen en recreatiemogelijkheden in de buurt, zoals Park Marlot, het Haagse Bos en overdekt zwembad Overbosch.
host_about: La dolce vita, het goede leven, betekent in deze fase o.a verhuren via airbnb. Leuke mensen ontmoeten die hun reishart volgen.

name: Spacious attic room in mansion on a stylish canal
description:
Room with a lot of space (30 m2 / 6,5 x 4,5 m) in modern mansion (built 2010) at a quiet canal. Excellent location: walking into the centre takes 6 minutes, China Town 5 and the famous Haagse Markt 7 minutes. Parking in front of the house €1/hour. Two extra tall electrically adjustable beds (220 cm); extra mattresses present as well as a children's crib. Families are welcome. Guests have a private toilet and shower and there is a extra room with a tap, water cooker and DeLonghi coffee machine.

The space
The (bed)room is on the third floor of the house, so guests have to climb three flights of stairs. On this floor there is a laundry room with sanitary block that guests can use. The other enclosed space on the floor is for storage. Although guests enter through the communal front door and have to use the stairs also used by the family, they have plenty of privacy on the third floor where no one else is present and nobody will enter. name: Beautiful 4-bedroom family home near the beach
description:
Mooie licht huis met 4 slaapkamers. Open keuken, grote tuin voor en achter.

Beautiful newly renovated 4 bedroom family home near the beach (15 min walk) with vegetable garden surrounding the house and a private enclosed patio. Quiet and nice neighbourhood, free parking in front of the house. Two adult bikes (with 3 child bike seats in total) and a small kids bike available to use for free to explore the city or bike to the beach with the kids for a coffee at the local beach cafes/restaurants.

The space
Entire semidetached house in a quiet residential neighborhood. Quiet neighbors and ample space to play for kids in parks and playgrounds nearby.

On the ground floor there is an entrance area, toilet, living room with fire place, tv and Sonos, dining room, kitchen with a kitchen island and nespresso machine, fridge and freezer, Vitamix and plenty of other kitchen tools, a playroom filled with toys, a laundry room with washing machine, dryer,
neighborhood_overview: The dunes are close to our house and the beach is at walking distance. A 5 min bike ride or a 15 min walk away from the beach, where there are plenty of beachclubs (cafes/restaurants) to have coffee/breakfast/lunch or dinner. Our neighborhood is residential and quiet but there is a bus/tramstop close by to go to the city center. There are two shopping/cafe areas nearby (the Fahrenheitstraat at 7 min by bike and the Frederik Hendriklaan at 9 mins by bike). There are a lot of nice cafes and shops at both. The closest supermarket is a 4 min bike ride and there is a local bakery and a small greengrocer at 2 min by bike (or 4 mins by foot).
host_about:
Hi!

Me and my husband live with our two daughters (ages 4 and 6) and our son (3
Months). We are both lawyers and I am a passionate vegetable gardener in my spare time :)

We rent our home from time to time when we go on holiday. (This is not a professional organization renting out our house.) 

Hope to welcome you to our home some time!

Warm regards, Fleur & Hendrik

description:
Spacious two storey fishermans house close to the beach with a private garden.

The space
We have a spacious livingroom with a diningtable, fully equiped kitchen and a sofa to relax.

At the back of the house there's a door to our south-facing garden which is a great place to sit in the sun throughout the day.

On the first floor you Will Find the bedroom with enough space to put all your clothes. Across the hall there's a bathroom with a toilet and a great shower

name: Authentic Fisherman house close to the beach
description:
Authentic Fisherman house close to the beach in the traditional old neighborhoud of Scheveningen. This house gives you all the privacy and tranquility you need. There is sunny roof terrace with lots of green and great late evening sun. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need. Don't spend too much time inside, you can crawl to the beach (and take a lovely morning swim;)). Public transportation is around the corner and takes you in 15 minutes to the center of the Hague.

Guest access
You'll have the whole house available for yourself

description:
My house is at a 10 minute walk from the beach, the Kuhrhause, the Circustheather, boulevard and dunes of the Hague/Scheveningen. Many shops and restaurants are at walking distance. There is a large living room, a fully equipped kitchen and 2 bedrooms both with their own bathroom.
Also the tram and busstops are nearby to go to the centre of The Hague or to the Central Station for getting the train to one of the other great cities of Holland.

name: Room in big apartment, spacious, clean and light!
description:
This is a spacious apartment on the second floor with lots of windows to let in a lot of light in. The area is quiet, but facilities and public transport are all around the corner.

Bus 24 (to and from central station and city center) and bus 21 (to Scheveningen) are all within 5 minutes walking. Tram 3 is 10 minutes walking (to center and central station).

The bedroom has a 140x200cm bed and access to the balcony.

The space
The appartment has a clean and spacious feel to it. There is an area to work, an area to sit and relax and a dining room area. Also a balcony to enjoy the sunny weather!

Guest access
You have access to the whole apartment except my bedroom.

Other things to note
Please be aware of noise! The buildings are old so please consider that everybody lives very close to each other and can possibly hear you. After 10pm no more noise please. :)

neighborhood_overview:
This area is full of places to go and things to do. The Frederik Hendriklaan is around the corner (a shopping street) with any kind of shop you can imagine. Or to go out for dinner or buy groceries.
The albert heijn is a 5-10 minute walk from the appartment (groceries). Around the corner is a restaurant for pizza (la Tavola, and another new pizza place just opened).
World Trade Center is walking distance.

name: Spacious Family Apartment (150m2)
description:
Ons zeer ruime , gezellige City- Beach familiewoning, nabij het strand met winkels, lunchrooms, restaurants in de straat staat voor u en uw geliefden klaar.

Op 8 minuten fietsen naar het strand, waar u zich heerlijk kunt verwonderen in het prachtige UNESCO Werelderfgoed duingebied, bossen en stranden.

Ons appartement is uitermate geschikt voor gezinnen die Den Haag willen verkennen, te voet, te fiets, per OV.

The space
Een gehele woning (150m2) in 2018 volledig gerenoveerd met uitgebreid zonnig dakterras op het zuiden (70m2)

License number
0518 125C 88D3 34EC C683
neighborhood_overview: De Fahrenheit is al sinds 1920 een begrip in Den Haag. Elke Hagenaar weet de Fahrenheitstraat, en daarmee de Thomsonlaan en het Thomsonplein, te vinden en dat is niet voor niets. Deze winkelstraten in de geliefde Bomenbuurt zijn dé plek voor dagelijkse boodschappen en lekker shoppen. Nog altijd vind je hier de fijnste kazen, de heerlijkste broden en verse vis. Daarnaast zijn er ook een slager, groenteboer, notenboer, slijterij, 2 mooie supermarkten en nog veel meer leuke en lekkere winkels in deze buurt vlakbij het Zuiderstrand. Van kledingwinkels tot kleine filialen van grote winkelketens, Winkelgebied De Fahrenheit biedt genoeg mogelijkheden om ontspannen te shoppen. Klaar met winkelen? Geniet dan van een hapje en een drankje in één van de gezellige koffietentjes, cafés, lunchrooms of restaurants. Voor iedereen die buiten het centrum sfeervol wil winkelen, is De Fahrenheit een aanrader!
host_about:
Welkom wat leuk dat je dit leest,

Wij zijn Laura en Jan-Jaap twee Enthousiaste mensen, actieve Sporters, Moeder en Vader van onze Zoon en levensgenieters in de  Puurste vorm.
wij houden van ontdekken van de wereld zijn graag buiten en genieten van de liefde en mensen dichtbij. 
Welkom in onze fijne plek.

name: Light and cosy apartment
description:
Beautiful, light and cosy apartment perfectly located in the Zeeheldenkwartier area, one of the most trendy neighbourhoods of The Hague. The apartment has an open fully equipped kitchen, very homy and light living room, 2 bedrooms and a modern bathroom with a shower.

Lots of bars and restaurants are at walking distance. Supermarkts and tram stops are around the corner (in less than 10 min you are in the centre) . You will have a nice time here!
Please note this apt. is not suitable for children

The space
The 80 m2 apartment is located in a 2nd floor (no lift available).
Living room: with 65 inch TV. Fireplace give a cosy atmosphere however not yet ready to use. Main bedroom: double bed (1.40m x 2.00m), TV, closet and with french doors towards the balcony.
2nd bedroom: small, double bed (1.40m x 2.00m) and  closet.
Kitchen: equipped with everything that you need for a nice stay (coffeemaker/ dishwasher)
Smoking inside and pet

name: Gorgeous home for urban or outdoorsy adventures!
description:
A wonderful, spacious and well-located home that is perfect for the urban traveler or the outdoorsy adventurer.

From here, easily stroll through The Hague's historic city centre or the picturesque Haagse Bos forest. Prefer wide sandy beaches and gorgeous dunes? You're a short tramride away from the popular seaside town of Scheveningen.

Looking for a quiet retreat? Enjoy the peaceful Bezuidenhout neighbourhood, full of good restaurants and all the amenities.

We hope you enjoy your stay!

The space
The house is three floors. The main floor has a fully-equipped kitchen with all that you'll need to cook up a delicious meal (and a dishwasher to speed up the cleanup!). The kitchen opens onto a spacious living/dining room with high ceilings and lots of natural light. Throw open the back doors and walk onto the deck, or barbeque and relax in the private garden.

Upstairs, there are three bedrooms. The master bedroom has a ki

Spacious 200 m2 with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The stained glass windows at front- and backside of the house and the classic ornaments give the house lots of natural sunlight and style, Many great restaurants and bars within walking distance as well as public transport. Parking is available in the street

First floor

- separate toilet from the bathroom
- bedroom 1: two person bed

name: BizStay Harbour 62
description:
Spacious 3-bedroom apartment situated in the harbour of Scheveningen.

The space
This spacious apartment is situated on the second floor (elevator present). This apartment has a view over the North Sea. This apartment has 3 bedrooms of which both have a double bed (which can be separated). In addition, one of the bedrooms has a third bed. Both bedrooms have a flatscreen TV.
The comfortable livingroom has a flatscreen TV and open kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need during your stay; pans, pots, crockery, cutlery, glasses, a Nespresso coffee machine, dishwasher, water kettle, toaster and an oven/microwave. From the livingroom you have access to your own balcony overlooking the North Sea.

Both bathrooms have a double sink and a spacious shower, one of the bathrooms has a bathrtub.

There is a separate area for the washer / dryer.
This apartment comes with a private parking spot in the parking garage.

name: Authentic, spacious apartment close to city&beach
description:
Beautiful authentic spacious and light apartment. Recently renovated and newly decorated. Two master bedrooms and two bathrooms. Nice terrace for long summer days. Excellent location, walking distance to shops ie supermarket and bakery, forest (Scheveningse bosjes) (2min), and close to touristic highlights like Peace Palace (5min walk) and famous Art Museums; city center only 5min bike ride/15min walk. Beach&dunes (national park) 15min by bike or tram. Perfect for couples&families.

The space
Authentic dutch house from late 1800s with beautiful old ornaments. We are super proud to call this our home and given that we have lived ourselves in several countries and cities and really enjoyed staying at other people's homes we hope in this way we can also give other people the opp to explore the Hague and the Netherlands in a local very dutch way.

We love the fact that we have supermarket, bakery, restaurants and coffee shops within 2min walking distance and the fact that we can so easily run or bike to the beach and enjoy nature. If we feel like enjoying the city we hop on our bikes (5/10mins) and visit one of the Hague's beautiful musea.
host_about: Hi, I am Roger and live in The Hague with my girlfriend and our babyboy. We hope to share our new house with those of you that would like to explore NL and The Hague. name: Vrijstaand strandhuis in duinen met sauna en wifi
description:
Vrijstaand strandhuis in Kijkduin/Den Haag met privé sauna. Dit gezellig ingerichte en lichte huis is voorzien van alle gemakken, waaronder woonkamer met open haard, 3 slaapkamers, 2 badkamers en privé sauna. Grote tuin op zuiden met loungebanken. Het mooie strand is op loopafstand. Ons huis is gelegen op het Kijkduinpark waar je gebruik kunt maken van de faciliteiten: overdekt zwembad, supermarkt, restaurant, speeltuin, trampoline en fietsverhuur. Er is animatie voor kinderen in de vakanties .

The space
Onze woning is 110 m2 groot met een gezellig ingerichte lichte woonkamer met open haard en openslaande deuren naar het zonnig gelegen terras waar je heerlijk kunt relaxen op de loungebanken met kussens. Tevens is er een tuintafel met 6 stoelen. Er hangt een groot zonnescherm die op warme dagen genoeg schaduw geeft. Aan de woonkamer grenst de open keuken die is voorzien van vaatwasser, oven/magnetron, koelkast, Senseo koffiemachine en meer dan voldoende keukenger
neighborhood_overview:
Op het strand zijn diverse leuke strandtenten van begin maart tot na de herfstvakantie open waar je via het duinpad in een paar minuten lopen neerploft voor een drankje of voor een lekkere maaltijd. Ook is er in Ter Heijde een trendy strandtent die het hele jaar door blijft staan op het strand, met de fiets, auto of te voet via het strand bereikbaar . Op ons strand is een kiteboardschool en wanneer er wind staat zie je de kitesurfers in de lagune of op zee hun stunten uithalen. Tevens vlakbij is een supboard school. Een goed fietspad kronkelt door de duinen richting Monster, Ter Heijde en Hoek van Holland. Dus er is van alles te doen ook wanneer het minder goed weer is. Uitwaaien op het strand is altijd goed. Op het park is een goed gesorteerde supermarkt waar je 's-ochtends heen loopt voor de verse broodjes.
Voor golfers is er een uitdagende golfbaan op loopafstand. Ook de bowlingbaan is per voet bereikbaar.
Het centrum van Den Haag en de stranden/boulevard van Scheveni
host_about: Hallo, wij zijn Ron en Eveline en zijn de eigenaars van dit fantastische vakantiehuis. We heten u van harte welkom.

name: Prachtig familiehuis
description:
Prachtig bovenhuis met drie woonlagen op een centrale plek in Den Haag. Het strand en de stad zijn in de directe omgeving. In de buurt zijn talloze lunchtentjes, restaurantjes winkels en leuke kroegen. Om de hoek is het Koningsplein met een prachtig grote speeltuin.
In het huis zijn vier grote slaapkamers met tweepersoonsbedden. Het huis is licht en knus. De keuken is voorzien van alle gemakken. Het hele huis is onlangs gerenoveerd. Het is een niet-roken huis!

name: Private bungalow steps away from Kijkduin Beach
description:
Cosy and homey 6-person secluded bungalow in Roompot’s Kijkduinpark, surrounded by lush forest, dunes, sand and sea. Within walking distance from the second largest beach in The Hague: only the famous Dutch dunes separate the bungalow from the expansive Kijkduin Beach, with views of the New Waterway, the innovative Sandmotor and Scheveningen. A peaceful place to stay, whether it be for business or pleasure!

The space
The bungalow offers room for 6 people, with 3 bedrooms housing 6 beds in total. In 2 of the rooms these can be pulled apart or combined as a double bed, as you prefer.
The bathroom is equipped with both a bathtub and a shower stall, and a separate restroom is situated at the entrance of the bungalow. The open kitchen is fully equipped and offers plenty room to prepare meals and dine at the large dinner table. The living room has comfortable chairs and couches, a large flatscreen TV and a fireplace to enjoy the cold Dutch winter weather comfortab
neighborhood_overview:
The bungalow is conveniently located right near the entrance of the park and next to the parking lot. The park itself has many amenities such as a pool, bike rental, shops and restaurants, all available to you.

The surrounding nature offers plenty routes to hike, walk, jog or cycle. The Solleveld natural reserve is situated next to Kijkduinpark. You can play a round of golf at Ockenburg golf course or gaze at the sky from James Turrell’s “Celestial Vault” (Hemels Gewelf), an artificial crater built in the dunes.

At easy walking distance are several beachclubs, mainly open during the summer months. Kijkduin center has plenty restaurants all year round, from Dutch pancakes to pizza, ice cream parlors and fine dining.
host_about: Hello, we are Jasper and Frances. We are two working parents and have been living in The Hague most of our lives. Jasper works as a nurse on a first aid and Frances has job as a manager. We both love traveling, music and sports like skiing, surfing and biking next to spending quality time with friends and family. The bungalow has been in our family since the start of Kijkduin park and would like to share the beautifull things this unique place has to offer.  We always enjoyed the peace and quit this perfectly located bungalow has to offer in combination with activities like surfing, biking and walks around the nearby estate.

We are Hotel Pistache, a small boutique hotel with 9 comfortable suites. We are ideally located between The Hague’s city and beach, with view on the famous Peace Palace.

Our suites are ideal for couples, families or business travellers and are equipped with many comforts. A luxurious, homely feeling is the standard.

No traditional hotel with busy lobby, but facilities in the room to enjoy from there The Hague and Scheveningen.

The space
This suite is more like your own apartment in The Hague! Because of its royal kitchen with long dining table, where you can enjoy endless dinners with friends , family or colleagues. Quietly situated on the back, you will find a spacious living room with a semi-separate bedroom. A perfect apartment for a family or travelers looking for an extended stay in The Hague!

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
We are on walking distance of Noordeinde, The Hague beach, all main embassies, NIBC, The Hague World Forum, Bronovo Medical Centre and the International Crime Tribunal.

The Zeeheldenkwartier is one of the nicest city districts in The Hague. Located on the edge of The Hague city center, this is a neighbourhood where you will find many authentic shops, pleasant restaurants and cafes, sunny squares and beautiful Art Nouveau buildings. No wonder that the Zeeheldenkwartier is very popular with locals!
The main shopping streets are Prins Hendrikstraat, Zoutmanstraat, Piet Heinstraat and Anna Paulownastraat. Here you will find a variety of nice home furnishing shops, trendy design shops, galleries, small clothing shops, supermarkets and numerous specialty shops with special offers.
In short: definitely worth a visit if you want something different!

name: Beautiful apartment with patio close to the beach!
description:
With a hammock in both the living room and outside in the private patio you can completely relax. The charming apartment from 1900 is stylishly furnished and recently renovated. After a walk of only 10 minutes along the old fishermen's houses in Scheveningen you find yourself on the beach. The apartment is fully equipped and nearby are nice cafes, restaurants and a good bakery. The neighborhood is very quiet, except for a seagull here and there!

The space
The apartment has two bedrooms. The master bedroom has a beautiful en-suite bathroom, a 180 x 220 cm bed and doors to the patio. The smaller bedroom has a single bed measuring 90 x 200 cm with a desk, sink, washing machine and also a door to the patio.
For a fourth guest we have a comfortable inflatable mattress available that can be placed in the living room.
The kitchen is equipped with many appliances and kitchen utensils, including a dishwasher and a large fridge and freezer.
The house is loca
neighborhood_overview: There are nice cafes, restaurants and a good bakery nearby. The neighborhood is very quiet and safe. Within a 10-minute walk you are on the beach and within 5 minutes you are in one of the many surrounding parks. The center of Scheveningen is a 5-minute walk away and the center of The Hague is 10 minutes by bike.

name: Vrijstaande luxe strandhuis mèt tuin in Kijkduin
description:
Deze smaakvolle ingerichte en lichte huis is voorzien van alle gemakken, waaronder woonkamer met ruime serre, open haard, nieuwe moderne keuken, prachtige tegelvloer met vloerverwarming, 2 slaapkamers en een ruime badkamer. Er is een grote tuin op het zuiden. Het mooie strand is op loopafstand. Ons huis is gelegen op het 4 sterren bungalowpark "Kijkduinpark" waar je gebruik kunt maken van de faciliteiten: overdekt zwembad, supermarkt, restaurant, speeltuin, trampoline en fietsverhuur.

The space
Op de begane grond is een grote woonkamer met open haard een comfortabele hoekbank. Er is een moderne open keuken met een grote ovale eettafel en een apart toilet.
De keuken is nieuw en voorzien van alle luxe, o.a. een afwasmachine, inductie kookplaat, heteluchtoven, magnetron, dubbeldeurs koelkast, nespresso apparaat, etc.
Er is gratis WIFI in het huis, met goede ontvangst en er hangt een flatscreen tv, met digitaal ontvangst. Er is een dvd speler, een digital
neighborhood_overview:
Bijkomen in alle rust en heerlijk vakantie vieren in eigen land vlak aan zee ?
Het geluid van de golven kun je vanuit je hangmat horen.

name: Spacious Harbour & Beach apartment (117m2)
description:
Very light and spacious (117m2) apartment 3 min from the beach, 2 min from the Harbour, next to a city-forest and around the corner of the Hague famous boutique shopping street.

The space
Nice and very spacious apartment, with living room of 60m2, just 2 minutes walk from the Harbour and 3 min by bike to the beach. Two bedrooms of which one normally functions as a child sleeping room. The apartment is not rented out via airbnb professionally, this is our home. You will still see personal touches in the house,like pictures, art and toys. For us this is central in the foundational airbnb philosophy.

Guest access
All rooms are available for the guests.

Other things to note
We always make sure our house is clean and tidy. All bedlinnen is freshly washed, toilet and bathroom are cleaned with extra care. We normally live here with young kids, so you could find some toys here and there.

host_about:
We're back to our beloved city The Hague. We lived in Goma, Congo (DRC) for the last two years. The two years before we lived in the heart of Africa in the most relaxt and beautiful city BUJUMBURA, Burundi and Kampala, Uganda. 

We are blessed with two beautiful  kids:) 

We love traveling, doing sports together like climbing and cycling, having dinner and drinks with friends and fantasize about future travel destinations. Where we cannot live without? The beach! 



Best wishes,

Keoma & Irene

host_about:
As a mother of five I have always tried to create a nice and cozy ambiance in our house. Now some of my children have left the house, I enjoy hosting people and making them feel home in this same atmosphere.

Every morning I try to make time to go to the forest to get a taste of the clean and fresh air in nature. Thanks to the location of our house it is also possible to visit the beach very easily. Sunshine or stormy weather: the sea is always a beauty to me!

I like to cook, read and love nature, but religion is most important to me. Religion and prayer gives me strength to do my daily tasks with passion and joy.

Hopefully we will meet soon.

Irene
