name: Licht en modern appartement bij het strand (6 mnd)
description:
Vanwege een rondreis door Europa bieden wij ons heerlijk lichte appartement in Scheveningen aan. Het appartement is 65 m2 en bevindt zich op de 2e verdieping van een jaren ‘30-woning. Het appartement is in uitstekende staat, volledig gemeubileerd en van alle gemakken voorzien. Het aller mooiste: je bent een minuut lopen verwijderd van het strand in Scheveningen. Het centrum van Den Haag is 15 minuten fietsen of 10 minuten rijden. Het appartement is te huur per 1 mei 2022 voor max. 6 maanden.

The space
Het appartement is 65m2 en bestaat uit een grote woonkeuken, lichte woonkamer, 1 slaapkamer, badkamer en separaat toilet. Ideaal voor 1 persoon of een stel. Perfect als je een surf- of strandliefhebber bent en toch dichtbij Den Haag Centrum wil wonen of in de stad werkt.

De woning is opgeknapt in 2019, dus in uitstekende staat. Het appartement is van alle gemakken voorzien: Samsung tv, Sonos-audiosysteem in alle ruimten, wifi, Project platenspeler, espre
neighborhood_overview: Oud Scheveningen is het mooiste en oudste deel van Scheveningen. In de buurt vind je traditionele vissershuisjes, een gezellige winkelstraat, de haven en veel gebouwen die doen denken aan de tijd dat Scheveningen nog een echt vissersdorp was. Het is bewust een weinig toeristisch stadsdeel. De Keizerstraat ligt op 3 minuten lopen. Hier zijn diverse supermarkten, drogisten, bakkers en gezellige koffietentjes. Ook kun je hier de tram naar Den Haag Centrum nemen. Op 1 minuut loopafstand ben je op de Boulevard aan het strand. Dit stuk strand wordt ook wel het sportstrand genoemd aangezien je er volop kunt surfen, beachvolleyballen, skateboarden en fitnessen. Het strand is erg populair onder jonge mensen vanwege de hippe strandtenten en -winkeltjes zoals Hart Beach, Xirinquito en Aloha Surf. De haven is 5 minuten lopen. Hier kun je terecht voor een vers visje!

In het hart van het trendy Zeeheldenkwartier, op 15 minuten van het strand in een uniek industrieel monument - voormalig melkfabriek De Sierkan - overnacht je in onze compleet gerenoveerde en met designmeubelen ingerichte studio op heerlijke bedden van Auping!. neighborhood_overview:
ZEEHELDENKWARTIER
één van de gezelligste stadswijken aan de rand van de Haagse binnenstad. Een buurt met veel authentieke winkeltjes, sympathieke restaurantjes en cafés, zonnige pleinen en prachtige jugendstil panden vindt. Geen wonder dus dat het Zeeheldenkwartier enorm geliefd is bij de Haagse locals. Kortom: zeker een bezoek waard als je net even wat anders wilt!

Sfeervolle pleinen en levendige straten
Het Zeeheldenkwartier ontstond aan het einde van de 19e eeuw toen de bevolking van Den Haag sterk groeide. Het voormalige landelijk gebied, grotendeels eigendom van koningin Anna Paulowna, werd na haar dood omgevormd tot een woonwijk volgens een recht stratenplan met twee centrale pleinen, het Anna Paulownaplein en het Prins Hendrikplein. Deze twee sfeervolle pleinen vormen ook tegenwoordig nog het hart van het Zeeheldenkwartier. 's Zomers vind je hier tal van gezellige terrassen. Om de twee pleinen heen liggen levendige straten met ieder een eigen karakter. De To

The living room has a wood burner.
There are lots of toys and games.

Other things to note
There is only a tv in the master bedroom.
If wanted it can be put in the living room. It has a Chrome cast so works everywhere you put it.

name: Studio Mazie
description:
This completely renovated studio apartment is located in the historic center of The Hague, in a very quiet side street of the busy Noordeinde, built in the old coach house from 1600.

Modern combined with classic details, fully renovated in 2021.

The space
The 50 m2 apartment is located on the ground floor and consists of one large space with a high ceiling and an enclosed bathroom
The bed is at height and can be reached with a staircase
Bathroom with rain shower, sink and toilet
Kitchen with fridge, oven, induction stove, and dishwasher
Proper dining table
Separate desk with 2 workstations and wireless internet
Lounge sofa with smart television
The apartment is fully equipped.

Guest access
Best way to get around is walking or by bicycle.
Also public transport is nearby.

Public parking nearby (on the street) for 2 euro per hour.
Some areas are free from Friday 5:00 PM till Mo
neighborhood_overview:
Right in the historic center of The Hague within walking distance of the work palace of King Willem Alexander, located in a very quiet side street of the busy Noordeinde.

There are many shops and galleries around the corner from the apartment.
There are also plenty of breakfast, lunch and dinner options.
Fresh baguettes and croissants at Traiteur Le Gone.
Fresh pasta at Trattoria da Gianni.
A chic dinner at restaurant La Passione.
Or Spanish tappa's at restaurant Triana.
And coffee with cake or pie at Dolly's or The Bookstor.

description:
Make yourself at home in an icon of modern architecture. Within the spectacular De Passage building, Cove Centrum is in the very heart of The Hague’s shopping district. Inside, soulful and individually designed studios give you the space to live and work, with a comfortable lounge and co-working area to enjoy too.

The space
In The Hague for a short stay? These 29m2 studios are designed for solo travellers or couples, and have all you need in one open-plan space.

name: Bright double beach house at Scheveningen
description:
When we are out of town we would love for other people to enjoy our house. Everyday feels like holiday. The previous owner renovated 2 fisherman houses (from 1905) and turned them into one beautiful house. Its a super authentic, bright place where you will feel at home the moment you enter.

We have a big rooftop terrace with barbeque, room for 7 people, a surfboard and skateboards, so hopefully you will enjoy our house and Scheveningen as much as we do.

Hope to see you soon!

The space
We live in a courtyard, so while you are close to restaurants, shops, and the beach (3 mn walk), you can still enjoy the silence of the courtyard.

The house has a dining room, kitchen, living room and bathroom on the ground floor and 4 rooms, a small attic and roof terrace (30m2) on the first floor.

Guest access
The whole house.

License number
0518 8C85 05C7 C95F 855D
neighborhood_overview: 3mn walk from the beach, many restaurants and cafes in the area and a 10mn bike ride to the centre of The Hague
host_about:
Hello,

We're Jeen & Frederiek and since january 2022 we have our own beautiful place in Scheveningen. For surfers like us, its the perfect place to live and enjoy the beachvibes. It still feels like holiday (almost) every day.

When we are out of town we would love for other people to feel at home like we do and experience some good surf, walks, coffees and nice restaurants.

You're more than welcome!

name: Complete Apartment in the City Center of Den Haag
description:
This is a 2-bedroom apartment in the middle of the city center of Den Haag, which makes it a perfectly accessible place ideal for sightseeing. This is a great place for a pleasant, easy stay in Den Haag. There are two bedrooms, one with a double bed (or two single beds) and one with three single beds. There's also a sofa bed in the living room (or flexible folding bed) for a 6th guest.
The accomodation has its own parking place, WiFi, utilities, smart TV and a nice garden (smoking allowed)

The space
There is one sleeping room on the ground floor with 3 single beds with an own toilet. Furthermore, there is a kitchen, living room (with space for a 6th guest) and a garden where smoking is allowed. On the first floor, there is a sleeping room with a choice between two single beds or one double bed. This room is connected to the large bathroom with a toilet.

Guest access
The entire appartement is available for the guests.

A clean, light and spacious apartment situated in the remote vruchtenbuurt in The Hague.

name: Large and luxurious townhouse in Zeeheldenkwartier
description:
Chique, spacious, and comfortable 19th-century townhouse in the coolest, hippest, and inclusive part of the city with many bars and restaurants right next door. Yet, our home is quiet and clean, and spacious walking trails close by and 15 minutes biking to beach. Ideal destination for families, culture buffs, hikers, bikers, nature lovers, and city explorers!

The space
Three story 19th-century townhouse (200m2)fully renovated for family and kids. We love luxury and are happy to share our new and comfortable design furniture, fully equipped kitchen with high-end appliances, two spacious bathrooms with one hot tub, and a rooftop terrace where you can enjoy both sun and shade and enjoy your meals at our dinner table for 8. Comes with airconditioning, excellent beds, separate study, and separate game/HD-TV cinema room with Bose surround.

Guest access
Comes with our bikes + shared electric cargo bike. At arrival you will receive access to variou
neighborhood_overview:
The Zeeheldenkwartier area has it all: eclectic shops and restaurants from countries all over the world, hipster and bohemian bars and cafes, populated by friendly and cosmopolitan people from all walks of life.

The area is just next to the city center of The Hague, with a vibrant jazz scene, cinemas large and small, and many world-class museums. Bike distance to Delft, close to Amsterdam and Rotterdam

At the same time, on walking distance you can find serenity and beauty on walking trails all the way to the beach and the dunes. The city of The Hague has many (previously royal) estates that are now open to the public so that, together with the dunes and ocean, it has been ranked the 3rd greenest city in the world.

We will make you a list when you arrive.
host_about: Before we became a a family of four, we have traveled a lot across the world (for business and pleasure).  We know what travelers like, and love like the AirBnB concept because we are tired of hotels :-)

Enjoy your summer days at this spacious two level apartment near the beach of Scheveningen. It's situated close to shops and restaurants in the heart of the old village part of Scheveningen. In and around the apartment it is light and quiet. Enjoy dinners and evenings outside on the terrace and go for a dive in the sea at sunset. The space
A two level apartment with at the first level two bedrooms, a dining / living with open kitchen area. Near the bedrooms there's a separate toilet and the bathroom. Guest access

name: IVY Comfortable & stylish apartment near beach
description:
Classic apartment with contemporary interior located in the Bloemenbuurt. Close to Scheveningen and stop streetcar 3 to downtown The Hague. Parks, forests and dunes within walking distance. Several stores, restaurants and playgrounds nearby. The house has 1 bedroom with a double bed plus a room that can be closed off for a baby bed. Open kitchen to the living and dining room, a semi-enclosed home office and a partially indoor spacious balcony, separate toilet and a recently renovated bathroom.

The space
Spacious apartment on the second floor of building from 1922. Private entrance via porch (stairs). High ceilings with large windows for lots of natural light. Good insulation. Kitchen with modern appliances. Comfortable bed. Maximalist furnishings.

Guest access
The apartment is fully accessible to guests. In good faith my personal belongings are in the space. 1 room in the apartment is yet to be refurbished and has no function at this time.
neighborhood_overview:
A fifteen-minute bike ride from the city center and the Hague beach resorts of Kijkduin and Scheveningen is a lively, pre-war residential neighborhood with a mix of homes in different architectural styles. You will find many flats and porch houses, but also a fair number of single-family houses and downstairs and upstairs dwellings. Characteristic of the neighborhood are the fourteen squares.

The Fahrenheitstraat, Thomsonlaan and Thomsonplein are the places to store and do your daily shopping. Here you will find the finest cheeses, the most delicious breads and fresh fish. You can also enjoy a snack and a drink in one of the cozy cafes or restaurants such as: Bagels & Beans, Burrata or Brasserie Beekink & Co. On the Goudsbloemlaan you will find a large supermarket and several (fresh) specialty stores.

The Bloemenbuurt has a lot of green. Along the Segbroeklaan is a wide green strip with the Haagse Beek and walking paths. And for a walk through the dunes you won't

name: Prachtig herenhuis met veel ruimte
description:
Prachtig herenhuis vlak bij het strand van Scheveningen en Kijkduin , 220 m2, 4 slaapkamers, 2 badkamers en een ruime vrije tuin

The space
Ons huis is ruim en licht! We hebben 6 slaapkamers en 2 badkamers. Daarnaast hebben we een eettafel waar je met gemak met een wat groter gezelschap kan eten. Onze zonnige tuin is gelegen op het Zuiden en ligt aan een watertje én aan een ecologische zone waardoor je heerlijk wegkijkt op het groen. In de tuin hebben we 2 loungebanken, BBQ en een ingebouwde trampoline. Het strand is op 15 min rijden en het centrum op 20 min rijden. Om de hoek is een winkelhofje waar je de supermarkt, bakker, slager, visboer etc vindt. Parkeren kan in de voortuin. Kortom een luxe grote woning voorzien van alle gemakken!

Other things to note
- Het strand is op 15 minuten rijden
- Het centrum is op 20 minuten rijden
- Amsterdam is 40 minuten rijden
- Snelweg is 5 minuten vanaf ons huis te bereiken
- Wink
host_about:
Hi,

Ik ben Ruud en samen met mijn vrouw Miranda heb ik 2 prachtige kinderen. Een dochter en een zoon. We vinden het heerlijk om op reis te gaan en mooie plekjes op de wereld te verkennen. 

Sinds kort stellen we ons huis ook beschikbaar, als wij zelf op reis zijn. Zo kunnen de mensen van ons prachtige huis genieten en wij nog vaker een reisje maken ;) 

Tot ziens!

name: Hosted by Wendy SEA SKY duinvilla
description:
Stevige wandelingen, een rustig groot strand, gezellige strandtenten in het seizoen. Prachtige fietsroutes en een bruisende Den Haag. Alles is binnen handbereik vanuit SEA SKY duinvilla. Dit vakantiehuis heeft absoluut de mooiste ligging van Den Haag: vrij gelegen in de duinen aan de zuidwestelijke grens van Den Haag en de buitengrens van Kijkduinpark in beschermd Natura 2000-gebied. Geniet van het grote terras van de natuur en de adembenemende wolkenpanorama's .

The space
Toegang tot het huisje, welke een woonkamer, eetkamer, open keuken, badkamer, slaapkamer en een kantoor heeft.
Genoeg ruimte, veel licht en een heerlijke grote tuin rondom het huis, met heel erg veel privacy.

Guest access

name: Charming 2-bedroom Apartment near Beach & City
description:
A well-decorated apartment with antique furniture and art creates a balance and harmonious atmosphere.
Ideally located, a 5 - 10 minute drive from the beach and city centre and a 4 -minute walk to the ICC.
Busses to the beach, city centre and stations are accessible 2-5 mins from the apartment.
In the Willem Royaardsplein: Albert Heijn supermarket, florists, laundry service, post office, fish monger, cafes and Indonesian food are to be found.
The quaint Van Hoytemastraat are 20 mins away.

The space
The apartment is in the Benoordehout area. It is on the second level of a low-rise building. It has a main entrance and a lift access to the unit. The apartment has a 2-bedroom, a spacious light living space, an open kitchen with bar stools, a bathroom with shower, a WC, a small laundry room and a coat room. The kitchen and master bedroom have doors leading to the southwest sunny balcony.
The apartment is sought carefully with antique fur
neighborhood_overview:
Conveniently located between Scheveningen beach and The Hague City Centre. Next door to ICC International Criminal Court. Two bus lines 23 and 20.
Shops and restaurants at Hoytemastraat and Albert Heijn Willem Royaards plein.
Relaxed walking options are plenty: parc, forrest, dunes and beach all within walking reach (Clingendaal, Waalsdorpervlakte, Haagse Bos).
Attractions: Madurodam, Gemeente museum, Museum Voorlinden, Louwman Car museum.

name: Bright & airy home with sunny garden in The Hague
description:
Our light and airy home is located in the vibrant Valkenboskwartier. Put on a record, grab a book from our personal library and put your feet up in the garden.

Restaurants, bars and shopping (Weimarstraat, Fahrenheitstraat) are a 5 minute walk away. City centre is a short tram or bike ride away and - most importantly - you can bike to the beach in just 10 minutes .

The perfect spot to relax after exploring the famous sights of The Hague.

The space
- 1 spacious bedroom with 1,5 bath (guest linnen and towels included)
- Large and cosily decorated living space
- Kitchen is comfortably sized, includes island and all amenities provided
- South-facing garden
- Books and records at your disposal
- We aim to make sustainable selections when it comes to bathroom, bedroom and kitchen supplies for our guests

You have the entire apartment to yourself but I will be reachable by phone if there's anything you need he
neighborhood_overview:
Our home is located in the relaxed and vibrant Valkenboskwartier neighbourhood. Shops, bars and restaurants in the Weimarstraat and Fahrenheitstraat are just around the corner. Surfers can be seen riding their bikes with their surfboards as the beach is only a short bike ride away. The Westduinpark dunes and Zuiderstrand beach are beautiful areas for walks or bike rides. If you're on your way to the beach, be sure to get some fresh fish at the Scheveningen Harbour and check out the Scheveningen Boulevard. Surf hires are available there.

You can also walk to the Frederik Hendrikstraat (Statenkwartier), de Prins Hendrikstraat (Zeeheldenkwartier) or the city center of The Hague in 20 to 30 minutes. By public transport or taxi the city centre with famous historic sights is only 10 to 15 minutes away. Near the Frederik Hendrikstraat you will find the popular Fotomuseum Den Haag and Kunstmuseum Den Haag.

Be sure to ask us for any tips! We are happy to help you explore
host_about: 'Hagenaar' since 2020 together with my husband Steven en our dog Noa!

name: Charming 19th century family home, newly renovated
description:
Spacious home with old world charm in a beautiful urban neighborhood, shopping and nightlife just steps away. Suitable for families, couples, or friends.

The space
We live in a three story 'bovenhuis' which means 'above house' in Dutch. This means when you enter the front door you walk up a set of stairs and you are home. On the first floor we have a toilet room, living room, dining room, and open kitchen. On the second floor we have two large bedrooms (one double bed, one twin bed), one small bedroom (a baby room with crib), a master bath with a bath tub and shower, and a toilet room. Off of one bedroom there is a terrace with the BBQ. On the third floor there is a large bedroom with a double bed, an office, and a bathroom with a shower and toilet.

Guest access
The entire home including the outdoor terrace

Other things to note
Free guest parking is available upon request

neighborhood_overview:
The Valkenboskwartier is very central, so you can be on the beach and in the city centre in no time . You don’t have to go far to find fun things to do. There are plenty of nice coffee shops and restaurants in the area where you can have a drink or a bite to eat. The district also has great shopping streets like Fahrenheitstraat and Weimarstraat, where you will find the larger chain stores, but also unique little boutiques.

The Valkenboskwartier is a diverse area, with a fun mix of people who share a pleasantly laid-back attitude. The district is creative, down-to-earth, multicultural and international. It’s also child-friendly, with plenty of fun for families. In other words, it’s ideal for young people, with or without children.

name: Arty ground floor apartment with sunny garden
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

The apartment is fully equipped with everything that you might need for a sweet getaway. Start your day with a coffee in our beautiful, sunny garden, where you can enjoy the sun (and the shadow) almost the whole day in summertime. Dogs allowed!
We’ve got two bikes for you to use to get around. The city is less than 10 minutes away, there’s nice bars close to our neighbourhood, and the beach is a 15 minute bike ride. Enjoy!

The space
We have a ground floor apartment of a corner house. You enter in a spacious hallway, from which you then enter the second part of the hallway with all the rooms attached. The living room is at the front of the house, which is super bright and has an open kitchen with all amenities (every herb and spice you can wish for, for all the cooks on here ;)). Next to the living room is the workspace, and next to that the bedroom. On the other side of the hallway are
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a quiet neighbourhood which is a perfect base to explore the city and beach. There’s supermarkets close by, and also all kinds of other shops (Hema, books, pharmacy, etc.) in a street 5 min walking distance from our house.
From our place it’s only a short bike ride to a bigger and cosy shopping street/area with ice cream, bars, cafés, and design shops. In our home you’ll see a map with our favourite places to go, and you can always ask us for tips!
Public transport to the city center and the beach is around the corner.
host_about:

neighborhood_overview:
Duinoord is a district in The Hague, which is part of the borough Scheveningen, situated between the Laan van Meerdervoort, Conradkade and Groot Hertoginnelaan. In the center of Duinoord the pittoresque Sweelinckplein is located, surrounded by playful and varied buildings thank to an architectural contest in the 19th century, where each architect had to design three adjacent buildings. The streets are mostly named after musicians. At the Reinkenstraat you can find many cozy lunchrooms and authentic shops. Because Duinoord is located between the city center and the beach, it’s a very popular district.
On the other hand you have the Frederik Hendrikstraat (for locals seen as ''Fred'') which is a long shopping street with all kinds of shops, basically everything what you need for your stay.

name: Stylish 3-bdrm apt. w/ terraces next to the beach
description:
Stylish Art Nouveau house (1904) with renovated original details & high-end appliances. Located in the heart of prestigious, lively, family-friendly Statenkwartier, the house is walking distance away from restaurants, shops, museums, & the beach. Round-the-clock sunlight & sunset views are guaranteed in every room and on each terrace. Equipped with a home cinema, fireplace, & BBQ for cosy nights in! Loft-style living area, 3 bedrooms, 3 terraces, 2 toilets, jacuzzi, & shower.

The space
The apartment was built in 1904 in an Art Nouveau style with lots of original details and fully renovated with modern appliances.

Size: 194 sq. m. with 3 Bedrooms

Ground floor:

- Private entrance with storage, bikes, and large fridge.

First floor:

- Open L-shape living & dining area (‘loft style’), full of natural light around the clock. Approx. 80 sq.m. High-end home appliances, carefully selected furniture, lamps, and plants
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of the most prestigious part of The Hague - Statenkwartier - the apartment is just around the corner from the bustling Frederikhendriklaan full of quaint restaurants, cafés, and shops.
The least crowded beach of the city, Zuiderstrand, is only a stone throw away. You can take a dip in the sea or simply stroll on the pier in just 5 minutes by bike or 12 minutes by foot.
If you’re looking for some culture, you’re in luck. Simply walk 5 minutes down the street and you’ll arrive at the city’s art hub - the Photo Museum, Gemeente Museum, and Museon.

Are restaurants more up your alley? Then the harbour is the place to be. Filled with beautiful sunset views, luxurious yachts, and delicious restaurants, De Haven is simply 10 minutes away by foot.

In the mood for a city day trip? Amsterdam and Rotterdam are within 45 minutes by car and Schiphol airport is 30 minutes away.

neighborhood_overview:
The house is in Benoordenhout area, which is one of the most beautiful areas of The Hague. It has green avenues and streets, large nature parks such as Oostduin, Arendsdorp, the Haagse Bos and Clingendael are a stone's throw away. But you are also in the city center (5 up to 10 minutes) in no time and the beautiful Meijendel with her beaches are within 10 minutes cycling.

At various locations in the district (Van Hoytemastraat, Willem Royaardsplein, Weissenbruchstraat) you will find a wide range of artisanal specialty shops and you can go for your daily shopping. You will also find some exclusive fashion and home furnishings stores and a wide range of nice restaurants and bars. If you like to be sportive there are several options as well, like tennis, paddel, horse riding etc.

Benoordenhout is a green residential area with many recreational areas within walking distance.
host_about: I’m Nadine, experienced traveller and we love to stay on beautiful spots. We enjoyed the houses of other families during our trips and we thought to share our family house as well. We have a background in the hospitality industry and still like it to go the extra mile. We love interior design and we take a lot of effort and care to keep a house as beautiful as it is. It can happen with us that we have made some small changes in the house, compared with the pictures you saw, but always with the idea to improve it. We expect our guests to take care of the house as if it’s their own, which we always do ourselves as well when we are guests.

name: Stylish & spacious apt. near beach & city centre
description:
Come and enjoy the dunes and the beach from our beautiful, spacious and stylish apartment (3 floors, 140m2). Scheveningen is a relaxed sea side resort with a long, sandy beach, an esplanade, a pier, and a lighthouse. Our home is a fifteen min dune walk from the beach. There is also ample to do when the sun isn't shining, such as the aquarium, lego land, bowling, cinema, casino, theatre, museums and many great shops and restaurants. The Hague city centre is a 20 min bus or bike ride away.

The space
A staircase takes you to the 1st floor of our 3-floor apartement. The lounge has a comfy sofa, a fire place and a nook for reading and working. The en-suite dining room can be closed off from the lounge by the original stained glass sliding doors.

Our dining room offers space to 8-10 people and leads to the open kitchen with dish wasker, quooker, combi-oven, fridge/freezer and everything you need to cook a nice meal. French doors lead to the balcony.
<
neighborhood_overview: Belgian Park is a beautiful, quiet neighborhood in the northern part of Scheveningen, adjacent to Meijendel nature reserve. The neighborhood has nice shops, wonderful bakeries, cafes, restaurants and a supermarket within walking distance. You can walk to the famous Kurhaus of Scheveningen in fifteen minutes, where you will find many more amenities, including a casino, cinema, bowling alley, Legoland discovery center, aquarium and bungee jumping and of course the famous boulevard. You can reach the center of The Hague and The Hague Central Station in 20 minutes by bus or bicycle.
host_about: Big smile. People person. Love travel, hiking, yoga, dancing, reading, the arts, good food & great conversation. Passionate about people, social justice, great ideas and taking action. Curious and straight forward :)

name: Lovely family home at a fantastic location!
description:
In this centrally located accommodation, everything for your family is within reach. With the beach just a 10-minute bike ride away, playgrounds and parks within walking distance and the cosy city around the corner, the possibilities for fun things to do are countless. Other cities can also be easily visited. Just 5 minutes away you are on the highway, to visit a city like Amsterdam. The trains are 10 minutes by bike and 5 minutes by car. In short, a fantastic house at a fantastic location!

The space
A cozy and comfortable living room looking out over our lovely garden. The kitchen is fully equipped with a stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher and large fridge. There are three bedrooms on the first floor with one bunk bed (90x200) and one bed that converts into a double bed (80x200). The bathroom with a shower is connected to the master bedroom which has a double Auping bed (160x220). There is a separate toilet. neighborhood_overview: Charming quiet small street around the corner from bustling shopping area. 10 min walk to forest. One block to denneweg and Den Haag Royal Historic Center. Access to Embassies and International Organizations.
host_about:
I work in international affairs.  When travelling for work or for pleasure, I cherish home-feeling places and thoughtful local hosts.  As a guest, I will take care of your place as if it were mine. 

Because of my travels I have learned about cross-cultural hospitality. And I put all that into my hosting, in Mexico and The Hague. 

I know Mexico City very well and will give you great tips. My shared place is open to respectful individuals. The room in the lovely art deco apartment in Mexico City can allow you to live the Mexican Chilango life in a chic, or also in a down to earth way. Your choice, because that is what you will find in Condesa. 
In The Hague you will be in a unique location connected just bordering the gorgeous historical center, within the international organisations and Embassies sector, with a 10 min drive to the beach Scheveningen, North and  Zuid beaches and close to the exits of the city to visit the Randstaad and the surrounding Dutch countryside. 

We speak English, French, Dutch and of course Spanish.

0518 0B33 B6EF 383D 458B
neighborhood_overview: Prins Hendrikstraat is one of two lively hip shopping streets in zeehelden  with small creative shops , restaurants and good takeout food. Groceries at coop, 2 night shops and a UK / US expat shop with many products my Scottish wife misses in Europe. In between the City Center with its shops and Dutch Institutions & museums  and the Parks with most of the International Institutions and the larger Museums it’s ideally located for city trips. 3 Tram lines connect you to main stations (central CS & Hollands Spoor HS) and the 3 North Sea beaches (Scheveningeb , Zuiderstrand & Loosduinen) which are also easily accessible by bike. Don’t forget your swimsuit and bring your surfboard if you have one.
host_about:
I am a Landscape Architect, father of 3+2 children remarried to a lovely mother, living in Zürich and near Paris.
I love landscapes, architecture, cities and their inhabitants in all their local varieties. I travel often for teaching, design & surveys of landscape architecture and for my pleasure with family. As traveler I either chose characteristic small hotels or book myself at private house via AirBnB and others.
Starting from my own architecture developments I am renting out since 2008.
I am your host in 3 very different architect’s houses on AirBnB with local hosts Billie & Lova,  Kurt, Sang, Justine, Paul & Andreea. 
Landscape Achitects Chalet Pigniu in Switzerland is my own design built in 2004 with DGJ Architektur and local builders. 
Landscape Architects Hofje is a former printshop housing in The Hague. It was refurbished by an architect-couple who lived there until i bought it as my private residence in 2015. In 2022 we finally got permission to rent 30 nights per year.
In Zurich i rent a dream rooftop lofty I designed it for myself but now rather stay with my wife elsewhere and with my children below. As a professional designer of living environments and sideways host I like to get inspired from other people's way of hospitaliy in an authentic manner to improve our own. As a traveler I never look for „best practice“ or , worse „standard“ properties - which you will probably also not find at those homes of mine. 
Until 2019 I was an estate manager of urban boutique estates Parques Guesthouses. In Kralingen Rotterdam 2014 and Rietberg Zürich 2016 we provided 8 rooms each in typical local family townhouse or apartment until 2019. They where managed by my former business partner Mascha and we had up to 7 extra staff. 
You will find more host reviews on Parques in Mascha Leummens profile who now runs Parques Pico in Wassenaar on her own.

The space
Deze zeer ruime woning (140m2) heeft 2 etages.

Op de bovenste etage is het woongedeelte, met een ruimte open keuken, kookeiland (waar u lekker aan kunt eten), wijnkoeler, quick mill espressoapparaat, apart woon en eetgedeelte. 55 inch smart televisie met Netflix.

Guest access</
neighborhood_overview: Scheveningen is een gemeente gelegen vlakbij het strand en heeft de populairste badplaats van Nederland. Met zijn lange stranden is Scheveningen in elk seizoen een heerlijke plek voor jong en oud. Er is veel te doen, denk aan watersport, wandelen, heerlijk dineren, shoppen en meer. De buurt is rustig en centraal gelegen, en omgeven door veel groen.

name: Lovely neighbourhood, near the sea
description:
Our place is located in a pleasant neighborhood with many terraces. The location is exactly between the sea and the city center of The Hague. Both are 2km, 10 minutes cycling or 25 minutes walking from our home.

The space
We would love to host you. Below some information about our room. Do you have any questions? Please don't hesitate to contact me!

Calm
We live in a quiet street/neighborhood. In the evening it is nice and quiet and you hardly realize that you are in a city :)

Coffee and tea
The room is on the third floor. Facilities such as coffee and tea can be found in the room.

Bathroom
The bathroom has a bath, shower, toilet and two sinks. You share the bathroom with my partner and me however we generally try not to use the bathroom during guests' stays. If you would like to know if you can use the bathroom privately, please send a message. Most of the time this is the case but sometimes it is not possible.
host_about:
Wij wonen in een mooie bovenwoning (uit het jaar 1895) in een gezellige en rustige buurt in Den Haag. Om de hoek vind je meerdere leuke koffietentjes zoals 'Fleur's koffie' en 'Lolapalooza' ook zou je kunnen ontbijten bij het gezellige 'Pompernikkel'. Daarnaast zijn zowel het centrum als het strand slechts op 2 km afstand. Deze afstand is voor de meesten te voet of te fiets goed te doen echter zijn beide ook goed bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer. 

Ruimte
Het bovenhuis heeft 3 verdiepingen. Op de tweede verdieping is de badkamer. De badkamer heeft naast een wastafel, toilet en douche ook een ligbad. Wij hebben shampoo en douchegel waar je gebruik van mag maken. Op de derde etage is de kamer waar je mag komen verblijven. De kamer is met een deur afsluitbaar. In de kamer zit ook een kleine wasbak. De kamer heeft een authentieke uitstraling en vooral met de regen is het slapen in deze kamer erg knus! 

Geen huisdieren
Wij hebben zelf geen huisdieren. 

Vragen?
Als je vragen hebt, stuur dan vooral een berichtje:)

There is a stylish living room and dining area with an open kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped and here you can enter the balcony too.

Have a lovely stay.

The space
About this space
Comfortable 2-bedroom apartment located in Bezuidenhout.

The apartment
This apartment is located on the first floor (own front door) and has 2 bedrooms. Both bedrooms have double beds. The bedroom at the back of the house has French doors to the balcony. There is a shared bathroom with a separate toilet in the hallway.

Both bedrooms and the bathroom open onto the hallway, from which the
neighborhood_overview:
The Hague, South Holland, Netherlands
The apartment is located in Bezuidenhout. This apartment is very centrally located; within walking distance of the central station and Laan van Noi station. You have the shopping street Theresiastraat around the corner where you can find many shops, supermarkets, restaurants, and cafes.
Transport options
You can use 2 bicycles. Public transport is within walking distance to the beach and the center.
host_about:
I rent out my house when I am away for work or on vacation myself. So this is my home and I want my guest to feel it is their home too during their stay. The house has all the comfort you might expect of it as I take good care of it. I only accept guest that will do that too and that respect the neighbourhood (which is amazing). 

You can expect a lot of recommendations for activities, restaurants and coffee bars in the area during your stay.

description:
The space
Our 35-38 sqm Suites XL with separate kitchen are the ideal choice if you are looking for a suitable apartment for two and have therefore been furnished to our highest modern standards. The Suites feature a fully equipped separate kitchen, a comfortable box-spring bed (1.60 m) including a modern smart TV, as well as a private modern bathroom with floor-to-ceiling shower to make you feel right at home. In the living area, a very nice herringbone parquet flooring has been laid, which gives your Suite even more charm. In case of dirty laundry, you have the possibility to wash your clothes in the shared laundry room. Therefore your apartment offers everything you need for a stay with us in just one room.

Your apartment will be accessible 24/7 - there is no curfew.

We have several Suites at this property, each designed to give you a comfortable place to stay - while our style & amenities are consistent, the layout, and design may
neighborhood_overview: Discover the largest Dutch city by the sea! Our centrally located limehome Den Haag Keizerstraat offers the perfect place to unwind and explore The Hague's wide range of art and culture. You can reach the long & wide sandy beaches in 6 minutes by foot, the Royal Palace in 15 minutes and the Central Station in 24 minutes by bus. Restaurants, cafes and bars can be found in the immediate vicinity of our limehome. Please note: Our suites on the 1st & 2nd floor can only be reached via a narrow, quite steep staircase.
host_about:
At limehome, we believe that everyone deserves a better place while travelling. A place to look forward to return to. A place of comfort and convenience. Simply a place designed to stay®. Whether you are looking for a home away from home or a quiet place to work - our homey Suites feature high-quality fittings including a 4-star hotel bed for restful nights & suite dreams. Our digital-enabled guest journey without a physical reception and staff on-site makes your stay more convenient. 

Should you still need our help or have questions, our customer service is available 24/7 by phone. 

You will receive the access codes on the day of arrival by e-mail and SMS. Please note: In order for us to generate your personal access code, you must complete our online check-in. You will receive the link and instructions by e-mail after your booking.

Whether you are looking for a home away from home or a quiet place to work - our homey Suites feature high-quality fittings including a 4-star hotel bed for restful nights & suite dreams. Our digital-enabled guest journey without a physical reception and staff on-site makes your stay more convenient. 

Should you still need our help or have questions, our customer service is available 24/7 by phone. 

You will receive the access codes on the day of arrival by e-mail and SMS. Please note: In order for us to generate your personal access code, you must complete our online check-in. You will receive the link and instructions by e-mail after your booking.

name: Den Haag Keizerstraat | One-Bedroom Suite
description:
The space
Our 39 sqm One-Bedroom Suites are the ideal choice if you are looking for a suitable apartment for two and have been furnished to our highest modern standards. The Suites feature a great fully equipped kitchen with small dining table where everyone can come together. The separate bedroom with comfortable box-spring bed (1.60 m) provides excellent rest. The room layout is rounded off by two private bathrooms with shower, one of which is located in the separate bedroom and can only be reached through it. In the living area, a very nice herringbone parquet flooring has been laid, which adds even more charm to your Suite. The historic beams, which were incorporated into the interior of the apartment provide a pleasant homely atmosphere. In case of dirty laundry, you have the possibility to wash your clothes in the shared laundry room. Therefore your apartment offers everything you need for a stay with us.

Your apartment will be accessible 24/7 - there is no
neighborhood_overview: Discover the largest Dutch city by the sea! Our centrally located limehome Den Haag Keizerstraat offers the perfect place to unwind and explore The Hague's wide range of art and culture. You can reach the long & wide sandy beaches in 6 minutes by foot, the Royal Palace in 15 minutes and the Central Station in 24 minutes by bus. Restaurants, cafes and bars can be found in the immediate vicinity of our limehome. Please note: Our suites on the 1st & 2nd floor can only be reached via a narrow, quite steep staircase.

name: Den Haag Keizerstraat | Suite L with terrace
description:
The space
Our 30 sqm Suites L with terrace are the ideal choice if you are looking for a suitable apartment for two and have been furnished to our highest modern standards. The Suites feature a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable box-spring bed (1.60 m) including a modern smart TV, and a private modern bathroom with a floor-to-ceiling shower to make you feel right at home. In the living area, a very beautiful herringbone parquet flooring has also been laid, which gives your Suite even more charm. The room layout is rounded off by a private terrace on the ground floor, which also offers you enough space to enjoy the last rays of sun in The Hague. In case of dirty laundry, you have the possibility to wash your clothes in the shared laundry room. Therefore your apartment offers everything you need for a stay with us in just one room.

Your apartment will be accessible 24/7 - there is no curfew.

name: Apartment with garden terrace, BBQ, free parking.
description:
Relax in this stylish condo in between city center and beach. All comforts indoor, while serenely situated in lush greens of a private garden and large park on either side.
Be in a jump and a beat in the beautiful old city centers of The Hague or Delft with a broad choice of shops, musea, and wonderful restaurants. Or, in the same time, find yourself on a beach for a calming time on the seaside.
Round off the day on your garden terrace with a BBQ'd meal, and/or glass of wine at the open fire.

The space
The property comprises of a private entry/hall, living space, bedroom, spacious bathroom, and private garden terrace:
- The living space includes a work desk and chair, sitting area with large screen TV, dining table, and well-equipped kitchen space.
- The quiet garden-side bedroom offers a high-end Haestens (Swiss) bed, and closet space.
- The bathroom is outfitted with a bubble bath with jets, a deluxe shower, and new washer and dryer
host_about:
Hi, our names are Arnold & Weili. Over past 25+yrs we have lived and worked in 6 different countries across Asia Pacific and Europe, and frequent users of properties of our Airbnb “colleagues”. We bought this Airbnb property June 2022, fully furnished since it has been so popular for over 6 years with a long list of great reviews covering as much the property quality as it did the wonderful hosts! 

I/Arnold do advisory work (“Technology Commercialization”) and teach courses at business schools, while Weili manages our Airbnb business. We live  in the property adjacent to the Airbnb unit, and mostly one of us will be available to help optimise your time in and around The Hague and Holland. 

Looking forward to meet & host you soon!
Arnold & Weili

name: Spacious beach house with beautiful view
description:
Come over and enjoy our spacious and comfortable Airbnb.

This place is situated in a beautiful, green, and characteristic neighborhood in Scheveningen. You will love this quiet, bright, and nice space at the foot of the dunes and enjoy the wonderful views on the national park, 'Meijendel'.

Furthermore, the location is great: the beach (10m walk), the dunes (1m walk), the boulevard (10m walk), stores, and a market in the Gentse- and Stevinstraat (7m walk) are all within walking distance.

The space
The 145 m2 apartment has a private entrance. It is well suited for up to 6 people.

The kitchen is spacious, bright, clean, and fully equipped. It comes with a nice island where you can enjoy a coffee and accesses a sunny balcony.

The living- and dining rooms have a table that can seat up to 8 people, a sofa, an armchair, and a large set of windows to lighten up the space. There is no TV, instead, there is a beamer that you c
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in a beautiful, green, and characteristic neighborhood in Scheveningen. The neighborhood is called the 'Belgian Park' and mainly consists of original 1930s houses. This is a very safe area.

Everything is nearby: the beach (10m walk), the dunes 'Mijendel' (1m walk), the boulevard (10m walk), and shops in the Gentse- and Stevinstraat (7m walk) are all within walking distance.

name: Lovely private room in the heart of The Hague
description:
A cozy room in an apartment located in a central location in the heart of The Hague, tourist attractions, and other facilities are located a few minutes from the apartment.
An authentic atmosphere in a peaceful environment surrounded by green and beautiful nature.

Easy to access by tram, bus, and train.

The space
The room is small but cozy, bright, friendly, and quiet.
Connected to a shared bathroom.
Wifi connection is available. There is a coffee maker and an electric kettle in the room to prepare coffee/ tea. Fresh towels are also available.

Guest access
Since the apartment has an open plan, (the living room/ kitchen is our main space), this space cannot be accessible.

Food can be cooled in the refrigerator.
A washing machine is also available.

name: Gehele woning met heerlijk grote tuin.
description:
Spacious house with big, sunny garden. Situated in a quiet neighborhood but by foot, bike or public transport only a few minutes away from popular restaurants and bars. Also, the house is very close to the beach, the beautiful sunsets certainly will give you positive vibes.

The space
The house has a light living room and seperate dining room, which makes it feel very spacious. The kitchen has everything you need (fridge, stove, dishwasher, large oven etc.), including a high quality coffee maker and fresh roasted beans to start your day with. Also there is a rain shower, WiFi, TV, washing machine and dryer. All the rooms are situated on the ground floor. In the spacious garden you can lounge in the sitting area.

Guest access
If you rather stay in after a long day exploring the city, please feel free to grab one of the board games. We have lots!

Other things to note
We would love to share our favourites with you to make

name: Beautiful & spacious room with couch in The Hague
description:
Enjoy this lovely room in the hague center, only 4 minutes walk to the nearest tram stop, which connects to city center in a few minutes.

The room is fully furnished with one double bed, working table and chair, couch and closet.

Quiet, clean and safe.
The kitchen is newly renovated and well equipped with induction stove, fridge, microwave and oven, toaster, feel free to make your home meal/ coffee/ tea.
Great restaurant and convenience stores are also in walking distance.

The space
It’s spacious and bright room, quiet and relaxed atmosphere and I encourage guests to maintain that atmosphere during the stay.

Other things to note
Please do not smoke in the room

Exempt

I like to meet people and host nice people from different countries. 

I like clean and tidy up my room, hope you can enjoy a pleasant stay in my place.

description:
Spacious apartment in an area close to the city center and to the beach (15 minutes), with big garden and greenhouse. We recently renovated the house. Floor heating in living and bedroom. The living room has workspaces behind a roomdivider, with adjustable sit-stand desks. There is an extra bedroom with lots of closet space. Another area for the washing and drying machine. All utensils for a comfortable stay available. This is the perfect temporary home for your short stay or workation.

name: Charming family house near beach and city center
description:
Sfeervol en gezellig familiehuis (250 m2 - 4 woonlagen) in een van de mooiste buurten van Den Haag. Ideale ligging: 15 min fietsen naar het strand en op 15 min loopafstand van het stadscentrum. Om de hoek bij het Vredespaleis. Er is een mooi bos met grote speeltuin op 5 min lopen van het huis en om de hoek is een winkelstraat met wat winkeltjes en restaurants/cafés. Het huis heeft een mooie groene tuin met een zithoek en eettafel.

The space
Karakteristiek huis uit 1880, volledig gerenoveerd en gemoderniseerd. Zeer stijlvol en sfeervol! Op de begane grond is een woonkeuken met een marmeren eetbar en barkrukken. Ook is er een eettafel met stoelen en 2 kinderstoelen. Aan de voorkant van de ruimte is een aparte zithoek. Op de eerste verdieping is nog een separate woonkamer en het washok. Op de bovenste 2 verdiepingen zijn de slaapkamers en een werkruimte.

Guest access
Toegang tot hele huis met uitzondering van 1 kamer

License numb
neighborhood_overview: Het huis is gelegen in de Archipelbuurt. Een van de mooiste buurten van Den Haag met prachtige karakteristieke huizen. Erg rustig wonen en heel kindvriendelijk (zijn bijvoorbeeld een aantal speeltuinen in de buurt). Centraal gelegen: dichtbij strand en stadscentrum en dichtbij groen (klein bos op 5 min loopafstand).  Op 5 min. loopafstand van het huis is een winkelstraat met een supermarkt, paar winkeltjes en horecagelegenheden.
host_about: Hi am Sanne and live in The Hague with my husband Thomas and 3 kids. We love living in The Hague. It is a pleasant, green city near the beach which makes living here great! We love traveling and to discover new places and get to know new cultures.

name: Luxurious City Centre Studio
description:
-- Short stay apartments (minimum stay of 7 nights) --

Located in the charming historic centre of the city, just steps away from shops, restaurants, and public transportation, 348 Suites offers affordable, quality short stay accommodation with all the comforts of home. Whether you are looking for the perfect alternative to a hotel for one week or a place to call home for an extended stay of up to four months, we provide the ideal solution.

The space
These spacious studio units range from 25 to 39 square metres. Some of the apartments have a balcony.

Standard in every unit are a comfortable living/dining room, a new fully equipped kitchen, modern spacious bathroom with a shower and mirrored vanity unit, and a wall-mounted toilet.

The fully equipped kitchen provides:
- Refrigerator with freezer compartment
- Induction cooktop
- Combination oven
- Dishwasher
- Water cooker

name: Gorgeous bedroom in The Hague
description:
Welcome to our cozy apartment in the heart of Statenkwartier, The Hague. The living area has modern furnishings, a sofa, flat-screen TV, and a dining table. The kitchen is fully equipped. The bedroom has a double bed and ample storage. The bathroom features a walk-in shower. We're near great restaurants, cafes, and shops, and within walking distance from Peace Palace and Scheveningen beach. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
Living Area: The living area is open-plan and tastefully decorated with modern furnishings. It features a comfortable sofa, a flat-screen TV, and a dining table that seats four.

Kitchen: The kitchen is fully equipped with all the necessary appliances and utensils, including a stove, oven, microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher, and cooking utensils. You'll have everything you need to cook up a storm if you feel like it.

Bedroom: The bedroom is cozy and inviting, with a comfortable doubl
neighborhood_overview:
You'll love staying in this vibrant and eclectic neighborhood, which boasts a fantastic selection of restaurants, cafes, and shops, all within walking distance of our home.

The famous Peace Palace is just a short stroll away, as is the beautiful Scheveningen beach. You'll love exploring the charming streets of Statenkwartier, which are lined with historic buildings, trendy boutiques, and cozy cafes.

The Hague is known for its cultural attractions, and you'll be just a stone's throw away from some of the best museums and galleries in the city. Take a stroll through the picturesque Westbroekpark, or head to the nearby Madurodam miniature park for a unique and fun-filled adventure.

And when you're ready to unwind after a day of exploring, you'll find that our apartment is the perfect place to relax and recharge. With modern furnishings, a fully equipped kitchen, and a cozy bedroom, you'll have everything you need to make yourself at home.

name: Knus, licht en comfortabel jaren '30 appartement
description: Gelegen precies op de grens tussen het karakteristieke en oer-Hollandse Oud-Rijswijk en het multiculturele, in jaren '30 ontworpen Laakkwartier bevindt zich mijn appartement. Over de tijd heen heb ik deze plek met veel zorg en liefde ingericht met meubels uit verschillende tijdperken; het is comfortabel ingericht met alle voorzieningen die je nodig hebt voor een paar dagen weg! Het appartement bevindt zich aan een rustige straat met uitzicht op groen; een plek waar je heerlijk kunt ontspannen!
host_about: Ik ben architecte en stedenbouwkundig ontwerper en woon nu 4 jaar in Den Haag. Na enkele jaren te hebben samengewoond met vrienden heb ik nu een appartement voor mezelf en deel ik deze graag, wanneer het agenda-technisch uitkomt, graag met anderen die Den Haag beter willen leren kennen :) Ik heb veel aandacht besteed aan de inrichting (ik hou van mooie tweedehands meubels en lampen struinen), dus hoop dat gasten dat ook kunnen waarderen en er zorgvuldig mee omgaan. Ik ben communicatief, vrolijk, flexibel, geinteresseerd en positief!

name: Bright house with 2 bedrooms+garden+free parking
description:
Welcome in Nootdorp! A green and peaceful village between Delft and the Hague with all facilities nearby. Parking is free in this neighborhood and in front of my house you will find the tram to Delft or the Hague.

The gym and swimming pool are a 5 minutes walk. Grocery stores (Albert Heijn, Jumbo, Lidl, bakeries, etc) are a 10 minutes walk.

For long stays 2-weekly cleaning is included.

The space
The house has a bright living room with open kitchen (dishwasher, oven, microwave, fridge, freezer) with access to a small sunny backyard.

In the hall there's a separate toilet.

Upstairs you will find the bathroom (shower, bath, sink and washing machine), a bedroom with a double bed, high ceiling and big closets.

There's also a 2nd bedroom on this floor with a big desk and extra bed.

The attic is very small (if you're taller than 1.70 you wont be able to stand up straight here) but provides some space

name: Unieke villa dichtbij strand
description:
Schakel een tandje terug in deze unieke, rustgevende accommodatie, misschien wel het mooiste huis van Den Haag.

The space
Huize Lilly is een monumentaal pand uit 1892. Het is één van de meest charmante en karakteristieke vrijstaande villa's van Den Haag op een absolute top locatie!.

Indeling:
Tuinhek van cultuurhistorische waarde naar oprit met parkeerplaats. Overdekte entree met een prachtige, op de zon gelegen, veranda. Voordeur met gietijzeren siertraliewerk.
Zeer ruime, met marmer betegelde, hal moderne wc met fonteintje en volop lichtinval. Toegang tot de kelder.
Zeer sfeervolle woon-/eetkeuken met eiken visgraat parketvloer, hoog plafond met daklicht, ruimte voor grote eettafel en openslaande deuren naar tuin/terras met ochtendzon. Tevens gezellige eetbar met volop kastruimte, gootsteen en quooker. Kastenwand met daarin geïntegreerd een koelkast en een oven. Prachtig uitzicht op de tuin en het Westbroekpark. name: Knus appartement in Den Haag
description:
Een sfeervol appartement met een grote tuin op het zuiden. Makkelijk te bereiken met het openbaar vervoer. Het appartement is gelegen in de gezellige vruchtenbuurt. Een groene buurt met leuke restaurants en buurtwinkels. Het appartement is op loopafstand (2,5 km) van het strand en het mooie Westduinpark.

The space
Het appartement heeft een oppervlakte van ca 85 vierkante meter. Het heeft ruime, lichte kamers ensuite. In de voorkamer staat een Aeromaxx boxspring bed. In de andere kamer staat de bank en een eettafel met uitzicht op de tuin. In de aparte slaapkamer staat een eenpersoons bed en een uitschuif bed. De tuin is gelegen op het zuiden en heeft een oppervlakte van wel 100 vierkante meter. De keuken is uitgerust met een vierpits gasfornuis, een oven, magnetron, Nespresso apparaat, wasmachine en een droger.

Guest access
De gasten hebben toegang tot alle ruimtes in het appartement.

Spacious apartment with spacious bedrooms, 1 bathrooms and 1 toilet. Not to mention te nice kitchen. Comfy beds, and with all the comfort that you need. On a few minutes walk from the beach and promenade, for max 4 persons.
The apartment is fully equipped with everything that you need for a nice stay near the beach.
Comfy beds, luxe bathroom and a open kitchen.
Around the corner is the Boulevard with a lot of shops. Supermarket and etc. All what you need for your stay!

host_about:
Hello, we're Hosted by Wendy, a professional holiday let management company based in The Hague. We've been providing fantastic accommodation for 7 years, and would love to provide the perfect place for you to stay. We only provide entire apartments/houses, and all of our properties are specifically provided for holiday let use. We're on hand to help with any questions you have, before, during and after your stay. Get in touch and one of the team, will get back to you.

name: Family Friendly and Spacious Modern Apartment
description:
HOOGTEPUNTEN VAN HET HOTEL
★ Snelle en gratis wifi
★ Volledig uitgeruste appartementen inclusief keuken
★ Hotel is gelegen in een oude school

Wakker worden in de gezelligste straat van Scheveningen én het strand bijna kunnen kussen. Dat is wat je beleeft bij het gloednieuwe Ocean House Scheveningen!

Families, vriendengroepen, stelletjes... alles en iedereen is welkom is ons nieuwe hotel in Scheveningen! Schop je schoenen uit en schenk wat lekkers te drinken in. Welkom in je eigen Ocean House!

The space
Het appartement heeft alles voor een heerlijk verblijf in Scheveningen.

De ruimte is 30m2 en is verdeeld over 2 etages. Het appartement beschikt over een volledig uitgeruste keuken met onder andere een koelkast, oven, kookplaat en vaatwasser. Hier kook je de lekkerste maaltijden! Bovendien zijn alle appartementen uitgerust met een mooie badkamer met inloop douche.

We weten zeker dat je je helemaal thuis
neighborhood_overview: De Keizerstraat staat bekend als dé gezelligste straat van Scheveningen. Kleine en leuke winkeltjes vind je hier, maar ook lekkere restaurants en cafés. Genoeg vertier en dichtbij de boulevard van Scheven ingen.
host_about:
Hi! I am Marina, host at Ocean House Scheveningen.

Whether you come to sleep together or with the whole family, everything and everyone is welcome at Ocean House. In each room you can enjoy the best facilities such as a Nespresso coffee machine, your own kitchen, a nice bathroom to get ready for the evening after a day at the beach and, above all, enough space for everyone. Oh, and did you know that in some rooms the dog is also welcome?

name: Bright & spacious Garden room in The Hague center
description:
Enjoy this lovely room in the hague center, only 4 minutes walk to the nearest tram stop, which connects to city center in a few minutes.

The room is fully furnished with one double bed, working table and chair, couch and closet.

Quiet, clean and safe.
The kitchen is newly renovated and well equipped with induction stove, fridge, microwave and oven, toaster, feel free to make your home meal/ coffee/ tea.
Great restaurant and convenience stores are also in walking distance.

The space
Very big bedroom with backyard. Room has very good lighting, amazing work desk and couch!

Other things to note
Please do not smoke in the room.

name: Townhouse with 3 bedrooms and a beautiful garden
description:
Welcome to our house in The Hague! Within 20 mins of walking (and less by bike) one gets to Kijkduin beach; 30 mins to city center by tram. The beautiful big tree at the bottom of the garden is magnificent - was there before us and will still be there after us :-).

The space
Hi, my name is Vesela, our family of four would like to welcome you in our house, while we are away.
The three bedrooms, the bathroom and one of the separate toilets are on the second floor; downstairs there are two sofas in the living room with removable cushions comfy to sleep on (inflatable mattress also available). Bright kitchen next to the eating area with all equipment available for use - just open the cupboards and find what you need.

Nearby: two parks, Kijkduin beach, shopping center, restaurants, public transport (tram #3).

We live with our two pets - cocker spaniel Maya and cat Asha. When we travel, the dog is with us/with her pet sitter, the c
host_about:
Hello, my name is Vesela. 
Pet lover, traveler, in love with books, kids and beach. Passion for flowers and gardening. Trying my best with cooking and baking. Would not miss a chance to get to know different cultures and way of living. Nice to meet you!

name: Villa de Grasduin vlakbij zee
description:
Wees welkom in de prachtige, gezinsvriendelijke Villa de Grasduin, op een unieke locatie zo'n 400 meter van het strand.

In de omgeving van Kijkduin Beach Resort kun je heerlijk wandelen of fietsen door de duinen, zonnen op het strand, zwemmen in zee of kitesurfen. Voor een citytrip zijn onder meer Den Haag en Rotterdam te bezoeken.

Kijkduin Beach Resort biedt voorzieningen als een restaurant, overdekt zwembad, padelbanen en gratis parkeergelegenheid.

The space
Villa de Grasduin is een vrijstaande villa omsloten door een tuin met veel privacy, zon- én schaduwplekjes.
Er zijn 3 slaapkamers; één met een tweepersoonsbed en twee met 2 losse bedden, waarvan er 2 zelfs 2,10 meter lang zijn! Ook is er een vast bureau in één slaapkamer, om ongestoord te kunnen werken. De badkamer heeft een douche, wastafel en wasmachine.
In de inpandige opslagruimte is plek voor 1 of 2 (elektrische) fietsen.
Beddengoed en keukenlinnen zijn inbegrep
neighborhood_overview:
Beach Resort Kijkduin Den Haag
Aan de rand van een breed zandstrand, midden in een uitgestrekt duingebied, ligt Beach Resort Kijkduin. Kijkduin is een gezellige badplaats ten zuiden van Den Haag. Kijkduin biedt voor ieder wat wils: sfeervolle strandpaviljoens langs een mooie boulevard, maar ook rust en natuur.
host_about:
Mijn naam is Ilse en als eigenaar van Villa de Grasduin heet ik je van harte welkom op een onvergetelijke strandvakantie in Den Haag. 

Met een passie voor gastvrijheid en oog voor comfort is Villa de Grasduin ingericht als een plek waar je je direct thuis zult voelen; of je nu in alle rust wilt werken of lekker vakantie wilt vieren.

Als je vragen of opmerkingen hebt, ben ik altijd bereid te helpen om ervoor te zorgen dat je een onvergetelijk verblijf hebt in de Grasduin!

name: Hotel Novallure City - Twin room with kitchenette
description:
Imagine waking up in your cosy bed only to find yourself in a hotel in the middle of the city centre of Den Haag. When staying at Novallure City centre your only dilemma is whether you want to stay in and enjoy your lovely room or go out and about and explore the beautiful city of Den Haag which is just outside your hotel room.

The space
Our rooms are designed in such a way to accommodate the modern day traveller who wants to explore new cities and go on adventures. Maybe you want to visit one of the many museums Den Haag has. Or perhaps a visit to our houses of parliament which are just a few minutes away. You might also bump into our King as Den Haag is the city of residence of our Royal family. If you have to travel to Den Haag for work and want to watch your own Netflix shows via our TV’s with Chromecast then we’ve got you covered. Our rooms with kitchenettes also give you the flexibility to choose if you want to eat out or prepare a simple meal in your room.
host_about: Homey Housing is een verhuurmakelaar in Den Haag en Rotterdam. Wij zijn actief in de short - en longstay markt. Op zoek naar een woning? Stuur ons een berichtje!

name: Smaakvol appartement met patio
description:
Situated in a very nice neighbourhood, spitting distance from the city centre. Trams on a 5 minute walk. Within walking distance of nice restaurants and cafes, supermarket, bakery, butcher and only 10 minutes by bike to the beach of Scheveningen.
The apartment has a private patio and all the necessary amenities: WIFI, TV (also in bedroom) and a fully equiped kitchen (quooker).
This is my home so you will find some of my possessions around. In the bedroom (bedsize: 160x200) there is no wardrobe!

The space
An open plan and fully renovated cosy appartement on the lower floor of a beautiful building. There are some stairs to enter the appartment. Not wheelchair accessible!

Guest access
There is a closed - private - space in the appartement.

Other things to note
Between 23:00 and 10:00 the noise level should be low. This is to prevent nuisance for the neighbours. No party's!!

name: Stylish and spacious house
description:
Spacious and stylish ground floor town house located in a very quiet street close to the beach, the harbour and the city centre. It is a fully renovated Dutch traditional house built in 1905. The property has a large open space living room and kitchen area, courtyard, bathroom, toilet and four rooms (two bedrooms, an office space and children playroom). It is within walking distance of the popular shopping street Frederickhendricklaan which has lots of restaurants, pubs, cafes and shops.

name: NEW renovated & private Tiny House with bikes
description:
NEW renovated! Atmospheric Tiny House, with two bicycles in a perfect location. The center of The Hague is a 15-minute bike ride away, the beach is just 10 min away. Ideal for a beach holiday or a weekend in The Hague, museum visits, or forest walks. Modern kitchen with fridge and oven. A shower, toilet, a double bed and a comfortable sitting area with sofa, table and chairs. Perfect for 2 to 3 people. The sofa can be folded out as an extra bed. We speak Dutch, English and German.

The space
This Tiny House is ideally suited for 2 people, but possibly a maximum of 2 (small) children can come along. The sofa is a sofa bed and can be folded out.

The Tiny House is standard equipped with clean bed linen, towels for all guests, toilet paper, and of course coffee / tea.

Parking
The Tiny House is located on a wide avenue with always enough parking spaces in front of the door. An hourly rate applies from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. on weekdays (approx. 10
neighborhood_overview:
Benoordenhout is a stately neighborhood with lots of greenery in the Haagse Hout district of The Hague, built for the most part between about 1925 and 1935. The neighborhood is quiet and safe.
In this district people speak of '15 minute life' because everything can be reached within 15 minutes: the city of The Hague and the wonderful beach of Scheveningen.

Shopping
You can do a small errand on foot at shops on Willem Royaardsplein. For big shopping, the center of The Hague or the Mall of the Netherland (15 min by car) offers everything you need.

Nature
The Tiny House is located on the edge of a forest/park, and is surrounded by greenery and trees. So for a lovely walk or picnic you go to Park Clingendael; a beautifully landscaped nature park, just around the corner!

Bicycle
By bike you can easily and quickly reach one of the many museums in the area (such as: Mauritshuis, Madurodam, Louwman, Kunstmuseum Den Haag, Voorlinden, etc.) or
host_about: Wij hebben veel gereisd in ons leven en houden van het ontmoeten van nieuwe mensen. Daarom hebben wij onze garage tot een mooi gastenverblijf laten renoveren, waar wij nu graag reislustige mensen ontvangen en laten meegenieten van het mooie leven aan de Nederlandse kust.

description:
This Amazing beach house just 100m from the ocean, close harbour and dunes in the heart of the old Scheveningen village. The 19th century home had been recently renovated from two separate cottages into one large, roomy and fully equipped family home with respect to all authentic details. It is situated in a cozy and quiet neighbourhood with two shopping streets in walking distance and the city center just a bike ride away (reachable by a lush forrest road). I hope you are having an excellent day! 

My name is Bram and I live in the lovely beachside town of The Hague, Holland. I very much like living here because we have everything: beaches, dunes, history, city life. It is hard to leave. Only for great trip abroad maybe ;-). 

I love to surf and snowboard and practice yoga everyday. Reading is a favorite pass-time as well but my greatest passion however is music in all shapes and forms. Listening but most definetly playing and making music, both acoustic and electronic.

Bye!

Bram

host_about:
Welcome to our unique hotel & hostel concept in the heart of The Hague! 
My name is Niek, and I am the proud host of this young, modern, and vibrant accommodation. Our property is located in the historic city center, offering easy access to all the major attractions and landmarks.

At our hotel & hostel, we offer a variety of unique themed rooms designed with young and modern travelers in mind. Our international team is friendly, welcoming, and always ready to go the extra mile to ensure our guests have a great experience.

Our aim is to provide a convenient stay and outstanding hotel service to our guests. We have an on-site bar, where you can enjoy a refreshing drink or socialize with other travelers in a friendly atmosphere. We believe that the social aspect of travel is just as important as the destination itself, and we strive to create an environment where our guests can connect and have a memorable experience.

Whether you're traveling solo, with friends, or family, we have something for everyone. So come and experience our unique concept in The Hague, and let us make your stay a truly unforgettable one!

neighborhood_overview: Scheveningen is a seaside resort town located in the Netherlands. It is part of The Hague and has been a popular tourist destination since the 19th century. Visitors to Scheveningen can enjoy its beautiful beaches, lively nightlife, and many attractions such as Sea Life Scheveningen aquarium, miniature golf courses, an amusement park with roller coasters and other rides, shopping centers with designer stores and boutiques as well as traditional Dutch markets selling local products like cheese or clogs. There are also plenty of restaurants offering delicious seafood dishes from freshly caught fish from the North Sea.

My name is Niek, and I am the proud host of this young, modern, and vibrant accommodation. Our property is located in the historic city center, offering easy access to all the major attractions and landmarks.

At our hotel & hostel, we offer a variety of unique themed rooms designed with young and modern travelers in mind. Our international team is friendly, welcoming, and always ready to go the extra mile to ensure our guests have a great experience.

Our aim is to provide a convenient stay and outstanding hotel service to our guests. We have an on-site bar, where you can enjoy a refreshing drink or socialize with other travelers in a friendly atmosphere. We believe that the social aspect of travel is just as important as the destination itself, and we strive to create an environment where our guests can connect and have a memorable experience.

Whether you're traveling solo, with friends, or family, we have something for everyone. So come and experience our unique concept in The Hague, and let us make your stay a truly unforgettable one!

name: Charming and comfy house
description:
We (Anna and Joost) have been living in this house for a couple of years now. It is our own little getaway in the city of the Hague. It is a hidden gem. Inside our house it feels like you are on the countyside with only a 15 minutes biketrip to the beach, 5 minutes to central station and Laan van NOI station and a 10 minute bikeride to everything else. We would like you to enjoy our house as we do!

The space
Our house is an independent house surrounded by gardens. The first floor offers a toilet and a living room and kitchen that both overlook the garden.

On the second floor we have a two person bedroom (the bed is very good) and a bathroom with toilet.

Our garden is very private. It is sunny from early in the morning till late afternoon (in summer). In the evening we suggest to sit and relax at the campfire. We will prepare the wood for you.

Guest access

name: The Jungle Double Suite
description:
A unique extension of our hotel with its own private veranda overlooking the courtyard. Sleep among lush greenery, tropical flowers and be ready to dream about paradise. This room has a double boxspring bed, in- and outdoor seating areas and an en-suite bathroom. Even in the shower you will feel like you are in the rainforest. Only thing missing is some wild animal sounds, but we are still working on that.

name: The Superior Double Suite
description:
Look no further, it's the Superior suite you are after! Combining contemporary design with a monumental setting is what this room is all about. You can relax in luxury with our custom-made king-size boxspring bed. It incorporates a desk space for two and a large wardrobe. Through its big windows, you can watch the world pass by whilst you unwind in the comfortable design chairs. The spacious bathroom with separate toilet will make your stay complete.

name: The Courtyard Suite
description:
Everything in this room is custom-made for you. Due to monumental regulations, we could not build an ordinary bathroom in here. That's why the "bathroom shed' is the starting point of this rooms design. From there on; the lighting, artwork and decoration set the colourful vibe of this room. The Courtyard Suite is located on the ground floor and has an en-suite bathroom and a separate toilet. The comfortable double boxspring bed will keep you well rested.

description:
Together but separate.
Perfect to share a room but not a bed.
The two boxspring single beds are well distanced to allow you to relax in comfort. Separated by a bar style table and stools you can meet in the middle. The en-suite bathroom and storage space make this a perfect room for two guests to be prepared for all the adventures ahead.‍

name: Souterrain Double Room
description:
The coziest hotel room in The Hague!
This room is located in the souterrain and has a separate souterrain entrance. The comfortable double boxspring bed, homely carpeted floors and a seating area will be your own private oasis in the city. Together with the monumental beams, lead glass in the windows and the original brick wall, this room creates a classical feel. This room does not have an en-suite bathroom. The toilet is across the hall and the private bathroom is located one floor up.

name: Prachtig authentieke gezinswoning
description:
Stijlvolle gezinswoning met ruime tuin, vlakbij het centrum van Den Haag en het strand.

Deze woning is perfect voor een gezin met één of twee jonge kinderen. Naast het ledikantje is het mogelijk een wieg of extra ledikant aan te vragen, dan zorgen wij voor een heerlijk extra bedje.

Twee echte Hollandse fietsen (kinderzitjes op aanvraag) zijn inbegrepen in de huurprijs.

In de tuin staat een bank met kussens, een schuurtje en een tafel met vier stoelen. De hele dag is er wel ergens zon :)!

The space
Begane grond: woonkamer met grote zithoek en tv (met chromecast), warme eetkamer met grote eettafel (inclusief kinderstoel en box), eet- en woonkamer kunnen gescheiden worden door ensuite deuren, serre met chillhoek en werkplek met openslaande deuren naar de tuin, keuken met groot fornuis (en goede koffie!), rustgevende slaapkamer met genoeg kastruimte en groot bed (1.60x2.00), toilet.

Eerste etage: kinderkamer, geschikt tot
neighborhood_overview: Het levendige Regentessekwartier is een heerlijke wijk om te verblijven. Onze straat is heel rustig, maar om de hoek is genoeg te beleven. Op een minuut lopen zijn er koffiebarretjes, cafés en verschillende restaurants. In de buurt een grote speeltuin (op Koningsplein). Winkelstraten, zoals de Weimarstraat en de Reinkenstraat, op minder dan vijf minuten wandelen. Goede verbinding met het openbaar vervoer richting strand en stad (meerdere haltes binnen 5 minuten wandelen). Op de fiets naar strand 10-15 minuten en naar het centrum 10 minuten.
host_about: Ik ben Floor, 30 jaar oud en woon samen met mijn vriend Casper en ons dochtertje Lize in Den Haag. Ik werk als psycholoog en naast mijn werk ben ik iemand die nooit stil zit (altijd op pad!). Ik heb een passie voor interieur en ben een bevlogen host.

name: Hotspot in centre of The Hague
description:
Deze centraal gelegen accommodatie is smaakvol ingericht. Het is slechts 10
minuten lopen vanaf de stad en de buurt is is omringd door restaurantjes en leuke kleine winkels. Het appartement is vorig jaar gerenoveerd en verkeerd in een prachtige moderne warme staat.

The space
Er zijn twee slaapkamers ieder voorzien van een tweepersoonsbed. De woonkamer heeft een heerlijk open gevoel en voorzien van alle gemakken. Het kookeiland is voorzien van een bargedeelte waar genoeg ruimte is om met 5 personen aan te zitten.

Guest access
Gehele huis

Other things to note
Er zijn twee huiskatten, Loekie en Harry. Zij blijven in de woning, ze hebben hun eigen plekje achter in het huis waar ze vaak zitten. Toch vinden ze het heerlijk om te komen kroelen. Verwacht dat ze aandacht komen zoeken

neighborhood_overview: Het Zeeheldenkwartier is een compacte, monumentale en bruisende stadswijk die erg geliefd is bij young professionals. De wijk heeft een sterk eigen karakter en ademt creativiteit en dynamiek. Dit komt voor een belangrijk deel door  de relatief grote groep jonge ondernemers en bewoners in de wijk. Het Zeeheldenkwartier heeft  sfeervolle straten, grachten, zonnige pleinen.
host_about:
I' am daniel! I live together with my partner with much pleasure in beautifull The Hague. I like to travel, same as you do!

Other things I like to do is going to the gym, listen to techno music and hang out with friends in my neighbourhood. 

I’am social and friendly and that is wat you feel when you walk into my House. 

Enjoy your stay!
